original: Orym: Some of the victims didn't have [i]any[/i] magical traces on them.[p/] So we [i]know[/i] that they're not under the effects of a spell.[p/] But they [i]still[/i] haven't woken up.
translation: Orym: 有的受害人身上[i]没有一点[/i]法术痕迹。[p/]所以我们[i]知道[/i]他们没受到法术影响。[p/]但这些人[i]依然[/i]没有醒来。

original: Tyrion: That's odd, to say the least...
translation: Tyrion: 听起来很不可思议……

original: Tyrion: Is there any common thread between the knights who fell comatose?
translation: Tyrion: 昏迷的骑士们有什么共同点吗？

original: Tyrion: That might help us deduce what happened to them.
translation: Tyrion: 也许我们能借此推测他们身上发生了什么。

original: Orym: Well...[p/] We found all of them at the locations where Steelwind was spotted.
translation: Orym: 这个……[p/]他们都是在斯蒂尔文德被目击的地点被发现的。

original: Orym: That [i]can't[/i] be a coincidence.
translation: Orym: 这总[i]不能[/i]是巧合吧。

original: But he just admitted that they weren't being affected by any kind of spell.
translation: 但他刚刚才说，骑士们没有被任何法术影响。

original: What's going on here?
translation: 到底怎么回事？

original: Tyrion: Commander White...[p/] You keep saying "the perp" instead of "Steelwind".
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官……[p/]你一直在说“犯人”而不是“斯蒂尔文德”。

original: Tyrion: Even though everyone [i]else[/i] seems to think she was responsible for this.
translation: Tyrion: [i]其他人[/i]好像都已经认定她就是犯人。

original: Tyrion: Do you also suspect that she's being framed?
translation: Tyrion: 你也怀疑她是受人陷害？

original: Orym: It just doesn't add up.
translation: Orym: 这些事单纯说不通。

original: Orym: If she [i]did[/i] give herself Mageblight,[p/] her actions wouldn't have been so deliberate.
translation: Orym: 如果她[i]确实[/i]得了法师之疫，她的行为就不会这么谨慎。

original: Tyrion: And she's definitely not the type of person to just go around murdering people.
translation: Tyrion: 她也不是那种随地杀人的类型。

original: Orym: Even if she was,[p/] she's led a lot of the Inquisition's investigations recently.
translation: Orym: 就算她是吧，[p/]最近她也负责了很多裁判所的调查任务。

original: Orym: She's investigated plenty of homicides with us.[p/] And she knows [i]exactly[/i] how we do things.
translation: Orym: 她和我们一同调查了不少谋杀案。[p/]她[i]清楚[/i]我们怎么干活的。

original: Orym: Whoever did this got the job done.[p/] But they were sloppy about it.
translation: Orym: 犯人确实成功了。[p/]但也非常马虎。

original: Orym: A bunch of witnesses saw her.[p/] And she didn't even [i]try[/i] to hide herself using her magic.
translation: Orym: 目击者数不胜数。[p/]而她甚至都没[i]尝试[/i]用魔法隐匿行踪。

original: Orym: So either she [i]had[/i] Mageblight,[p/] which doesn't match with her behavior.
translation: Orym: 要么她法师之疫[i]加身[/i]——[p/]这一点和她的行动不符。

original: Orym: Or she did this [i]intentionally[/i] and [i]wanted[/i] to get caught.
translation: Orym: 要么她[i]故意[/i]这么做，就[i]想要[/i]被抓住。

original: Orym: Neither scenario makes any damned sense...
translation: Orym: 两种说法都很扯淡……

original: Tyrion: ...Someone [i]has[/i] to be framing her.
translation: Tyrion: ……[i]只能[/i]是有人想陷害她。

original: Tyrion: That's the only reasonable explanation.
translation: Tyrion: 这是唯一合理的解释。

original: Orym: ...Honestly,[p/] I'm not so sure about [i]that[/i] either.
translation: Orym: ……说实话，[p/]我也不确定。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 什么意思？

original: Orym: You saw her when we arrested her, didn't you?
translation: Orym: 我们逮捕她的时候，你也看见了吧？

original: Orym: She [i]wanted[/i] us to lock her up.
translation: Orym: 她[i]希望[/i]被关押起来。

original: Orym: It's like she thought she was a danger to herself and others.
translation: Orym: 仿佛她知道自己对周围有威胁。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] That's the same impression I got as well.
translation: Tyrion: 的确……[p/]我也是同样的印象。

original: Orym: If it weren't for the witness's statements,[p/] I'd be [i]sure[/i] she gave herself Mageblight.
translation: Orym: 要不是因为目击证词，[p/]我都会[i]深信[/i]她不慎得了法师之疫。

original: Orym: The strangest thing is that I've never seen her that scared before.
translation: Orym: 最奇怪的是，我第一次见到她这么害怕的样子。

original: Orym: Something really rattled her about what happened.
translation: Orym: 有什么确确实实吓到她了。

original: Tyrion: Did you follow up on what I said about Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: 你有跟进我关于比亚特丽丝的证词吗？

original: Tyrion: I [i]know[/i] she was in the room when Pierce and I fell unconscious.
translation: Tyrion: 我[i]知道[/i]她也在我和皮尔斯昏倒的房间里。

original: Tyrion: She has to be involved in this somehow...
translation: Tyrion: 她肯定脱不了干系……

original: Orym: Well,[p/] she's already in prison.[p/] So we're already ahead on that account.
translation: Orym: 哎，[p/]她已经锒铛入狱。[p/]这边我们是领先的。

original: Orym: But when we asked her what happened,[p/] she said that she couldn't remember anything.
translation: Orym: 我们问她发生了什么，[p/]她只说什么都不记得。

original: Tyrion: That's such an obvious lie.[p/] She has to be hiding something.
translation: Tyrion: 这谎也太明显了。[p/]她肯定在隐藏什么。

original: Orym: Normally,[p/] I'd agree with you.[p/] But she's not the only one with missing memories.
translation: Orym: 一般而言，[p/]我会同意。[p/]但她不是唯一失忆的。

original: Orym: Steelwind also can't remember anything.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德也失忆了。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……哈？

original: It looks like you'll have to speak with her about that.
translation: 看来你得找她谈谈了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] what about Eris and that knight who was guarding her?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]厄莉斯和负责守卫她的骑士呢？

original: Tyrion: Did [i]they[/i] see anything?
translation: Tyrion: [i]他们[/i]看见什么了？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Orym: Sorry, kid.[p/] But Eris Illmater has been missing since everything went down.
translation: Orym: 不好意思，小子。[p/]厄莉斯·伊尔马特在事态变化后一直失踪。

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？！

original: Tyrion: Do you have any idea what happened to her?!
translation: Tyrion: 那你知道她怎么了吗？！

original: Orym: No...[p/] But I wouldn't be [i]too[/i] worried.
translation: Orym: 不知道……[p/]但我不会[i]过于[/i]担心。

original: Tyrion: What?![p/][s/] A witness to the crime is [i]missing[/i] and possibly hurt!
translation: Tyrion: 啥？！[p/][s/]事件的目击证人[i]失踪了[/i]，还可能受伤！

original: Orym: Look, kid.[p/] You may be a hotshot attorney,[p/] but [i]I've[/i] been in this business a lot longer than you have.
translation: Orym: 是这样，小子。[p/]可能你现在是个当红律师，[p/]但[i]我[/i]混迹搜查的时间比你长多了。

original: Orym: Sometimes when these things happen to civilians,[p/] they get spooked and run away.
translation: Orym: 平民遇上这些事的话，[p/]有时会受惊逃跑。

original: Orym: I've seen it a million times.
translation: Orym: 我见过无数次了。

original: You feel like he's not making as big a deal of this as he should be.
translation: 你感觉他像在大事化小。

original: But he [i]might[/i] have a point...
translation: 但[i]也许[/i]他说的有道理……

original: Eris [i]is[/i] the daughter of a crime lord, after all.
translation: 厄莉斯说到底是犯罪头目的女儿。

original: She might have gone into hiding to avoid having to speak with law enforcement.
translation: 她可能只是想藏起来躲避执法机构。

original: Orym: We don't have the resources to look for her.[p/] But I'm sure she'll turn up eventually.
translation: Orym: 我们没有余力找她了。[p/]但她肯定会再现身的。

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] I suppose we can't do anything about that now...
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]现在也没什么其他能做的……

original: Tyrion: But I still hope she's okay...
translation: Tyrion: 我还是希望她没事……

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] what about the knight guarding Beatrice?[p/] Surely [i]he[/i] didn't go missing as well.
translation: Tyrion: 换个话题，[p/]守卫比亚特丽丝的骑士呢？[p/]总不能连[i]他[/i]也失踪吧。

original: Orym: That's the thing...[p/] The knight who was supposed to be watching her is one of the people who went comatose.
translation: Orym: 问题就在这儿……[p/]理应看守她的骑士也是昏迷者之一。

original: Orym: We found him in front of the Prayer Room too.
translation: Orym: 他也是在祷告室前面被发现的。

original: Damn it...[p/][s/] What happened to him?!
translation: 该死……[p/][s/]他身上发生了什么？！

original: Orym: To make matters worse,[p/] that Frega chick knows how to cast [b]Invisibility[/b].
translation: Orym: 更麻烦的是，[p/]弗雷加那边的小姑娘会用[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Orym: So even [i]if[/i] she was telling the truth,[p/] very few people would've actually [i]seen[/i] her.
translation: Orym:[i]即使[/i]她说了实话，[p/]真能[i]看见[/i]她的也没几个人。

original: But her guard was in front of the Prayer Room...
translation: 但她的护卫昏倒在祷告室门前……

original: She must've brought him there somehow.
translation: 她肯定是设法把他带过去了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] would you happen to have a recent version of her [b]Spell Compendium[/b]?
translation: Tyrion: 那么，[p/]你有没有她最新的[b]法术汇编[/b]？

original: Orym: Sure.[p/] We already have it on record.
translation: Orym: 当然。[p/]已经记录在案。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] I forgot how many spells she used during Lord Frega's murder...
translation: Tyrion: 好的……[p/]我都忘了弗雷加勋爵谋杀案的时候她用了多少种法术……

original: Tyrion: It's all a little difficult to take in.[p/] I still can't believe it.
translation: Tyrion: 一切都不太好消化。[p/]我还是不敢相信。

original: Tyrion: After everything he did,[p/] von Sanctus was just murdered...
translation: Tyrion: 坏事做尽后，[p/]冯·桑克图斯就这么被杀了……

original: Orym: I'm surprised to hear that from you.
translation: Orym: 没想到能从你嘴里听到这种话。

original: Orym: Didn't he basically get away with offing Justin Waye?
translation: Orym: 他不是刚宰了贾斯汀·维耶却全身而退？

original: Orym: The way I see it,[p/] he got what he deserved.
translation: Orym: 要我说，[p/]他就是活该。

original: Tyrion: ...That still doesn't sit right with me.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我还是不自在。

original: Tyrion: No matter [i]who[/i] the victims might've been.
translation: Tyrion: 不管受害者是[i]谁[/i]。

original: Tyrion: [i]No one[/i] deserves to die like that.
translation: Tyrion: [i]没人[/i]活该这样离世。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] You're definitely a bigger man than I am.
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/] 你比我伟大多了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] von Sanctus's autopsy report says that he died of suffocation.
translation: Tyrion: 不说这个了，冯·桑克图斯的尸检报告说死因是窒息。

original: Orym: We think the murderer overpowered him and choked him with a rope or something.
translation: Orym: 我们认为凶手使用了绳子一类的东西，靠蛮力勒死了他。

original: Tyrion: ...That [i]hardly[/i] sounds like something someone would do during a psychotic episode.
translation: Tyrion: ……[i]不像[/i]是疾病发作的人干得了的事啊。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] The more info I get,[p/] the more I think you might be onto something.
translation: Orym: 是啊……[p/]了解的信息越多，[p/]我越觉得你可能是对的。

original: Orym: But either way,[p/] the fire that the perp started in this room burnt his body.
translation: Orym: 不论怎样，[p/]犯人放的火也烧了勋爵的尸体。

original: Orym: It didn't [i]completely[/i] turn it to ash.[p/] But it was still pretty charred.
translation: Orym: 虽然没有[i]完全[/i]化为灰烬。[p/]但也基本是焦炭了。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] So that fire would've burnt away any evidence of the minor wounds he had.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]火势把任何可能成为证据的小伤口都烧掉了。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] We're lucky we even discerned he was hit with an [b]evocation[/b] spell.
translation: Orym: 是啊。[p/]还能看出他被用过[b]塑能[/b]法术已经算运气好了。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] The autopsy report mentioned that too...
translation: Tyrion: 对……[p/]尸检报告也提到了……

original: Tyrion: But if a fire was started,[p/] is it possible that he died from smoke inhalation?
translation: Tyrion: 如果有人纵火，[p/]勋爵有没有可能死于吸入烟雾？

original: Orym: No.[p/] The [b]divination[/b] spell we use always identifies smoke inhalation as "death by poisoning",[p/] not "death by suffocation".
translation: Orym: 不可能。[p/]我们用的[b]占卜术[/b]会把吸入烟雾死亡识别为“中毒死”，[p/]而不是“窒息死”。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that [i]kind of[/i] makes sense.
translation: Tyrion: 也[i]算是[/i]能说得通。

original: Tyrion: ...But it's still a shame we can't find out [i]how[/i] the murderer suffocated him.
translation: Tyrion: 但凶手使其窒息的[i]方法[/i]不明还是很可惜。

original: Tyrion: We still know very little about how the murders occurred...
translation: Tyrion: 我们还不知道谋杀如何发生的……

original: Tyrion: Do you have records of each of the victim's [b]Spell Compendiums[/b]?
translation: Tyrion: 你有每个受害者的[b]法术汇编[/b]吗？

original: Tyrion: They might help us understand what each of the victims was doing during the attack.
translation: Tyrion: 也许我们能推断遇害者们遭受攻击时都在做什么。

original: Orym: Sure.[p/] Knock yourselves out.
translation: Orym: 当然有，[p/] 请便。

original: Tyrion: ...Okay, wow.
translation: Tyrion: ……好的，妈呀。

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] a lot to work through.
translation: Tyrion: 这[i]工作量[/i]可不小。

original: Orym: Yep...[p/] [i]This[/i] is what happens when a bunch of mages are caught in the middle of a murder.
translation: Orym: 对……涉及一堆法师的案子就是[i]这样[/i]。

original: Orym: Honestly,[p/] you've been lucky until now.
translation: Orym: 说实话，你小子真的很幸运。

original: Tyrion: Nevertheless,[p/] I'll need to look over each of these spells when they become relevant.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我会逐一检查可能有关的法术。

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] Trouble seems to follow you wherever you go, kid.
translation: Orym: 哼……[p/] 你走到哪儿麻烦也跟到哪儿啊，小子。

original: Tyrion: I can't help it...[p/] Sometimes I feel like [i]I'm[/i] the one who goes looking for it.
translation: Tyrion: 我也没辙……[p/]感觉有时候像是[i]我[/i]在主动找麻烦。

original: Orym: Well...[p/] You've certainly [i]found[/i] it.
translation: Orym: 嚯……那你[i]找[/i]得很成功。

original: Orym: It's a real mess this time.
translation: Orym: 这次可真是一团乱。

original: Orym: Huh...[p/] I see you're still working with the mage girl.
translation: Orym: 嗬……[p/]还和法师小姑娘共事呢。

original: Celeste: I have a name, you know.
translation: Celeste: 我有名字，懂？

original: Orym: Save it, sweetheart.[p/] You may have everyone else fooled,[p/] but we've seen today what mages like you are capable of.
translation: Orym: 省省吧宝贝儿。[p/]你能骗过其他人，[p/]但我们今天见证了你们这样的法师会干什么。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] lucky for [i]you[/i],[p/] Celeste and I are here to aid you in sorting this mess out.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，[p/][i]你[/i]也是撞大运了，[p/]我和塞莱斯特是来协助你清理乱摊子的。

original: Orym: Yeah, yeah...
translation: Orym: 都对，都对……

original: Orym: Just tell her to keep her magic under control.[p/] We need answers,[p/] not [i]more[/i] fireworks.
translation: Orym: 让她控制住自己的魔力。[p/]我们要的是答案，[p/]不是[i]更多[/i]烟花。

original: Celeste: Ugh...
translation: Celeste: 唉……

original: Orym: Man...[p/] Steelwind has gotten herself in the middle of a real mess this time.
translation: Orym: 真的……[p/]斯蒂尔文德这次卷入了不小的烂摊子。

original: Tyrion: I know...[p/] This whole situation is unbelievable.
translation: Tyrion: 我懂……[p/]目前的状况就令人难以置信。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] None of it makes sense.
translation: Orym: 是啊……[p/]全都不可理喻。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] How have you been, Commander White?
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官……[p/]最近怎样？

original: Orym: Well...[p/] A bunch of nobles got offed during,[p/] what was apparently,[p/] some kind of big aristocratic event.
translation: Orym: 这个嘛……[p/]有个盛大的贵族活动，[p/]不巧，[p/]一大群贵族因此被宰了。

original: Orym: The Crown is breathing down my neck to figure out what happened.
translation: Orym: 皇室拿刀指着我的脖子要我搞清楚怎么回事。

original: Orym: How do [i]you[/i] think my day is going?
translation: Orym: [i]你[/i]觉得我最近怎样？

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]是啊……

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] I can't believe someone just offed Lady Sibyl.
translation: Orym: 唔……[p/]不敢相信有人就这么宰了希比尔小姐。

original: Tyrion: Her family is responsible for the justice system.[p/] Have you met her before?
translation: Tyrion: 她的家族负责司法系统。[p/]你们以前见过？

original: Orym: Only in passing.
translation: Orym: 擦肩而过罢了。

original: Orym: And whenever I [i]did[/i] talk to her,[p/] she'd always say kooky things about the "universal balance".[p/] Or some kind of hooey like that.
translation: Orym: 我[i]真[/i]跟她说话的时候，[p/]她又总要提起什么古怪的“世间平衡”。[p/]或者类似的怪话。

original: Orym: Frankly,[p/] I could never understand a word she says.
translation: Orym: 很明显，[p/]我是一个字儿都不懂。

original: Orym: So, von Sanctus is actually dead...
translation: Orym: 冯·桑克图斯真的死了……

original: Orym: Honestly,[p/] I'm not going to lose any sleep over him.
translation: Orym: 说实话，[p/]我是一丁点儿都不遗憾。

original: Orym: Serves him right after what happened to Justin Waye.
translation: Orym: 正是贾斯汀·维耶事件的报应。

original: Tyrion: Even so...[p/] A dangerous murderer is on the loose.
translation: Tyrion: 即使如此……[p/]也代表有个危险的杀人犯正逍遥法外。

original: Tyrion: Neither of us can relax until we catch them and put them away.
translation: Tyrion: 成功抓获并指控凶手之前，我们都不能放松。

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] You're always working, huh?
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/]真是个工作狂哈？

original: Orym: Pierce got offed too, huh?
translation: Orym: 皮尔斯也被宰了？

original: Orym: Not that it changes much...[p/] His execution was scheduled for next month anyways.
translation: Orym: 虽然事到如今……[p/]反正他的死刑也是原定下个月执行。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: It's clear she has many conflicting emotions about what happened.
translation: 目前的事件明显让塞莱斯特五味杂陈。

original: When this is all over,[p/] you should take her somewhere to help her take her mind off of things.
translation: 一切结束之后，[p/]应该带她去什么地方散散心。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i], Commander White?
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官，你有什么看法？

original: Orym: Sorry, kid.[p/] I don't got much to say about that.
translation: Orym: 不好意思，小子。[p/]我没什么要说的。

original: You retrace your footsteps and find the Common Room.
translation: 回到了公共休息室。

original: This was the last place you saw von Sanctus and Sibyl before everything happened.
translation: 这是事件发生前，你最后一次见到冯·桑克图斯和希比尔的地方。

original: You look around and see that most of the room has been entirely scorched.
translation: 你环顾四周，发现房间大部分地方都被烧焦了。

original: You can still smell the scent of burnt cloth and flesh in the air.
translation: 空气中依然留有衣物和血肉烧焦的气味。

original: Tyrion: ...What happened here?
translation: Tyrion: ……发生了什么？

original: Celeste: Was there some kind of fire?
translation: Celeste: 是不是着火了？

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] We think the perp lit a fire using magic.
translation: Orym: 对。[p/]我们认为犯人用魔法纵火。

original: As you enter the room,[p/] Commander White approaches you.
translation: 进入房间后，[p/]怀特指挥官走了过来。

original: He seems to be accompanied by the typical legion of knights.
translation: 他身边跟着惯例的骑士军团。

original: Tyrion: Commander White.
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官。

original: Orym: Hey, kid.
translation: Orym: 哟，小子。

original: Orym: You investigating what happened too?
translation: Orym: 你也来调查事件？

original: Tyrion: Something like that.
translation: Tyrion: 差不多吧。

original: Tyrion: We just want to figure out what really happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我们只是想搞清真正经过。

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] You and me both.
translation: Orym: Hmph...[p/]同感同感。

original: Orym: [i]Nothing[/i] about this case makes any damned sense.
translation: Orym: 这案子[i]全都[/i]天杀的不可理喻。

original: Orym: I'll be honest...[p/] I could really use your help in trying to figure this out.
translation: Orym: 跟你说实话……[p/]我需要你帮忙解开谜团。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Honestly,[p/] you're not sure [i]who[/i] you can trust at this point.
translation: 老实讲，[p/]你不确定现在能相信[i]谁[/i]。

original: But the commander [i]is[/i] leading the investigation.
translation: 但带头调查的[i]是[/i]指挥官。

original: And he's bound to have information that will be useful to you.
translation: 他手里也肯定有对你有用的信息。

original: You think you've found everything you can relating to von Sanctus's murder.
translation: 应该已经找全了所有冯·桑克图斯事件相关的线索了。

original: Perhaps you should MOVE somewhere else.
translation: 你应该<size=1.5em>移动</size>到其他地方。

original: Tyrion: If we look at this map,[p/] we can see where the Prayer Room and the Common Room are.
translation: Tyrion: 这张地图上，[p/]祷告室和公共休息室的位置都有标示。

original: Tyrion: Lady Sibyl's body was found in the lake west of here.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔小姐的尸体就在西边的湖中发现。

original: Tyrion: But since the Grand Cathedral was built on a cliff,[p/] there isn't an easy way to get there in such a short amount of time.
translation: Tyrion: 由于大教堂建立于悬崖之上，[p/]短时间内到达会很难。

original: Tyrion: So that raises my next question.
translation: Tyrion: 这就要说到下一个问题。

original: No...[p/] Right now,[p/] we're concerned with how Lady Sibyl's body ended up in the lake that's west of the cathedral.
translation: 不……[p/]目前要注意的是，[p/]希比尔小姐的尸体怎么跑到大教堂西边的湖里去的。

original: The murderer couldn't have dragged her body there in such a short amount of time.
translation: 凶手不可能这么短时间内把她的尸体拖过去。

original: But there's a far simpler explanation.
translation: 但还有更简单的解释。

original: Tyrion: The Grand Cathedral was built on a cliff over the lake.
translation: Tyrion: 大教堂位于湖边的悬崖上。

original: Tyrion: And the west-ward balcony just happens to be right over it.
translation: Tyrion: 西侧阳台刚好就在湖正上方。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] I guess that makes sense.
translation: Orym: 确实……[p/]你说的有道理。

original: Orym: We even have a witness who saw Steelwind there.
translation: Orym: 我们还有目击证人看到斯蒂尔文德在场。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] Who was it?
translation: Tyrion: 真的？[p/]是谁？

original: Orym: It was High Speaker Theon Archeus.
translation: Orym: 大主教希恩·阿契厄斯。

original: Tyrion: "High Speaker"?
translation: Tyrion: “大主教”？

original: Orym: He's the shot-caller of the Church of Bahamut.
translation: Orym: 巴哈姆特教堂的头头。

original: Orym: And he stands at the top of the religious hierarchy from what I hear.
translation: Orym: 我听说他也是身居宗教最高点的人。

original: Orym: He spotted Steelwind near the west balcony and noticed that she was acting suspiciously.
translation: Orym: 他看到斯蒂尔文德站在西侧阳台上，举止怪异。

original: Orym: He called out to her,[p/] but she ignored him.
translation: Orym: 他出声喊了她，[p/]但被无视了。

original: Tyrion: So she [i]knew[/i] that he saw her...[p/] But she didn't attack him?
translation: Tyrion: 就是说她[i]知道[/i]被人看见了……[p/]可她没有攻击？

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] He really lucked out.
translation: Orym: 是……[p/]真的走运。

original: Tyrion: But if she was having a psychotic episode,[p/] he would have noticed that...
translation: Tyrion: 但她不是疾病发作吗，[p/]他应该能注意到……

original: Tyrion: From what you said,[p/] all she did was ignore him.
translation: Tyrion: 听你的说法，[p/]她做的只有无视对方。

original: Orym: You're right...[p/] This whole "Mageblight" story doesn't really add up.
translation: Orym: 对的……[p/]所以和“法师之疫”的说法对不上号。

original: Tyrion: Either way,[p/] we'll just have to talk to him directly to find out more.
translation: Tyrion: 不管怎样，[p/]我们得和他直接谈谈。

original: Tyrion: Putting that aside,[p/] there's something else that's strange.
translation: Tyrion: 先不说这个，[p/]还有其他奇怪的事。

original: Celeste: ...What's that?
translation: Celeste: ……你是指？

original: Tyrion: It's about the [i]order[/i] that the murders occurred in.
translation: Tyrion: 问题是案件发生的<u>顺序</u>。

original: Tyrion: The murderer killed von Sanctus,[p/] Sibyl,[p/] and Pierce.[p/] In that order.
translation: Tyrion: 凶手按顺序杀害了冯·桑克图斯，[p/]希比尔，[p/]皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: This means that the murderer went to the Common Room,[p/] then the West Balcony,[p/] and then finally the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说，凶手先去了公共休息室，[p/]再去了西侧阳台，[p/]最后才去祷告室。

original: Tyrion: But if we look at the map,[p/] the murderer's route seems a bit strange.
translation: Tyrion: 但从地图来看，[p/]这种顺序有点奇怪。

original: No...[p/] There's a clear route between each of the rooms.
translation: 不……[p/]有一条简单明了的路线可以连接每个房间。

original: The murderer would have traveled to the Common Room,[p/] then the Balcony,[p/] then the Prayer Room.
translation: 凶手要先去公共休息室，[p/]再去西侧阳台，[p/]最后去祷告室。

original: But there's clearly a more direct path they could have taken if they wanted to murder the three victims quickly.
translation: 但如果凶手想更快杀害三人，还有一条更简单直接的路线。

original: Tyrion: The murderer must have passed right by the Prayer Room before they dumped Sibyl's body.
translation: Tyrion: 丢弃希比尔的尸体前，凶手肯定经过了祷告室。

original: Tyrion: Why wouldn't they just murder Pierce on the way there?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么他们没有顺便杀害皮尔斯？

original: Orym: Maybe they wanted to dump Sibyl's body first.
translation: Orym: 可能他们想先丢弃希比尔的尸体。

original: Celeste: ...Or they were afraid of fighting me.
translation: Celeste: ……也可能只是害怕对上我。

original: Orym: ...Aren't you giving yourself a little too much credit?
translation: Orym: ……你怎么这么自信啊。

original: Tyrion: No.[p/] She has a point.
translation: Tyrion: 不。[p/]她说的有理。

original: Tyrion: Out of everyone who fought the murderer,[p/] Celeste was the only one who didn't die or fall comatose.
translation: Tyrion: 和凶手搏斗过的所有人里，[p/]塞莱斯特是唯一没有昏迷也没有死亡的。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] there [i]has[/i] to be a reason why the murderer deliberately chose that route.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]凶手选择这条路线[i]肯定有[/i]他的理由。

original: Okay...[p/] You've created a rough outline of the murderer's actions.
translation: 好了……[p/]你大致推测出了凶手的行动。

original: But the real clues will lie in how each of the individual murders occurred.
translation: 但要找出真正的线索，还得继续追查每起案件如何发生。

original: ...And that starts with figuring out how von Sanctus was murdered.
translation: ……先从冯·桑克图斯的谋杀细节开始。

original: Tyrion: The sunlight is shining through this glass window.
translation: Tyrion: 一束阳光正从玻璃窗照射进来。

original: Tyrion: An ornate candle rests on an altar here.
translation: Tyrion: 祭坛上有个华丽的蜡烛。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] It looks like it's made out of pure gold.
translation: Celeste: 哇噻……[p/]好像是纯金做的。

original: Tyrion: A ceramic altar is at the end of this room.
translation: Tyrion: 房间尽头有个陶瓷祭坛

original: Tyrion: So [i]you're[/i] the leader of House Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: [i]你就是[/i]希比尔家族的领主。

original: Tyrion: What does your family do, exactly?
translation: Tyrion: 你们家族具体都干什么呢？

original: Lloyd: How are you [i]this[/i] ignorant?
translation: Lloyd: 你怎么会无知到[i]这种地步[/i]？

original: Coraline: Each of the "Four Pillars",[p/] as you commoners call them,[p/] control different branches of the kingdom's government.
translation: Coraline: 平民称我们为“四大支柱”，[p/]每个成员家族都控制着王国政府的不同分支。

original: Coraline: House Steelwind oversees national defense and law enforcement.
translation: Coraline: 斯蒂尔文德家掌管国防与执法机关。

original: Coraline: House Frega oversees economic development and finances.
translation: Coraline: 弗雷加家负责金融与经济发展。

original: Coraline: House von Sanctus handles commerce,[p/] both local and international.
translation: Coraline: 冯·桑克图斯家负责商业，[p/]本地和国际均有。

original: Coraline: And finally,[p/] there's House Sibyl.
translation: Coraline: 最后，[p/]就是希比尔家。

original: Coraline: We handle the kingdom's legislative and judicial branches.
translation: Coraline: 我们负责王国的立法与司法机关。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: That would also mean you're responsible for our kingdom's justice system.
translation: Tyrion: 所以我国司法系统是你负责的。

original: Coraline: That is correct.
translation: Coraline: 正确。

original: Lloyd: Oh, wonderful...[p/] Here we go.
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]又来了。

original: Tyrion: Lady Sibyl...[p/] Are you [i]aware[/i] of the rampant corruption happening within [i]your[/i] justice system?
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔小姐……[p/]你有[i]意识到[/i]猖獗滋生于[i]你的[/i]司法系统里的腐败吗？

original: Coraline: I suppose it's only inevitable that you'd see it that way.
translation: Coraline:  你难免会这么看。

original: Tyrion: ...Am I wrong?[p/] I've been involved in plenty of court cases and it's [i]very[/i] obvious.
translation: Tyrion: ……我有说错吗？[p/]我经手过不少庭审了，这一点[i]非常[/i]明显。

original: Tyrion: All your courts care about is closing cases as quickly as possible.
translation: Tyrion: 法庭在乎的只有尽快结案。

original: Tyrion: The system is corrupt to its core.[p/] The courts don't even [i]try[/i] to hide it half of the time.
translation: Tyrion: 司法体系的腐败已经渗透到核心了。[p/]法庭甚至都不[i]试着[/i]隐藏这点。

original: Coraline: Yet you've prevailed against this so-called "corruption" in each and every one of your cases.
translation: Coraline: 但这“腐败”也阻挡不了你每次都胜诉啊。

original: Tyrion: Only against every conceivable odd...[p/] And I can't be everywhere.
translation: Tyrion: 每次都命悬一线……[p/]我也没法顾及所有人。

original: Tyrion: Do you have any idea how many commoners are falsely convicted every day?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道每天都有多少平民承受冤罪吗？

original: Coraline: If they are convicted under my system,[p/] it's only because the cosmic balance deems it so.
translation: Coraline: 如果是在我的体系下被定罪，[p/]肯定是因为宇宙平衡也这样认为。

original: Tyrion: ...What are you even talking about?
translation: Tyrion: ……你说的什么玩意儿？

original: Coraline: The cosmic balance is the natural order of things.
translation: Coraline: 宇宙平衡是万物的自然秩序。

original: Coraline: Under it,[p/] the guilty are punished while the innocent are protected.
translation: Coraline: 宇宙平衡之下，[p/]有罪者会被惩罚，无辜者会被保护。

original: Tyrion: ...And yet,[p/] when a [i]noble[/i] commits a crime,[p/] they only need to wave their influence to escape any consequences.
translation: Tyrion: ……然而，[p/]如果犯罪的是[i]贵族[/i]，[p/]他们只需要展示一下自己的影响力，就能逃避后果。

original: Tyrion: All while their victims are forced to suffer in silence.
translation: Tyrion: 而他们的受害者只能闭嘴受苦。

original: Tyrion: Or worse,[p/] an innocent commoner is framed for the crime.
translation: Tyrion: 这还不算，[p/]无辜的平民还会被陷害顶罪。

original: Coraline: Regardless of your personal feelings,[p/] our kingdom [i]needs[/i] the nobility to govern the people.
translation: Coraline: 不管你的个人感受如何，[p/]我国[i]需要[/i]贵族来治理人民。

original: Coraline: If they were held to the same standards as commoners,[p/] our society would surely collapse.
translation: Coraline: 如果贵族和平民的对待标准相同，[p/]我们的社会肯定要崩坏的。

original: ...You take back what you said about her being the most agreeable of the Four Pillars.
translation: ……现在你不觉得她是四大支柱家族里最和善的了。

original: Tyrion: So you think nobles like Pierce and von Sanctus should just be [i]allowed[/i] to get away with murder?!
translation: Tyrion: 你觉得皮尔斯和冯·桑克图斯这种贵族就可以[i]被允许[/i]谋杀别人？！

original: Lloyd: Are you still sore about that?[p/] I'm sure you realized it by now.
translation: Lloyd: 你怎么还计较这个啊？[p/]事到如今也该懂了吧。

original: Lloyd: I've [i]more[/i] than paid for what happened with Jason Wynne.
translation: Lloyd: 我可已经为了杰森·维耶的事补偿[i]很多[/i]了。

original: Celeste: His name was "Justin Waye"!
translation: Celeste: 他的名字是“贾斯汀·维耶”！

original: Tyrion: ...And if you were truly paying for your crimes,[p/] you would be in prison right now.
translation: Tyrion: ……你要是真的在赎罪，[p/]现在就该在监狱里。

original: Coraline: Von Sanctus made a...[p/] mistake.[p/] But removing him from his position would only create more suffering.
translation: Coraline: 冯·桑克图斯犯了个……[p/]错误。[p/]但直接把他调离岗位只会造成更多灾难。

original: Coraline: Our government is barely recovering from the death of William Frega.
translation: Coraline: 我们的政府还没从威廉·弗雷加离世的打击里恢复过来。

original: Coraline: Wyverngarde can't suffer the loss of another House leader this close to that.
translation: Coraline: 维文加德不能再失去另一个家族的领主了。

original: Tyrion: The way I see it,[p/] I think you nobles overstate your importance in our lives.
translation: Tyrion: 照我看，[p/]你们这帮贵族把自己看太重了。

original: Tyrion: ...We'd probably be fine without you.
translation: Tyrion: ……没了你们，我们平民过得一样好。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] And I suppose you commoners are capable of coordinating macroeconomic initiatives.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]你们平民也会协调宏观经济行动？

original: Lloyd: Oh,[p/] and I suppose you're [i]also[/i] capable of engaging in diplomacy with the other nations.
translation: Lloyd: 喔，[p/]是不是[i]也会[/i]和他国外交啊？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Lloyd: Face it.[p/] As much as you are loathe to admit it,[p/] ours is a symbiotic relationship.
translation: Lloyd: 面对现实吧。[p/]就算你不情愿承认，[p/]贵族和平民也是共生关系。

original: Celeste: More like a [i]parasitic[/i] relationship.
translation: Celeste: 更像是[i]寄生[/i]关系。

original: Tyrion: So what?![p/][s/] The commonfolk should just [i]continue[/i] to suffer for the "good" of our nation?!
translation: Tyrion: 所以呢？！[p/][s/]普通人就该为了王国好而[i]继续[/i]受苦？！

original: Tyrion: Lady Sibyl...[p/] The people of the kingdom you [i]claim[/i] to be protecting are suffering because of your inaction.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔小姐……[p/]你[i]自称[/i]在保护这个王国的人，他们实际却因你的不作为而遭难。

original: Coraline: [i]My[/i] inaction?[p/] You place the blame on me.[p/] But what have [i]you[/i] done?
translation: Coraline: [i]我[/i]不作为？[p/]把责任甩给我。[p/]那[i]你[/i]又做了什么？

original: Coraline: You were once a champion of your so-called "justice",[p/] but you've stopped your work as a defense attorney.
translation: Coraline: 你曾经也在弘扬自己的“正义”，[p/]现在却不当辩护律师了。

original: Coraline: How many lives could you have saved in the month that you spent on vacation?
translation: Coraline: 你这个月不休假的话，能挽救多少人的性命？

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Celeste: It's not [s/][i]his[/i] responsibility to solve [s/][i]your[/i] mess.
translation: Celeste: [s/][i]他的[/i]责任不是打扫[s/][i]你的[/i]烂摊子。

original: Celeste: You have no idea how much he's suffered trying to do the right thing...
translation: Celeste: 你根本不知道为了做正确的事，他都经历过什么……

original: Tyrion: Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……

original: Coraline: Perhaps you're right.[p/] He shouldn't bear that kind of responsibility alone.
translation: Coraline: 你可能没错。[p/]这不是他该自己承担的责任。

original: Coraline: But every commoner has the ability to learn and practice law as you do, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Coraline: 但平民们明明都可以像卡斯伯特先生一样，学习法律，参加工作。

original: Coraline: So why are [i]you[/i] one the few commoners that do so?
translation: Coraline: 为什么只有[i]你[/i]和少数平民这么做了？

original: Coraline: From what I've heard,[p/] you're one of the few people who defend mages of the commonfolk.
translation: Coraline: 根据我的了解，[p/]你是为数不多为平民法师辩护的人。

original: Coraline: Every other attorney wouldn't even consider taking them as clients.
translation: Coraline: 其他所有律师都不会考虑接收这种委托人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Coraline: Perhaps the problem lies in the commonfolk, then.
translation: Coraline: 那问题可能就出在平民了。

original: Coraline: They are fully capable of rising to defend the so-called "innocent",[p/] yet they do nothing.
translation: Coraline: 他们完全有能力替这些所谓的“无辜者”辩护，[p/]但他们什么都没做。

original: Coraline: Tyrion Cuthbert...[p/] It appears we were fated to meet.
translation: Coraline: 提利昂·卡斯伯特……[p/]我们似乎注定相遇。

original: Tyrion: I mean...[p/] It was [i]bound[/i] to happen eventually.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/][i]不可避免[/i]会这样。

original: Tyrion: My business tends to step on the toes of the Four Pillars.
translation: Tyrion: 我的辩护工作经常跟四大支柱过不去。

original: Coraline: I concur.[p/] Our souls were drawn together by the cosmic balance.
translation: Coraline: 我有同感。[p/]我们的灵魂是被宇宙平衡引导至一起的。

original: Celeste: Is she hitting on you?
translation: Celeste: 她在泡你？

original: Tyrion: ...I have no idea.
translation: Theon: ……不懂。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Lady Sibyl?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么看，希比尔小姐？

original: Coraline: Hm...[p/] It is not my role to speak of such things.
translation: Coraline: 嗯……[p/]我的立场不适合说这些。

original: In other words,[p/] she has nothing to say about that...
translation: 也就是说，[p/]她什么都不知道……

original: Lloyd: Oh, what are [i]you[/i] doing here?!
translation: Lloyd: 啊，[i]你[/i]在这儿干什么？！

original: Lloyd: Did you follow us?!
translation: Lloyd: 你跟踪我们？！

original: Celeste: ...Not [i]intentionally[/i].
translation: Celeste: ……不是[i]故意[/i]的。

original: Tyrion: Trust me...[p/] You're the [i]last[/i] person we wanted to see today.
translation: Tyrion: 相信我……[p/]今天我们[i]最[/i]不想看见的就是你。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...
translation: Lloyd: 哼……

original: Coraline: Hush now, von Sanctus.
translation: Coraline: 安静，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Coraline: If they are here by chance,[p/] it is because the cosmic balance wills it so.
translation: Coraline: 他们来到这里，[p/]也只是宇宙平衡使然。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] Not [i]this[/i] again.
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]不要再提[i]这个[/i]了。

original: Tyrion: Sorry...[p/] I don't think we've met.
translation: Tyrion: 不好意思……[p/]我们应该是初次见面。

original: Coraline: I am Coraline Sibyl:[p/] Lady of the House of Sibyl.
translation: Coraline: 我叫卡洛琳·希比尔，希比尔家的领主。

original: So [i]this[/i] is the head of the fourth Pillar Family.
translation: [i]她[/i]就是四大支柱家族的领主。

original: She's not quite what you were expecting.
translation: 她和你预想的不太一样。

original: ...Between her,[p/] Lucio,[p/] Lloyd,[p/] and William,[p/] [i]she[/i] definitely seems the most agreeable.
translation: 她、卢西奥、洛伊德和威廉四人里，她看起来最和善可亲。

original: For better or worse,[p/] you've gotten to know the other Pillar Families decently well.
translation: 无论好坏，[p/]你与其他家族都相当熟悉了。

original: It might benefit you to learn more about her.
translation: 多了解关于她的事可能也有好处。

original: Tyrion: Never mind...[p/] This was clearly a mistake.
translation: Tyrion: 别管了……[p/]真是个大错误。

original: Tyrion: Let's go, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 我们走，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 好……

original: Lloyd: Finally.[p/] Thank the Scaled Lord...
translation: Lloyd: 终于。[p/]感谢鳞甲领主……

original: Celeste: ...You okay?
translation: Celeste: ……你没事吧？

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] I guess I should have expected that.
translation: Tyrion: 没事。[p/]我也该想到的。

original: Tyrion: But I never expected someone with so much power to be so out of touch with reality.
translation: Tyrion: 我没料到，这么有权力的人，和现实能这么脱轨。

original: Celeste: Come on.[p/] Let's go somewhere else.[p/] We still have some time before the meeting.
translation: Celeste: 走吧。[p/]我们去其他地方。[p/]会面前还有时间呢。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Celeste: We're definitely lost.
translation: Celeste: 我们这绝对迷路了。

original: You followed Lord Steelwind's directions to the letter.
translation: 你照着斯蒂尔文德勋爵信里的指示走。

original: ...But it appears you've found yourself in the ruins of an old city rather than the estate of the archduke.
translation: ……但最终到达的不是大公爵的房产，而是旧城废墟一样的地方。

original: Tyrion: I don't understand...[p/] This [i]should[/i] be the place.
translation: Tyrion: 我搞不懂……[p/]这里[i]应该[/i]就是目的地了。

original: Tyrion: The map even has that giant tree north of here.
translation: Tyrion: 地图上甚至画了北边那颗庞然大树。

original: Celeste: This [i]can't[/i] be the city of Ladon that Virgilae mentioned.
translation: Celeste: 这[i]不可能[/i]是维吉莱说的雷登城。

original: Celeste: It doesn't look like [i]anyone's[/i] lived here in centuries.
translation: Celeste: 看起来好几个世纪[i]没人[/i]住过了。

original: Tyrion: But Lord Steelwind's directions were pretty straightforward...[p/] So why are we-...?
translation: Tyrion: 但斯蒂尔文德勋爵信里的指示直截了当……[p/]我们怎么……？

original: Tyrion: Wait a minute...
translation: Tyrion: 等下……

original: Celeste: ...Did he give us the wrong location on [i]purpose[/i]?!
translation: Celeste: 他[i]故意[/i]给我们错误地点？！

original: Lucio: Please.[p/] What kind of dishonorable cretin do you take me for?
translation: 卢西奥：拜托。[p/]你们把我当成什么不端小人了？

original: Tyrion: Lord Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵。

original: Lucio: What are you two standing around here for?[p/] The trial will be starting shortly.
translation: Lucio: 傻站在这里干什么？[p/]审判就快开始了。

original: He's not alone either.[p/] He's flanked by a division of the Kingsguard and Aria.
translation: 他不是一个人。[p/]还带了一整队国王卫队和阿莉亚。

original: But it's difficult to tell if they're escorting her or keeping watch over her.
translation: 说不好这些卫兵是在护送阿莉亚，还是在监视她。

original: You can see one of the knights channeling a spell over Aria.
translation: 能看到骑士中的一人在对阿莉亚施法。

original: It must be an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: 肯定是[b]抗魔力场[/b]。

original: Even now,[p/] she must still be wary about someone taking control of her mind.
translation: 即使现在，[p/]她也在提防别人操控意识。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] [i]This[/i] is where we'll be hosting the trial?
translation: Tyrion: 不是……我们就在[p/][i]这里[/i]审理？

original: Lucio: Yes.[p/] The "archduke" has always been sentimental about this place.
translation: Lucio: 对。[p/]“大公爵”对这里很有感情。

original: Lucio: And I doubt a normal courtroom would have enough...[p/] space.
translation: Lucio: 我也不觉得普通的法庭……[p/]空间足够。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……啥？

original: Lucio: I really don't know [i]what[/i] possessed him to trust you.
translation: Lucio: 我真不知道他是被[i]什么[/i]脑控了才相信你。

original: Lucio: It's a miracle he's even taking part in this at all.
translation: Lucio: 他会参加都是奇迹了。

original: Lucio: ...But nevertheless,[p/] let's not keep him waiting.
translation: Lucio: ……不论如何，[p/]我们还是不要让他久等。

original: Before you can ask him to elaborate,[p/] he walks past you and heads towards one of the central buildings.
translation: 在你来得及要求他展开说明之前，[p/]他就向着中央的建筑物走去。

original: It's completely dilapidated.[p/] You're a little worried it might collapse on you while you're in it.
translation: 建筑物残破不堪。[p/]你有点担心自己还在里面的时候，它会突然坍塌。

original: You look at the prosecutor and raise an eyebrow at her.
translation: 你看向检察官，对她挑起一边眉毛。

original: But she merely shakes her head.[p/] It's clear she's just as lost as you are.
translation: 但她只是摇了摇头。[p/]看起来她也不清楚怎么回事。

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] I guess we're doing this.
translation: Tyrion: 行吧……[p/]只能硬着头皮上了。

original: The ruins are filled with everyone who was at the Grand Cathedral that day.
translation: 废墟里满是事发当天也在大教堂的人。

original: And they all seem to be just as out of the loop as you are.
translation: 他们和你一样困惑。

original: The only person who seems to be unfazed by this entire situation is Lord Steelwind.
translation: 唯一不受目前状况影响的就是斯蒂尔文德勋爵。

original: He's taken his position at the opposite end of the room.
translation: 他在房间另一侧站定。

original: It seems that he truly plans on prosecuting his daughter.
translation: 看来他真的打算起诉自己的女儿。

original: Remus: Thank you all for coming here today.
translation: Remus: 谢谢各位今天到场。

original: Remus: I appreciate your cooperation with our investigation.
translation: Remus: 我诚恳感谢你们配合调查。

original: Gallery: Why have you brought us here?!
translation: Gallery: 为什么让我们来这里？！

original: Gallery: This place is [i]filthy[/i]![p/][s/] It's crawling with insects and vermin!
translation: Gallery: 这地方真是[i]肮脏[/i]！[p/][s/]到处都是害虫老鼠！

original: Remus: My apologies.[p/] But what happens here today must be kept under wraps for now.
translation: Remus: 我很抱歉。[p/]但今天在这里发生的事必须保密。

original: Remus: I had to choose a location that was away from modern civilization.
translation: Remus: 我必须选择远离现代文明的地点。

original: Remus: But nevertheless...[p/] I welcome you all to my home.
translation: Remus: 不管如何……[p/]欢迎你们来到我家。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] You [i]live[/i] here?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]你[i]住在[/i]这里？！

original: Remus: I do...
translation: Remus: 没错……

original: Lucio: ...Your Grace.[p/] I know you wouldn't bring us here unless you were completely certain.
translation: Lucio: ……殿下。[p/]我知道除非有万分把握，你不会带我们来这儿。

original: Lucio: But I want to ask you one last time...[p/] Is this truly what you wish to do?
translation: Lucio: 但以防万一，还是让我提问一下……[p/]你真的想这么做吗？

original: Lucio: There will be no going back after this.
translation: Lucio: 之后就没有回头路了。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Remus: I've made many mistakes in my lifetime...
translation: Remus: 我一生犯了许多错误……

original: Remus: I gave Wyverngarde the means to protect themselves.[p/] But all it did was warp them into something monstrous.
translation: Remus: 我给了维文加德自保的手段。[p/]但这一切只让他们被卷入可怕的事里。

original: Remus: I grew bitter seeing what I'd created...[p/] So I isolated myself from my people.
translation: Remus: 我所创造的东西也让我苦涩……[p/]所以我把自己和自己的人民分隔开来。

original: Remus: I thought my best course of action would be to stay in seclusion and leave Wyverngarde to fend for themselves.
translation: Remus: 我本以为最好的做法就是远离尘世，让维文加德保护自己。

original: Remus: ...I see now what a fool I was.
translation: Remus: ……现在我明白自己有多愚蠢。

original: Remus: I abandoned my kin to survive in an unjust world.
translation: Remus: 我把自己的血肉抛弃在一个不公的世界。

original: Remus: And now foreign powers have ingrained themselves in [i]my[/i] kingdom.
translation: Remus: 现在外界的魔爪伸进了[i]我的[/i]国度。

original: Remus: All because of my negligence.
translation: Remus: 全都只因我的疏忽。

original: "Foreign powers"...?
translation: “外界的魔爪”……？

original: Does he [i]still[/i] suspect that you're an agent of the Theocracy?
translation: 难道他[i]还在[/i]还在怀疑你是神权的特工？

original: Remus: Well, no more.
translation: Remus: 不会再有了。

original: Remus: It's time that the people of Wyverngarde [i]and[/i] their enemies remember [i]who[/i] watches over them.
translation: Remus: 维文加德的人民，他们的敌人都是时候回忆起，是谁在看顾他们。

original: As he raises his hand,[p/] magic begins to swirl around him.
translation: 随着他举起自己的手，[p/]魔力开始缠绕周身。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What's going on?!
translation: Tyrion: 出、[p/][s/]出什么事了？！

original: The entire room is violently shaking.
translation: 整个房间都开始剧烈震动。

original: Whatever he's casting,[p/] it's unlike any magic you've ever seen before.
translation: 不管他施的什么法，[p/]都是你从未见过的法术。

original: A blinding light envelops him.[p/] But you can faintly see his form changing.
translation: 耀眼的光芒笼罩了他。[p/]但你还是可以勉强看到他在变化。

original: It's...[p/] expanding.[p/] And from it-
translation: 他在……[p/]变大。[p/]然后——

original: Wait...[p/][s/] Is that-?!
Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不会吧？！

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]It's a dragon!
translation: Celeste: 龙、[p/][s/]是龙！

original: As the Archduke assumes his true form,[p/] the gallery breaks out into hysteria.
translation: 大公爵现出真身，[p/]旁听席也歇斯底里起来。

original: Some of them kneel in reverence to the ancient dragon.[p/] And some of them cower in absolute terror.
translation: 有的人因对古龙的敬畏双膝跪地。[p/]有的则因恐惧躲避起来。

original: You even see some of them attempt to flee before they're stopped by the knights of the Kingsguard.
translation: 你甚至能看到有人试图逃跑，但被国王卫队的骑士拦住了。

original: Rath: Enough!
translation: Rath: 够了！

original: Rath: This may not be a court,[p/] [i]but[/i] I will have order!
translation: Rath: 可能这里不是法庭，[p/][i]但是[/i]我要你们肃静！

original: Tyrion: ...You're an ancient dragon...
translation: Tyrion: ……你是条古龙……

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] You're the [i]last[/i] ancient dragon.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]你是[i]最后的[/i]古龙。

original: Rath: ...That is correct, heavensborn.[p/] I am the Lord of all Lords.
translation: Rath: ……没错，天诞之物。[p/]我是万王之王。

original: Rath: You all stand before Rathallion:[p/] the Scaled Lord.
translation: Rath: 你们面前的是拉萨利昂，[p/]鳞甲领主。

original: Rath: "Remus Virgilae" is an alias I assume when I walk amongst your kind.
translation: Rath: “雷穆斯·维吉莱”只是我在你们之间用的别名。

original: Rath: But make no mistake...[p/] Even in my human form,[p/] I have [i]always[/i] had the strength of an ancient dragon.
translation: Rath: 但不要误会……[p/]即使是人类形态，[p/]我也[i]一直[/i]拥有古龙的力量。

original: Rath: Until now,[p/] only the Lords of House Steelwind and the Kings of Wyverngarde have known my true identity.
translation: Rath: 直到刚才，[p/]只有斯蒂尔文德家历代领主和维文加德历任国王知道我的真实身份。

original: Rath: But I will hide no longer.
translation: Rath: 但我不会再藏下去了。

original: Rath: My will alone will determine how this trial ends.
translation: Rath: 仅有我的意愿能左右审判结局。

original: TYRION: I wonder if Rathallion is still alive,[p/] like you said.
translation: TYRION: 不知道是不是如你所言，拉萨利昂还活着。

original: ERIS: I wouldn’t be surprised.
translation: ERIS: 是的话我也不意外。

original: Eris: Despite everything,[p/] our kingdom’s constitution still includes him in our government.
translation: Eris: 虽然发生了这么多，[p/]我国宪法依然把他包括在政府里。

original: TYRION: Wait…[p/] Really?
translation: TYRION: 不是……[p/]说真的？

original: ERIS: As the savior of our kingdom,[p/] he was given an honorary position on our political hierarchy.
translation: ERIS: 作为王国的救世主，[p/]他在政界有个荣誉职位。

original: ERIS: His authority technically rivals that of the king.
translation: ERIS: 他的威权能匹敌国王。

original: Tyrion: So [i]that's[/i] why you're acting as the arbiter.
translation: Tyrion: 所以你才会扮演仲裁者。

original: Tyrion: You're the only person with the authority to convict [i]any[/i] and all of the nobles here.
translation: Tyrion: 你是唯一一个有权起诉这里[i]任何[/i]贵族的人。

original: Rath: ...Make no mistake, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Rath: ……不要误会，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Rath: I will remain impartial regardless of what transpires here.
translation: Rath: 不管发生什么，我都会秉公执法。

original: Rath: I will not interfere in this trial nor will I try to manipulate its outcome.
translation: Rath: 我不会介入审判，也不会试图操纵结果。

original: Rath: I will only mediate its proceedings.
translation: Rath: 我只负责调节进程。

original: Rath: ...And pass judgment when necessary.
translation: Rath: ……并在必要时下达判决。

original: Well, [i]that's[/i] certainly terrifying...
translation: 哎呀，[i]这[/i]有点吓人了……

original: Rath: Now, then.[p/] With introductions out of the way,[p/] shall we proceed?
translation: Rath: 那么。[p/]既然昨晚介绍了，[p/]就继续审理吧。

original: Lucio: Of course, Your Grace.
translation: Lucio: 遵命，巨龙殿下。

original: Lucio: The prosecution is ready.
translation: Lucio: 检方已准备就绪。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: The defense is also ready.
translation: Tyrion: 辩方也准备完毕。

original: Rath: I'm sure we're all [i]thoroughly[/i] aware of why we've gathered here.
translation: Rath: 相信我们都[i]清楚[/i]大家齐聚于此的理由。

original: Rath: But for the sake of doing this properly,[p/] could you please list the charges, Lucio?
translation: Rath: 就当走个程序，[p/]卢西奥，能拜托你列出指控吗？

original: Lucio: ...Of course.
translation: Lucio: ……遵命。

original: Lucio: The defendant:[p/] Aria Steelwind,[p/] is charged with several counts of manslaughter.
translation: Lucio: 被告人，[p/]阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德，[p/]被控多项过失杀人罪。

original: Lucio: Her victims include many knights from the Kingsguard who are still unresponsive.
translation: Lucio: 她的受害者里还包括不少仍在昏迷之中的国王卫队骑士。

original: Lucio: And of course,[p/] there's Lloyd von Sanctus and Coraline Sibyl:[p/] the heads of House von Sanctus and House Sibyl respectively.
translation: Lucio: 最重要的还属洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯和卡洛琳·希比尔，[p/]两人都是各自家族的领主。

original: Gallery: ...What is this farce?
translation: Gallery: ……搞什么鬼？

original: Gallery: This trial has been over before it began.
translation: Gallery: 这案子已经可以结了。

original: Gallery: Lady Steelwind clearly overestimated herself.[p/] Even a [i]child[/i] knows to be wary of Mageblight.
translation: Gallery: 斯蒂尔文德女士太高估自己了。[p/]就连[i]小屁孩[/i]都知道要注意法师之疫。

original: Gallery: ...No![p/][s/] Don't you see?!
translation: Gallery: ……闭嘴！[p/][s/]你这就忘了？！

original: Gallery: [i]This[/i] is Bahamut's judgment!
translation: Gallery: 判决是[i]巴哈姆特[/i]决定的！

original: Gallery: The divine powers that be [i]clearly[/i] think she is unfit to rule at the king's side!
translation: Gallery: 神圣之力[i]明显[/i]认为她不适合与国王一同理政！

original: Tyrion: ...Might I remind the court of my [i]own[/i] testimony?
translation: Tyrion: ……可以允许我重新强调[i]我自己[/i]的证言吗？

original: Tyrion: I [i]witnessed[/i] Beatrice Frega enter the Prayer Room before I lost consciousness.
translation: Tyrion: 失去意识前，我[i]亲眼看到[/i]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加进入了祷告室。

original: Tyrion: Isn't it suspicious that this occurred around fifteen minutes [i]before[/i] Pierce's death?
translation: Tyrion: 仅仅十五分钟[i]之后[/i]，皮尔斯就被杀了。这难道不可疑？

original: Lucio: If I recall correctly,[p/] you only caught a glimpse of her.
translation: Lucio: 我没记错的话，[p/]你只是瞥到她一眼。

original: Lucio: You don't know if it was someone [i]else[/i] disguised in an illusion.
translation: Lucio: 你也不确定是不是用幻象伪装自己的[i]其他人[/i]。

original: Lucio: You didn't even speak to her.
translation: Lucio: 你都没和她说话。

original: Tyrion: That's all the more reason to call her to the stand to explain herself.
translation: Tyrion: 那我们更有理由让她站上证人席辩解了。

original: Lucio: She has already testified that she has no memories of what transpired during the massacre.
translation: Lucio: 她已经作证说自己没有屠杀期间的记忆。

original: Lucio:  ...There is no need to drag this out any longer than necessary, Cuthbert!
translation: Lucio: ……没必要再拖延时间了，卡斯伯特！

original: Tyrion: My client [i]has[/i] a right to a fair trial!
translation: Tyrion: 我的委托人[i]应有[/i]公平受审的权利！

original: Tyrion: And Beatrice Frega's involvement clearly implies [i]some[/i] sort of foul play!
translation: Tyrion: 牵扯比亚特丽丝·弗雷加也暗示了罪行存在的可能！

original: Rath: Enough.[p/] I find Mr. Cuthbert's request to be reasonable.
translation: Rath: 够了。[p/]卡斯伯特先生的要求合情合理。

original: Rath: And I agree that Lady Frega's actions are quite suspect.
translation: Rath: 我也认为弗雷加女士的行为可疑。

original: Lucio: Hmph...
translation: Lucio: 哼……

original: Lucio: Very well.[p/] Let the defense have his battle.
translation: Lucio: 明白了。[p/]辩方尽情挣扎吧。

original: Lucio: I only hope for his sake that his blade strikes true.
translation: Lucio: 希望你的剑刃攻击精准。

original: Tyrion: ...Why is everything a war metaphor with you?
translation: Tyrion: ……你只会用战争打比方吗？

original: Tyrion: Beatrice...
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝……

original: MBeatrice: ...I'm glad you're safe, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: MBeatrice: ……很高兴你没事，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: Not for lack of trying on your part...
translation: Tyrion: “多亏”了你的努力……

original: MBeatrice: T-[p/][s/]That wasn't
translation: MBeatrice: 不、[p/][s/]不是……

original: MBeatrice: I have no memories of what I did.
translation: MBeatrice: 我完全不记得做了什么。

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: MBeatrice: If I hurt you,[p/] I [i]am[/i] truly sorry.
translation: MBeatrice: 如果是我伤了你，[p/]我[i]真的[/i]很抱歉。

original: She actually looks pretty sincere.[p/] But it's not as if this is the first time she's lied to you.
translation: 她看起来挺真挚的。[p/]但她不是没有撒谎的前科。

original: Tyrion: To be honest,[p/] I'm still a little doubtful about your "memory loss".
translation: Tyrion: 说实话，[p/]我还是不太相信你“失忆”了。

original: MBeatrice: But I'm not the only one who experienced it.
translation: MBeatrice: 但我不是唯一一个人。

original: MBeatrice: Aria [i]also[/i] has no memories of what happened.
translation: MBeatrice: 阿莉亚[i]同样[/i]失去了相关记忆。

original: Lucio: ...And how would you know that?
translation: Lucio: ……你怎么知道？

original: MBeatrice: ...Word travels around quickly in the dungeons.
translation: MBeatrice: ……地牢里消息灵通。

original: Lucio: ...What?
translation: Lucio: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: Regardless.[p/] If you truly have no memories of what happened,[p/] could you testify about what you [i]do[/i] remember?
translation: Tyrion: 先不管这个。[p/]就当你真的失忆了，[p/]能不能就你还记得的事情作证？

original: Tyrion: Perhaps there's a clue there we haven't discovered yet.
translation: Tyrion: 其中可能还有我们尚未发现的线索。

original: MBeatrice: ...Very well.
translation: MBeatrice: ……明白了。

original: MBeatrice: I was with my sisters and my...[p/] guide,[p/] Eris Illmater.
translation: MBeatrice: 我当时和妹妹们以及……[p/]向导，[p/]厄莉斯·伊尔马特在一起。

original: MBeatrice: I was speaking with them in the garden,[p/] when I suddenly felt ill and lost consciousness.
translation: MBeatrice: 我们在花园里交谈，[p/]然后我突然感觉不适，失去了意识。

original: MBeatrice: When I woke up,[p/] my sisters found me.[p/] They said that I had gone missing for over an hour.
translation: MBeatrice: 醒来以后，[p/]妹妹们找到了我。[p/]她们说我失踪超过一小时了。

original: MBeatrice: I was confused.[p/] But when I later heard what happened,[p/] I realized that someone must have taken control of my body.
translation: MBeatrice: 我很困惑。[p/]但我之后听说了发生的事，[p/]也意识到有人操控了我的身体。

original: MBeatrice: I have no memories of what happened.[p/] And from what I understand,[p/] the same thing happened to Aria.
translation: MBeatrice: 我不记得发生了什么。[p/]阿莉亚似乎也有相同遭遇。

original: MBeatrice: And to make matters worse,[p/] there's [i]nothing[/i] that indicates who may have controlled our actions.
translation: MBeatrice: 更麻烦的是，[p/][i]没有[/i]任何线索指明存在幕后黑手。

original: So she's [i]also[/i] saying that someone else was controlling her...
translation: 所以她[i]也[/i]觉得自己被人操控了……

original: Well...[p/] Her testimony [i]does[/i] match up with Aria's statement.
translation: 好吧……她的证言[i]的确[/i]和阿莉亚一致。

original: But there's something [i]off[/i] about the way she's testifying.
translation: 但她的作证方式有点[i]奇怪[/i]。

original: If she were trying to lie to you,[p/] she would have been a lot more vague.
translation: 如果是要对你撒谎，[p/]明明可以更含糊不清。

original: ...What is she doing?
translation: ……葫芦里这是卖的什么药？

original: Tyrion: ...She's been missing since the massacre happened.
translation: Tyrion: ……屠杀开始后厄莉斯就失踪了。

original: Tyrion: I really hope she's okay.
translation: Tyrion: 我希望她没事。

original: MBeatrice: Oh, make no mistake.
translation: MBeatrice: 啊，不要误会。

original: MBeatrice: She's [i]definitely[/i] okay.
translation: MBeatrice: 她[i]肯定[/i]没事。

original: Tyrion: ...What makes you so sure?
translation: Tyrion: ……你怎么这么有把握？

original: Tyrion: Do you remember [i]anything[/i] about what happened to her?
translation: Tyrion: 你记得她发生了[i]什么事[/i]？

original: MBeatrice: ...No.[p/] But it's just a feeling.
translation: MBeatrice: ……不。[p/]只是直觉。

original: Lucio: Enough of your speculation.
translation: Lucio: 不需要你的直觉。

original: Lucio: Tell us what happened next, Frega.
translation: Lucio: 告诉我们之后怎么了，弗雷加。

original: Tyrion: If they were with you,[p/] shouldn't your sisters have noticed this?
translation: Tyrion: 如果她们和你一起，[p/]妹妹们怎么没注意到？

original: Lucio: According to Laefe and Miriam,[p/] their pet dog was running amok in the hallways.
translation: Lucio: 拉菲和米莉亚姆证言称，[p/]她们的宠物狗在走廊里乱跑。

original: Lucio: They left the witness with Illmater to chase him down.
translation: Lucio: 她们为了追狗，离开了证人和伊尔马特。

original: Lucio: And when the sisters returned to the garden,[p/] both Beatrice and Illmater were gone.
translation: Lucio: 等妹妹们再回到花园，[p/]比亚特丽丝和伊尔马特已经不见了。

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: Tyrion: Do you remember [i]anything[/i] after that?
translation: Tyrion: 之后你有[i]任何[/i]记忆吗？

original: MBeatrice: I
translation: MBeatrice: 我

original: MBeatrice: No...[p/] I really [i]want[/i] to remember,[p/] but I can't.
translation: MBeatrice: 没有……[p/]我也[i]想[/i]记起来，[p/]但真的没法。

original: She certainly [i]looks[/i] like she's telling the truth.
translation: 她[i]看起来[/i]没撒谎。

original: ...But history shows that she's hardly trustworthy.
translation: ……但你没忘记前车之鉴。

original: Tyrion: ...And you have [i]no[/i] memories of what happened.
translation: Tyrion: ……而你什么都[i]不记得[/i]。

original: MBeatrice: No...[p/] None at all.
translation: MBeatrice: 不……[p/]一点都不记得。

original: MBeatrice: I can only imagine what I was forced to do while I was unconscious.
translation: MBeatrice: 我只能想象失去意识期间都被迫做了什么。

original: Tyrion: "Forced"...?[p/] What do you mean by that?
translation: Tyrion: “被迫”……？[p/]这是什么意思？

original: Tyrion: So you're [i]also[/i] saying that someone else controlled your body?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你[i]也[/i]觉得自己被人操控了？

original: MBeatrice: Yes.[p/] It's the only explanation for why you saw me in the Prayer Room.
translation: MBeatrice: 是的。[p/]这是你会在祷告室看见我的唯一解释。

original: Lucio: Absolutely ridiculous!
translation: Lucio: 荒唐！

original: Lucio: Arcane magic is [i]not[/i] capable of mind control!
translation: Lucio: 奥术[i]做不到[/i]意识操控！

original: Lucio: You're spinning a fairy tale to absolve yourself!
translation: Lucio: 你是在为了脱罪编故事！

original: You're compelled to agree with him.
translation: 你几乎想同意他。

original: ...So why do you feel like something's wrong?
translation: ……但为什么还是觉得哪里不对？

original: MBeatrice: Think what you will.
translation: MBeatrice: 随你怎么想。

original: MBeatrice: But please believe me when I say...
translation: MBeatrice: 但还请相信这一点……

original: Tyrion: Your statement [i]does[/i] match up with what happened to my client.
translation: Tyrion: 你和我的委托人确实口径一致。

original: Tyrion: ...But you clearly already [i]knew[/i] what happened to her.
translation: Tyrion: 但你看起来[i]早就知道[/i]她身上发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: You could just be using that knowledge to fabricate an alibi.
translation: Tyrion: 可能你只是借此编造不在场证明。

original: MBeatrice: I suppose I can't blame you for thinking that after what you saw.
translation: MBeatrice: 也不怪你这么想。

original: MBeatrice: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] I know it doesn't mean much coming from me.[p/] But I [i]am[/i] telling the truth.
translation: MBeatrice: 卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我知道自己没什么信用。[p/]但我[i]现在说的[/i]都是真的。

original: Tyrion: That remains to be seen.
translation: Tyrion: 拭目以待。

original: Tyrion: ...Why would you even bring that up?
translation: Tyrion: ……你怎么会想到这边？

original: MBeatrice: Well,[p/] if you had evidence that someone [i]else[/i] was controlling us,[p/] it would exonerate both me [i]and[/i] Aria.
translation: MBeatrice: 这个嘛，[p/]如果有证据证明是[i]别人[/i]进行操控，[p/]我[i]和[/i]阿莉亚都能脱罪。

original: MBeatrice: Think, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Isn't there anything
translation: MBeatrice: 好好想想，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]难道没有

original: MBeatrice: That would be the best-case scenario, wouldn't it?
translation: MBeatrice: 这不是最佳结果吗？

original: MBeatrice: Ugh...
translation: MBeatrice: 唉……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: MBeatrice: It's nothing.
translation: MBeatrice: 没事。

original: She looks extremely frustrated for some reason...
translation: 她看起来被什么惹得不太开心……

original: The way she's testifying is a little bit strange.
translation: 她的作证方式有点奇怪。

original: She immediately concluded that someone had taken control of her.
translation: 她立马得出了自己被人操控的结论。

original: And why would she bring up what happened to Aria?
translation: 还有，为什么要提起阿莉亚的事？

original: Tyrion: Your Grace![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下！[p/][s/]很明显证人的证言有矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Rath: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Rath: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: ...Why would she say something like that?
translation: ……为什么她要说这些？

original: You found the contradiction...[p/] But it was almost like she [i]gave[/i] it to you.
translation: 你已经发现了其中矛盾……[p/]但她仿佛是[i]故意[/i]露出破绽的。

original: Tyrion: ...Beatrice,[p/] you said there's no indication of who orchestrated this.
translation: Tyrion: ……比亚特丽丝，[p/]你说没有任何线索证明存在幕后黑手。

original: Tyrion: But there is [i]one[/i] piece of evidence that does just that,[p/] albeit loosely.
translation: Tyrion: 但我这恰好有[i]一件[/i]证据，虽然关联相对微弱。

original: MBeatrice: ...And what would that be?
translation: MBeatrice: ……这件证据是？

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] symbol...
translation: Tyrion: [i]这个[/i]符号……

original: You pull out the parchment with the Purple Mark on it and show it to her.
translation: 你把画着紫色标记的羊皮纸拿给她看。

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: MBeatrice: Marrunath...[p/] What are you doing?
translation: MBeatrice: 马鲁纳斯……[p/]你搞什么鬼？

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: Tyrion: ...What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: MBeatrice: He's using his powers to suppress our connection.
translation: MBeatrice: 他在压抑我们之间的连结。

original: Lucio: ..."Magic"?
translation: Lucio: ……“魔法”？

original: MBeatrice: I can't [i]actually[/i] see what you're trying to show me.
translation: MBeatrice: 我[i]看不见[/i]你拿出来的东西。

original: Tyrion: Marrunath.[p/] Can you stop being petty and just let her see it?
translation: Tyrion: 马鲁纳斯。[p/]别搞小动作了，让她看清楚。

original: MBeatrice: ...I don't take orders from you, heavensborn.
translation: MBeatrice: ……我可不听你指挥，天诞之物。

original: MBeatrice: ...
translation: MBeatrice: ……

original: MBeatrice: I wonder, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] What is on that parchment?
translation: MBeatrice: 卡斯伯特先生，我很好奇。[p/]羊皮纸上有什么？

original: Tyrion: You see, Beatrice,[p/] Aria has been investigating a string of murders throughout Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 是这样，比亚特丽丝，[p/]阿莉亚之前在调查维文加德境内的一系列谋杀案。

original: Tyrion: These murders [i]appear[/i] to be unrelated,[p/] despite how gruesome they are.
translation: Tyrion: 这些案子手段残忍，[p/]但是[i]乍一看[/i]互不相关。

original: Tyrion: But they all share one thing in common.
translation: Tyrion: 他们其实都有一个共同点。

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] symbol was found at each and every crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 所有犯罪现场都留有[i]这个[/i]符号。

original: Lucio: Don't tell me my daughter has roped you into her little conspiracy theory...
translation: Lucio: 可不要说你也信了我女儿的阴谋论……

original: Lucio: Your "mind control" defense would be laughable if it weren't downright insulting.
translation: Lucio: 你这套“意识操控”的说辞就已经蠢到好笑了。

original: Tyrion: Lord Steelwind.[p/][s/] During the gap in Aria's memory,[p/] someone [i]placed[/i] this mark in her pocket!
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵。[p/][s/]阿莉亚失去记忆期间，[p/]有人把这画有符号的纸[i]放到了[/i]她的口袋里！

original: Tyrion: It was clearly some sort of taunt from whoever orchestrated this.
translation: Tyrion: 明显是幕后黑手在挑衅。

original: Lucio: Nonsense![p/] She clearly drew that symbol [i]herself[/i] during her psychotic episode!
translation: Lucio: 胡言乱语！[p/]这是[i]她自己[/i]疾病发作时画下来的！

original: Lucio: I've had to listen to her go on and on about her insane theory!
translation: Lucio: 我听她说这些听到耳朵都起茧了！

original: Lucio: She was obsessed with it!
translation: Lucio: 她根本就是魔怔了！

original: MBeatrice: ...Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Aren't you curious about what just happened?
translation: MBeatrice: ……卡斯伯特先生。[p/]你不好奇怎么回事吗？

original: Tyrion: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么意思？

original: MBeatrice: Think about it.[p/] Why did
translation: MBeatrice: 好好想想。[p/]为什么会

original: MBeatrice: My apologies.[p/] I don't know why I said that.
translation: MBeatrice: 我很抱歉。[p/]我也不知道自己为什么这么说。

original: MBeatrice: ...[p/][s/]Ugh.
translation: MBeatrice：……[p/][s/]唉。

original: Tyrion: ...Is everything okay, Beatrice?
translation: Tyrion: ……比亚特丽丝，没事吧？

original: MBeatrice: Yes...[p/] I'm [i]perfectly[/i] fine.
translation: MBeatrice: 没事……[p/]我[i]好得不得了[/i]。

original: MBeatrice: Anyways,[p/] it looks like you'll have to figure the rest out on your own.
translation: MBeatrice: 总之，[p/]接下来的只能靠你自己了。

original: Tyrion: "Figure out the rest on my own"...?
translation: Tyrion: ”只能靠我自己了“……？

original: Tyrion: What do you mean by that?
translation: Tyrion: 这又是什么意思？

original: Lucio: There's nothing [i]to[/i] figure out!
translation: Lucio: 不需要再继续了！

original: Lucio: Your Grace![p/][s/] These two are making a mockery of us by spouting these [i]insane[/i] theories!
translation: Lucio: 巨龙殿下！[p/][s/]这两个凭空传谣的人是在侮辱法庭！

original: Lucio: The defense clearly has no case![p/][s/] End this at once!
translation: Lucio: 辩方走投无路了！[p/][s/]我要求立刻结案！

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Rath: ...Considering what I know,[p/] I'd like to indulge this theory.
translation: Rath: ……就我所知来判断，[p/]这不是什么谣言。

original: Lucio: ...What?!
translation: Lucio: ……什么？！

original: The judge is finally giving you a chance for once.[p/] [i]That's[/i] a first.
translation: 裁判终于愿意站在你这边了。[p/]破天荒啊。

original: You shouldn't waste this opportunity.
translation: 不能浪费机会。

original: You've actually been noticing it for quite a while.
translation: 你之前就注意到了。

original: Beatrice has been acting strangely since the trial began...
translation: 比亚特丽丝庭审开始后表现得就很奇怪……

original: It's suspicious...[p/] But not in the way that seems to implicate her.
translation: 很可疑……[p/]但不是凶手那种可疑。

original: It's almost like...[p/] She's [i]intentionally[/i] trying to make you realize something.
translation: 就好像……[p/]她[i]有意[/i]让你领会什么。

original: ...Why don't you pull on this thread a little more?
translation: ……继续往这个方向思考。

original: She just asked you if you were "curious about what just happened".
translation: 她刚刚还问你“不好奇怎么回事吗”。

original: You're not sure why she stopped herself when you asked for elaboration...
translation: 当你让她详细解释时，她又闭口不谈……

original: But whatever she's trying to draw your attention to must be significant.
translation: 但她尝试让你领会的东西肯定很重要。

original: No...[p/] It's like Beatrice is trying to draw your attention to something.
translation: 不对……[p/]比亚特丽丝是想让你注意到什么。

original: What just recently happened that is worth thinking about?
translation: 刚才发生的什么事值得仔细思考？

original: Marrunath...[p/] He didn't allow Beatrice to see the Purple Mark.
translation: 马鲁纳斯……[p/]他不想让比亚特丽丝看到紫色标记。

original: He'd only do that if Beatrice [i]would[/i] recognize it normally.
translation: 这意味着比亚特丽丝[i]认识[/i]这个标记。

original: Marrunath is her familiar and he [i]used[/i] to follow her orders.
translation: 马鲁纳斯是使魔，[i]一般都会[/i]服从她的命令。

original: But things have clearly changed now that she belongs to the "Empress of Discord".
translation: 但在她被“无序女皇”纳入麾下后，事情明显有所改变。。

original: So why would a demon like Marrunath interfere like this?
translation: 那为什么马鲁纳斯这种恶魔要干涉呢？

original: No...[p/] There's a common thread here.
translation: 不对……[p/]有一条很明显的线索。

original: First,[p/] Beatrice seems to know about the Purple Mark that Aria has been investigating.
translation: 首先，[p/]关于阿莉亚在调查的这个紫色标记，[p/]比亚特丽丝应该知道什么事情。

original: Second,[p/] Marrunath is [i]preventing[/i] Beatrice from seeing what it is.
translation: 其次，[p/]马鲁纳斯[i]正在阻止[/i]比亚特丽丝看见这个标记。

original: He's a demon who [i]shouldn't[/i] personally care about the politics of Wyverngarde.
translation: 作为一个恶魔，他[i]不应该[/i]关心维文加德的政治。

original: The Purple Mark must be related to a demon somehow.
translation: 紫色标记肯定和某个恶魔有关。

original: That's the only explanation as to why he would prevent her from seeing the Mark...
translation: 这是他阻止比亚特丽丝看到标记的唯一解释……

original: But Aria has been investigating murders [i]throughout[/i] Wyverngarde.
translation: 阿莉亚调查的是维文加德[i]境内各处[/i]的谋杀案。

original: Does this mean that her investigation [i]also[/i] has something to do with a demon?
translation: 是否意味着她的调查[i]也[/i]和恶魔相关？

original: ...Aria suspected that each of the murderers was acting against their will.
translation: ……阿莉亚怀疑凶手们都被别人操控了。

original: And now both Aria and Beatrice are [i]also[/i] claiming they were controlled.
translation: 阿莉亚和比亚特丽丝现在[i]也[/i]说自己被操控了。

original: You can't explain what happened to Aria and these other individuals.
translation: 虽然没法解释阿莉亚和其他人的事。

original: But you do know why [i]Beatrice[/i] might not have full control of her actions.
translation: 但你知道[i]比亚特丽丝[/i]被操控的可能原因。

original: No...[p/] The ability to control people's minds is nothing you've ever encountered before.
translation: 不对……[p/]你没见过这种意识操控的例子。

original: But you definitely know a lot less about demons than you'd like to.
translation: 但你确实对恶魔知之甚少。

original: There must be something a demon can do to compel another person to act a certain way.
translation: 也许恶魔有什么方法能强迫别人行动。

original: You recall what was written on Beatrice's contract during her trial.
translation: 你回忆起了之前比亚特丽丝的契约内容。

original: It said what would happen if she failed to claim House Frega.
translation: 上面写了她没能获得弗雷加一族家业的后果。

original: "Her soul,[p/] her [i]mind[/i],[p/] and her life would all be claimed by the Empress of Discord."
translation: “她的灵魂，[p/]她的[i]意识[/i]，[p/]和她的生命都会献给无序女皇。”

original: If this "Empress of Discord" owns Beatrice's "mind",[p/] would that mean they could also control Beatrice against her will?
translation: 如果这个“无序女皇”也拥有比亚特丽丝的“意识”，[p/]那是否也能强迫比亚特丽丝行动？

original: But if that were true...
translation: 如果这是真的……

original: No...[p/] You might finally have an explanation for how Beatrice may have been controlled against her will.
translation: 不对……[p/]也许这能解释比亚特丽丝为什么会被操控。

original: But if you follow that logic...[p/] It reveals a grim conclusion for Aria.
translation: 但如果用这种逻辑……[p/]阿莉亚那边就只能得出一个残酷的结论。

original: No...[p/] That can't be right, can it?
translation: 不……[p/]不可能是这样。

original: Did Aria seriously sign a Blood Contract with a demon?
translation: 阿莉亚真的和恶魔签订了血契？

original: But why would she [i]ever[/i] do that...?
translation: 但她为什么[i]要[/i]这么做……？

original: ...But it's the conclusion that makes the most sense.
translation: ……但这也是最合理的结论。

original: You can't think of any [i]other[/i] way someone could control her against her will.
translation: 你想不出[i]其他[/i]能让人强迫阿莉亚行动的方法。

original: ...And there [i]is[/i] one way to find out for certain.
translation: ……但[i]有[/i]一种不会失败的方法。

original: The Divine Edict.[p/] That same ability you used against Beatrice during [i]her[/i] trial.
translation: 神谕。[p/]你在比亚特丽丝的庭审中也用过这个能力。

original: It was instinctual at the time...[p/] But you have some understanding of how it works.
translation: 当时只是本能……[p/]但你现在也更了解个中机制。

original: It creates a copy of a Blood Contract between a contract holder and the demon who created it.
translation: 你可以创造恶魔和契约持有人的血契副本。

original: But for it to work,[p/] you need to know the name of the contract holder.
translation: 但要想成功，[p/]你得知道契约持有人的名字。

original: In addition to that,[p/] you need the name of the demon who created the contract.
translation: 此外，[p/]还需要知道恶魔的名字。

original: Right now,[p/] you're only relying on guesswork.
translation: 现在，你只能靠猜。

original: But going off of what you know,[p/] the demon who made the contract must be...
translation: 但根据已知线索，[p/]起草契约的恶魔一定是……

original: No...[p/] Marrunath is constantly around Beatrice.
translation: 不对……[p/]马鲁纳斯一直跟着比亚特丽丝。

original: Whoever made this contract with Aria probably made contracts with each of the murderers in this conspiracy.
translation: 和阿莉亚签约的恶魔很可能也和其他凶手签订了契约。

original: The Purple Mark must be some sort of symbol of that demon.
translation: 紫色标记是这个恶魔的什么符号。

original: ...And going off of what you've deduced so far,[p/] Beatrice would recognize that mark.
translation: 目前的推断来看，[p/]比亚特丽丝认得出这个标记。

original: What...?[p/] Why would you even-?
translation: 什么……？[p/]你怎么回事……？

original: ...Are you feeling okay?
translation: ……你还好吗？

original: As far as you know,[p/] Eugene the monkey is [i]not[/i] a demon.
translation: 目前而言，[p/]猴子尤金[i]不是[/i]恶魔。

original: There's a far more reasonable guess.
translation: 这么想才更合理。

original: There's apparently an entire hellish plane [i]filled[/i] with demons.
translation: 确实好像还有个[i]满是[/i]恶魔的地狱位面。

original: So it's possible that the demon involved is one you've never heard of before.
translation: 可能是你没听说过的恶魔捣鬼。

original: But even so,[p/] there's no harm in taking a guess.
translation: 即使如此，[p/]猜想一下也没坏处。

original: The so-called "Empress of Discord"...
translation: 这个所谓的“无序女皇”……

original: She was mentioned in Beatrice's Blood Contract.[p/] But you still have no idea who or [i]what[/i] she is.
translation: 比亚特丽丝的血契里提到了她。[p/]但你还是不知道她是谁/[i]什么[/i]。

original: However,[p/] she was mentioned in a Blood Contract created by Marrunath.
translation: 马鲁纳斯起草的血契里提到了她。

original: She must be his superior in some way.
translation: 也就是说马鲁纳斯是她的下属。

original: That [i]might[/i] explain why Marrunath doesn't want Beatrice to identify the Purple Mark.
translation: [i]或许[/i]也能解释马鲁纳斯为什么不想让比亚特丽丝辨识出紫色标记。

original: You're not sure if a pseudonym is enough.[p/] But it's the closest you can get with what you know so far.
translation: 你不确定别称行不行。[p/]但也没有更好的选项了。

original: Rath: ...You've been awfully quiet for a while, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Rath: ……你沉默不语好一会儿了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Rath: What are you thinking about?
translation: Rath: 你在想什么？

original: Lucio: He's probably imagining [i]new[/i] ways to futilely stall for time.
translation: Lucio: 他可能在想徒劳拖延时间的[i]新[/i]把式。

original: Tyrion: I think...[p/] I've finally figured out [i]why[/i] the witness and the defendant can't remember anything.
translation: Tyrion: 我想……[p/]我终于知道证人和被告[i]为什么[/i]失忆了。

original: Tyrion: And it would also explain why they didn't have control of their actions.
translation: Tyrion: 也能解释她们为什么控制不了自己的行动。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] Again with this?
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]又来这招？

original: Lucio: If you're so convinced of my daughter's conspiracy,[p/] why don't you prove it?!
translation: Lucio: 你要是这么相信我女儿的阴谋论，[p/]那就证明给我看啊？！

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/][s/] I knew it!
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/][s/]我就知道！

original: Lucio: Even [i]you[/i] don't believe in the nonsense you're spouting.
translation: Lucio: [i]你自己[/i]也不相信这些天方夜谭。

original: Tyrion: Lord Steelwind...[p/] I want to be wrong about this...
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵……[p/]我也希望自己是错的……

original: Tyrion: ...If I'm right,[p/] the implications don't bode well for [i]anyone[/i] involved.
translation: Tyrion: ……如果我没错，[p/]这个指控对所有相关人士都不好。

original: Tyrion: So instead of [i]telling[/i] you,[p/] I think it would be better to show you.
translation: Tyrion: 口说无凭，[p/]让我展示给你看吧。

original: Tyrion: Empress of Discord![p/][s/] Wherever you may hide!
translation: Tyrion: 无序女皇！[p/][s/]不管你藏身何处！

original: MBeatrice: Damn it...
translation: MBeatrice: 该死……

original: MBeatrice: I knew you could do it.
translation: MBeatrice: 我就知道你能行。

original: Tyrion: By the Eye of Horus,[p/][s/] I issue upon you a divine edict!
translation: Tyrion: 借荷鲁斯之眼之力，[p/][s/]我对你发出神谕！

original: Tyrion: Release thy guards and manifest your Blood Contract with Aria Steelwind!
translation: Tyrion: 放下防备，展示你和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的血契！

original: Rath: No...
translation: Rath: 不……

original: Rath: This [i]can't[/i] be true...
translation: Rath: 这[i]不可能[/i]是真的……

original: Lucio: This is...
translation: Lucio: 这……

original: Rath: Enough![p/][s/] Stop prattling amongst yourself!
translation: Rath: 够了！[p/][s/]不要聒噪！

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Lucio: No![p/][s/] This is a sham!
translation: Lucio: 不！[p/][s/]这是骗局！

original: Lucio: This [i]wretch[/i] has clearly created a convincing fabrication!
translation: Lucio: 都是这个[i]混球[/i]耍的小把戏！

original: Rath: ...It's genuine, Lucio.[p/]
translation: Rath: ……这是真的，卢西奥。[p/]

original: Rath: It's impossible to falsify something like this.
translation: Rath: 这种事没办法造假。

original: Tyrion: You can't deny the truth anymore, Lord Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德勋爵，你没办法再否认真相了。

original: Tyrion: There [i]is[/i] a way to control someone else's actions.
translation: Tyrion: 确实[i]有[/i]一种办法操控别人的行为。

original: Tyrion: Aria Steelwind wasn't affected by Mageblight!
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德没有得法师之疫！

original: Tyrion: She was controlled against her will!
translation: Tyrion: 她是被操控了意识！

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Rath: ...With this evidence,[p/] there's no doubt that Aria [i]did[/i] sign a Blood Contract.
translation: Rath: 这件证据表明，[p/]阿莉亚无疑[i]签约了[/i]血契。

original: Rath: But it still doesn't make sense.
translation: Rath: 但还是说不通。

original: Tyrion: I agree...
translation: Tyrion: 同感……

original: Tyrion: Even [i]if[/i] Aria was the type of person to sign a Contract with a demon...
translation: Tyrion: [i]就算[/i]阿莉亚会和恶魔签约……

original: Tyrion: There isn't a single part of this contract that benefits her.
translation: Tyrion: 契约里也没有对她有利的部分。

original: No...[p/] Aria would never make a contract with a demon willingly.
translation: 不对……[p/]阿莉亚不可能主动与恶魔签约。

original: And even if she did,[p/] [i]no one[/i] would ever agree to terms like this.
translation: 即使她真签约了，[p/][i]也不可能[/i]是这种条款。

original: There's only one explanation for why she would sign this.
translation: 她会签约只有一个解释。

original: Tyrion: There's a large empty space above the terms of your daughter's contract.
translation: Tyrion: 你女儿的契约上半部有大片空白。

original: Tyrion: When I issue a Divine Edict,[p/] it creates a copy of the Blood Contract that I call for.
translation: Tyrion: 发出神谕后，[p/]我可以创造相应血契的副本。

original: Tyrion: I think when she was given this contract,[p/] it probably looked like something entirely different.
translation: Tyrion: 她获得这份契约时，[p/]上面写的大概是完全不同的内容。

original: Tyrion: Something [i]else[/i] was written in this empty space to make it look like a normal legal document.
translation: Tyrion: 空白部分写着[i]其他[/i]文字，伪装成普通的法律文件。

original: Tyrion: Which means that my client was [i]not[/i] in control of her actions that day!
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着我的委托人当天<u>无法</u>控制自己的行为！

original: Lucio: Enough of this![p/][s/] [i]All[/i] of you!
translation: Lucio: 住嘴！[p/][s/][i]你们[/i]都住嘴！

original: Tyrion: Do you see now, Lord Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 明白了吗，斯蒂尔文德勋爵？

original: Tyrion: Aria was not responsible for what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 发生的事不是阿莉亚的责任。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: [i]That[/i] remains to be proven.
translation: Lucio: [i]这[/i]还有待证明。

original: Tyrion: What are you [i]talking[/i] about?!
translation: Tyrion: 你在说什么？！

original: Tyrion: She has a Blood Contract that relinquishes control of her free will!
translation: Tyrion: 她的血契里写明了要放弃操控自己意识的能力！

original: Lucio: Not having control and not being responsible are two [i]very[/i] different things, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 没有操控能力和没有责任是[i]不一样[/i]的，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Lucio: I'll admit...[p/] The defendant may not have had control of her actions when she murdered the victims.
translation: Lucio: 我承认……[p/]被告在杀人时可能没法控制自己的行动。

original: Lucio: ...[i]However[/i], she [i]did[/i] have full control of herself when she [i]signed[/i] this Contract.
translation: Lucio: ……[i]但是[/i]，她在[i]签约[/i]时还是有自控能力的。

original: Tyrion: Are you serious?!
translation: Tyrion: 你认真的？！

original: Tyrion: No one in their right mind would [i]willingly[/i] sign a Contract like this!
translation: Tyrion: 没人意识正常的时候会[i]乐意[/i]签这种契约！

original: Lucio: ...And what of Beatrice Frega?
translation: Lucio: ……那比亚特丽丝·弗雷加呢？

original: Lucio: Was [i]she[/i] in her right mind when she made a Contract with the demon Marrunath?
translation: Lucio: [i]她[/i]和马鲁纳斯签约的时候清醒吗？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Lucio: If we can't hold the defendant responsible,[p/] [i]surely[/i] we should also acquit Lady Frega for the murder of her father?
translation: Lucio: 如果被告不用负责任，[p/][i]弗雷加[/i]小姐当然也可以免罪咯？

original: Tyrion: T-[p/][s/]That's [i]hardly[/i] the same thing!
translation: Tyrion: 这、[p/][s/]这两者不一样！

original: Lucio: [i]I[/i], for one, fail to see the difference.
translation: Lucio: [i]我[/i]就没看出来有什么区别。

original: Lucio: A fool made a deal with a demon.[p/] And as a result several esteemed members of the nobility were killed.
