translation: Lucio: 都是一个蠢人和恶魔签约。[p/]然后杀了声名显赫的贵族成员。

original: Tyrion: She's your [i]daughter[/i], Lucio!
translation: Tyrion: 卢西奥，她可是你的[i]女儿[/i]！

original: Lucio: And how does [i]that[/i] change anything?!
translation: Lucio: [i]这[i]能改变什么？！

original: Damn it...[p/] He seriously doesn't care if he convicts Aria...
translation: 该死……[p/]起诉自己的女儿对他来说真的无所谓……

original: Lucio: Honestly...[p/] This only places [i]more[/i] responsibility on her for what happened.
translation: Lucio: 实话说……[p/]这只表示她要承担[i]更多[/i]责任。

original: Lucio: I could have [i]accepted[/i] if she had been reckless and [i]accidentally[/i] induced Mageblight.
translation: Lucio: 我能[i]接受[/i]的是她因自己的鲁莽，[i]意外[/i]感染法师之疫。

original: Lucio: But to sign a Contract with a [i]demon[/i]?!
translation: Lucio: 但和[i]恶魔[/i]签约？

original: Lucio: That only further espouses the need to [i]put her down[/i]!
translation: Lucio: 这只能让她离[i]死刑[/i]更近！

original: Tyrion: She was clearly [i]tricked[/i], Lucio!
translation: Tyrion: 她是被[i]耍[/i]了，卢西奥！

original: Lucio: Is that so?!
translation: Lucio: 不尽然吧？！

original: Lucio: As a [i]fellow[/i] attorney,[p/] would you really sign a Contract without [i]carefully[/i] inspecting it?!
translation: Lucio: 你也是个律师，[p/]难道会不[i]仔细[/i]看过内容就签约？！

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Lucio: Whether it was through foolishness,[p/] negligence,[p/] or both.
translation: Lucio: 不管是因为愚昧，[p/]无知，[p/]还是两者皆有。

original: Lucio: The defendant willingly signed a Blood Contract.
translation: Lucio: 被告还是主动签了血契。

original: Lucio: She compromised herself.[p/] And as a result,[p/] three nobles died.
translation: Lucio: 她做出了妥协。[p/]结果就是，[p/]三名贵族死了。

original: Lucio: The responsibility falls [i]squarely[/i] on her.
translation: Lucio: 让她担责是[i]正确[i]的。

original: Wait...
translation: 等等……

original: Even if she willingly signed that Contract,[p/] that's not entirely true, is it?
translation: 即使是她主动签约，[p/]里面也一定有猫腻。

original: No...[p/] You can't really disprove what he's saying,[p/] even if it's completely outrageous.
translation: 不对……[p/]虽然听起来荒谬至极，[p/]但你没法证明他说的不实。

original: Objectively,[p/] you can't prove that Aria didn't willingly sign that Contract.
translation: 客观而言，[p/]你也不能证明阿莉亚不是自愿签约。

original: But even if you admit that,[p/] there's [i]someone[/i] else involved that was clearly acting with malice.
translation: 即使承认这一点，[p/]肯定也有[i]其他[/i]怀有恶意的人牵涉其中。

original: Tyrion: Lucio![p/][s/] There's clearly someone else to blame for Aria's actions that day.
translation: Tyrion: 卢西奥！[p/][s/]阿莉亚当天的行动肯定是被别人影响。

original: Lucio: Oh?[p/] And who would that be?
translation: Lucio: 哦？[p/]你说说是谁？

original: Tyrion: I'd like to reread my client's Blood Contract to the court.
translation: Tyrion: 我想对法庭重新朗读我的委托人的血契。

original: Tyrion: "By signing this contract, Aria Steelwind surrenders her mind, body, and soul to the Patron."
translation: Tyrion: “签订契约后，阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德将自己的意识，躯体，灵魂都交给签约人。”

original: Tyrion: [i]That[/i] can only mean one thing!
translation: Tyrion: [i]这[/i]只有一种含义！

original: Tyrion: Whoever this Patron is,[p/][s/] [i]they[/i] took control of my client and [i]used[/i] her to murder the victims!
translation: Tyrion: 不管签约人是谁，[p/][s/]就是<u>他</u>操控我的委托人，[i]利用[/i]她实施谋杀！

original: Gallery: T-[p/][s/]That's right!
translation: Gallery: 对、[p/][s/]对啊！

original: Gallery: They could still be out there!
translation: Gallery: 签约人可能就在这里！

original: Gallery: None of us are safe until this "Patron" is apprehended!
translation: Gallery: 签约人被捕前我们都不安全！

original: Tyrion: [i]Surely[/i] we can't end this trial while every member of the Wyverngarde nobility is in danger.
translation: Tyrion: 我们[i]不能[/i]在维文加德贵族们身处险境的时候结束审判吧？

original: Lucio: Hmph...
translation: Lucio: 哼……

original: Lucio: Well played.
translation: Lucio: 这招漂亮。

original: Rath: I'm compelled to agree with Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Rath: 我也倾向同意卡斯伯特先生。

original: Rath: Trickery or not,[p/] it's clear [i]someone[/i] wished ill intent on the nobles.
translation: Rath: 不管被耍与否，[p/]显然是[i]有人[/i]在针对贵族。

original: Tyrion: ...And until we know [i]who[/i] this Patron is,[p/] you can't pass judgment on my client.
translation: Tyrion: 弄清楚签约人的<u>真实身份</u>之前，[p/]你都不能下达判决。

original: Tyrion: Not until we know the circumstances that she signed that Blood Contract under.
translation: Tyrion: 至少要在我们搞清楚她签订血契的情形之后。

original: Lucio: ...And what would [i]you[/i] have us do, Cuthbert?
translation: Lucio: 那[i]你[/i]推荐我们怎么办，卡斯伯特？

original: Lucio: The Contract has no stipulations about proximity or [i]how[/i] this mind control works.
translation: Lucio: 契约里没有关于意识操控的条款，也没有具体[i]机制[/i]。

original: Lucio: For all we know,[p/] this "Patron" could have murdered the victims all while sitting in their very home.
translation: Lucio: 就我们所知，[p/]这个“签约人”坐在自己家里就能把其他人杀了。

original: Tyrion: There was a clear intent behind this attack.
translation: Tyrion: 这次攻击背后意图很明显。

original: Tyrion: Even [i]if[/i] the Patron didn't directly participate in the murders,[p/] they definitely had a motive.
translation: Tyrion: [i]即使[/i]签约人没有直接参与谋杀，[p/]也有动机。

original: Tyrion: If Aria was being controlled,[p/] then we can analyze her behavior to determine [i]who[/i] was controlling her.
translation: Tyrion: 如果阿莉亚被人控制了，[p/]我们就可以通过分析她的行为来判断[i]谁[/i]是幕后主使。

original: Rath: I see...[p/] That does sound as good a plan as any.
translation: Rath: 我明白了……[p/]听起来是个很好的计划。

original: Rath: At the very least,[p/] we can't allow this Patron to escape justice.
translation: Rath: 再怎么样，[p/]我们都不能让签约人逃脱正义的制裁。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Rath: Despite the questions raised,[p/] we've clearly made some headway.
translation: Rath: 尽管又出现了新问题，[p/]我们也取得了一些进展。

original: Rath: I believe we should take a brief "recess" to process these revelations.
translation: Rath: 为此我们应该暂时中断庭审。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] Very well...
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]好吧……

original: You step outside the Scaled Lord's lair to get some fresh air.
translation: 你走出鳞甲领主的巢穴来呼吸新鲜空气。

original: ...These new revelations are a lot to take in.
translation: ……新发现可不太好消化。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste looks especially down.
translation: 塞莱斯特看上去尤为沮丧。

original: From what you've observed,[p/] she and Aria have been speaking to each other a lot.
translation: 根据你的观察，[p/]她和阿莉亚也是知无不言。

original: They must have become friends over the many times they've met.
translation: 这么多次下来，她们已经变成朋友了。

original: You can't imagine how powerless she feels right now.
translation: 很难想象她现在会感到多么无力。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Celeste: Aria...[p/] I...
translation: Celeste: 阿莉亚……[p/]我……

original: Celeste: I'm so sorry...
translation: Celeste: 我很抱歉……

original: Aria: ...Don't be.[p/] I...
translation: Aria: ……不用的。[p/]我……

original: Her voice begins to break.
translation: 她的声音开始颤抖。

original: She's always been stoic.[p/] But it's clear even [i]she[/i] has her breaking point.
translation: 她一直很刚毅。[p/]但即使是[i]她[/i]也有承受阈值。

original: Tyrion: I can't imagine what you're feeling right now.
translation: Tyrion: 我很难想象你现在的感受。

original: Tyrion: ...But there's still hope.
translation: Tyrion: ……但我们还有希望。

original: Tyrion: If we can find out who did this to you,[p/] we can still save you.
translation: Tyrion: 如果能揪出对你做了这些的人，[p/]我们还能救出你。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Do you remember if you've signed [i]anything[/i] recently?
translation: Tyrion: 你记得最近是否签过[i]任何[/i]东西吗？

original: Aria: N-[p/][s/]No.[p/] I don't...
translation: Aria: 不、[p/][s/]不。[p/]我不记得……

original: Tyrion: Damn it...[p/] The Patron must've wiped your memories to cover their tracks.
translation: Tyrion: 麻烦了……[p/]签约人肯定是为了匿踪消去了你的记忆。

original: Aria: But I still don't understand.
translation: Aria: 但我还是不明白。

original: Aria: Even if I [i]don't[/i] remember signing that contract,[p/] I don't think I would be that careless.
translation: Aria: 就算我[i]不记得[/i]签约一事，[p/]我也不会这么大意。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] As much as I hate to admit it,[p/] Lucio was right.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]虽然不想承认，[p/]但卢西奥说得没错。

original: Tyrion: You're an attorney like me.[p/] And we always carefully look over contracts before we sign them.
translation: Tyrion: 你和我一样是法律工作者。[p/]我们签约前都会仔细浏览内容。

original: Tyrion: Which raises the question of [i]how[/i] the Patron got your signature.
translation: Tyrion: 这也引出了签约人[i]怎么[/i]获得你签名的问题。

original: Aria: I don't know...
translation: Aria: 我不知道……

original: Aria: I just...
translation: Aria: 我只是……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Damn it...[p/] We don't even know what circumstances you were under when you signed that contract.
translation: Tyrion: 该死……[p/]我们都不知道你签约的时候是个什么状况。

original: Tyrion: For all we know,[p/] the Patron could have used any number of tactics to coerce you into doing this.
translation: Tyrion: 我们知道的只有一件事，[p/]签约人可能用了很多把戏让你中招。

original: Aria: That's...[p/] also possible.
translation: Aria: 这个……[p/]也有可能。

original: Celeste: ...Aria.
translation: Celeste: ……阿莉亚。

original: As you're deliberating amongst yourselves,[p/] Lord Steelwind approaches you.
translation: 在你们讨论的时候，[p/]斯蒂尔文德勋爵接近了。

original: Celeste: ...What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Celeste: ……[i]你[/i]来干嘛？

original: Aria: ...Father.
translation: Aria: ……父亲。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: Hmph...
translation: Lucio: 哼……

original: Celeste: I can't believe him!
translation: Celeste: 难以置信！

original: Celeste: How does he have nothing to say?!
translation: Celeste: 你就没什么要说的？！

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: His actions say otherwise...[p/][s/] But you could've sworn you saw something through the Eye.
translation: 虽然没有外露情感……[p/][s/]但你的荷鲁斯之眼确实看到了什么

original: It's almost as if he was...[p/] saddened and worried.
translation: 他几乎像是感到……[p/]悲哀和担忧。

original: ...Well,[p/] no matter how he feels internally,[p/] he's made it clear that he's your enemy.
translation: ……唉，[p/]不管他心里怎么想，[p/]行动已经证明你们是敌对关系。

original: [i]Whatever[/i] his motivations are,[p/] you'll overcome him.[p/] Just like everyone else.
translation: 不管他的动力是[i]什么[/i]，[p/]你都会战胜他。[p/]就像战胜别人那样。

original: Tyrion: We should also head back, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 该回去了，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: Right...
translation: Celeste: 好……

original: No matter what it takes,[p/] you're going to see this through.
translation: 不管要做什么，[p/]你都会坚持到最后。

original: Rath: Court is now resumed.[p/] Shall we pick up where we carried off?
translation: Rath: 现在审理继续。[p/]就从中断的地方开始吧？

original: Rath: How would you like to proceed?
translation: Rath: 你接下来要怎么做？

original: Tyrion: I think we should review what we [i]do[/i] know about the murders.
translation: Tyrion: 我们应该回顾一下关于谋杀案[i]已知[/i]的事情。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] We [i]do[/i] have a plethora of witnesses to work with.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]我们确实还有很多目击证人。

original: Tyrion: That's correct...[p/] So let's start from the beginning.
translation: Tyrion: 没错……[p/]从最开头说起吧。

original: Tyrion: It all began at noon yesterday morning.
translation: Tyrion: 一切都始于昨天中午。

original: Tyrion: I was at my house in Ratholme with Aria and my bodyguard: Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 我，阿莉亚，我的护卫塞莱斯特三人都在我位于瑞思霍姆的家里。

original: Tyrion: I was speaking with them when a courier suddenly delivered a letter to my home.
translation: Tyrion: 我们在谈关于一封突然被寄来的信的事情。

original: Tyrion: It was from Garrick Pierce.[p/] He wanted to meet with me and Celeste at the Grand Cathedral of the Scaled Lord at 2:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 寄信人是加里克·皮尔斯。[p/]他希望下午 2:00，与我和塞莱斯特在鳞甲领主大教堂见面。

original: Tyrion: To make sure we were on time,[p/] we arrived at the Grand Cathedral at 1:00 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 为了确保准时，[p/]我们下午 1:00 就抵达了大教堂。

original: Tyrion: At the time,[p/] we didn't know that the cathedral was closed to the public.
translation: Tyrion: 当时我们还不知道，[p/]大教堂已经不对公众开放了。

original: Tyrion: But the knights guarding the cathedral allowed us through anyways.
translation: Tyrion: 但看守大教堂的骑士放我们进去了。

original: Tyrion: Apparently,[p/] they were expecting us.
translation: Tyrion: 他们似乎早知道我们会来。

original: Lucio: ...That should [i]not[/i] have been possible.
translation: Lucio: ……这[i]不[/i]应该。

original: Lucio: Due to the solemnity of the situation,[p/] we were very particular about who was permitted to enter the cathedral.
translation: Lucio: 出于事态严肃性，[p/]只有个别人被允许进入大教堂。

original: Tyrion: It's possible someone pulled some strings to let us through.
translation: Tyrion: 可能有人背后牵线让我们进去。

original: Lucio: ...[i]Or[/i] you two entered the Cathedral illegally.
translation: Lucio: ……[i]也可能[/i]是你们俩违法进了大教堂。

original: Tyrion: Well, I'm sure that knight from the Kingsguard can vouch for us.
translation: Tyrion: 这个嘛，问问国王卫队的骑士不就知道了。

original: Lucio: I know about [i]every[/i] order given to the Kingsguard.
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队的[i]每条[/i]命令我都知晓。

original: Lucio: And [i]none[/i] of them were told to let you two through.
translation: Lucio: [i]没有[/i]哪条说了要放你们通过。

original: Tyrion: ...It's possible the knight we met fell comatose like the others.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们遇见的骑士可能也是昏迷者之一。

original: Tyrion: And as long as they're unresponsive,[p/] we'll never know.
translation: Tyrion: 在他们恢复意识之前，[p/]我们无从得知。

original: Rath: Perhaps we should continue...
translation: Rath: 我们先继续进行吧……

original: Lucio: Hmph...
translation: Lucio: 哼……

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we arrived at the church and spent the next hour sightseeing before we went to meet with Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们提前抵达教堂，[p/]去见皮尔斯之前的一小时里简单赏景。

original: Tyrion: In that time,[p/] we met with Remus,[p/] Lucio,[p/] Aria,[p/] Aster,[p/] and Alaric.
translation: Tyrion: 这段时间里，[p/]我们遇见了雷穆斯，[p/]卢西奥，[p/]阿莉亚，[p/]阿斯特，[p/]阿拉里克。

original: Tyrion: And around that time,[p/] Aria and Aster left together to meet with the High Speaker in his quarters.
translation: Tyrion: 同一时间，[p/]阿莉亚和阿斯特一起去大主教舍与之会面。

original: Tyrion: While exploring the cathedral,[p/] we spoke with von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: 探索大教堂时，[p/]我们还与冯·桑克图斯和希比尔交谈过。

original: Tyrion: Then we spoke with the three Frega sisters and Eris Illmater.
translation: Tyrion: 之后还与弗雷加三姐妹及厄莉斯·伊尔马特交谈。

original: Lucio: Eris Illmater?
translation: Lucio: 厄莉斯·伊尔马特？

original: Tyrion: She's a friend of Beatrice Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 她是比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的一个朋友。

original: Tyrion: The Kingsguard wouldn't let her bring her familiar into the cathedral.
translation: Tyrion: 国王卫队不允许她把自己的使魔带进大教堂。

original: Tyrion: So she brought Eris to guide her instead.
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯就充当了她的向导。

original: Lucio: Hm...
translation: Lucio: 嗯……

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we left the garden at around 1:45 PM to meet with Pierce in the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们下午1:45左右离开花园去祷告室见皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: And at around the same time,[p/] Aria left her meeting with the High Speaker and felt nauseous.
translation: Tyrion: 与此同时，[p/]阿莉亚因感到恶心而离开了与大主教的谈话。

original: Tyrion: The last thing she remembers is looking at Lake Galakrond.
translation: Tyrion: 她最后记得的场面是自己看向迦拉克隆湖。

original: Lucio: A [i]likely[/i] story.
translation: Lucio: 真是个好[i]故事[/i]。

original: Tyrion: [i]Regardless[/i],[p/] at 2:00 PM,[p/] Aster went to pay respects to his father's body.
translation: Tyrion: [i]不管怎样[/i]，[p/]下午 2:00，[p/]阿斯特去悼念先王。

original: Tyrion: Unbeknownst to him,[p/] a mage had placed a [b]Glyph of Contingency[/b] in front of his father's coffin.
translation: Tyrion: 但他并不知道，遗棺那里被法师设下了[b]有备无患[/b]法术。

original: Tyrion: It was set to trap him within a [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 目的是为了用[b]坚牢术[/b]困住他。

original: Rath: What a despicable act...
translation: Rath: 真是卑鄙……

original: Lucio: Considering what followed,[p/] the attack on His Majesty must have been a diversion...
translation: Lucio: 考虑到之后发生的事情，[p/]攻击国王陛下可能是为了声东击西……

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 没错……

original: Tyrion: It was also at this time that both Beatrice and Eris went missing.
translation: Tyrion: 这也是比亚特丽丝和厄莉斯失踪的时间。

original: Tyrion: Considering the timing of it all,[p/] someone must have taken control of Beatrice's body [i]after[/i] the trap on Aster was sprung.
translation: Tyrion: 考虑到这些事情的发生时间，[p/]比亚特丽丝被操控是在阿斯特被困[i]之后[/i]。

original: Lucio: ...And are you saying this "Patron" controlled [i]her[/i] as well?
translation: Lucio: ……你要说控制了[i]她[/i]的也是“签约人”？

original: Tyrion: No.[p/] I don't think so...
translation: Tyrion: 不。[p/]我不觉得……

original: Tyrion: According to her Contract,[p/] her mind belongs to the Empress of Discord,[p/] not the Patron.
translation: Tyrion: 根据契约内容，[p/]她的意识归属无序女皇，[p/]并不是签约人。

original: Tyrion: Furthermore,[p/] Aria's Blood Contract was [i]created[/i] by the Empress.
translation: Tyrion: 此外，[p/]也是女皇[i]起草[/i]阿莉亚的血契。

original: Tyrion: It's clear that the Patron and the Empress were in league with each other.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人和女皇显然是同谋关系。

original: Lucio: ...Wonderful.[p/] [i]Another[/i] demon we have to worry about.
translation: Lucio: ……很好。[p/][i]又多一个[/i]恶魔。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] the Patron and the Empress had all of the pieces they needed.
translation: Tyrion: ……先不提这个，[p/]签约人和女皇准备就绪。

original: Tyrion: That's when they began the massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 屠杀也在此刻开始。

original: Tyrion: The Patron took control of Aria's body.[p/] And they used her to murder von Sanctus at 2:05 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人控制了阿莉亚的身体。[p/]利用她在下午 2:05 杀害了冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: Presumably,[p/] Aria started a fire in the Common Room around this time.
translation: Tyrion: 根据推测，[p/]阿莉亚此时在公共休息室纵火。

original: Tyrion: And since von Sanctus's body was found there,[p/] this must have been after she murdered him.
translation: Tyrion: 这里也是冯·桑克图斯尸体的发现场所，[p/]意味着这里就是谋杀现场。

original: Tyrion: Shortly after,[p/] Prince Alaric spotted smoke from the fire and asked Aria what was going on.
translation: Tyrion: 之后不久，[p/]阿拉里克王子看到冒出的烟，问阿莉亚怎么回事。

original: Tyrion: Aria responded by using an unknown [b]transmutation[/b] spell to incapacitate him.
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚用未知的[b]形变[/b]法术使其无法行动。

original: Lucio: To think they would use her to attack the prince as well...
translation: Lucio: 这个签约人竟敢利用她攻击王子……

original: Tyrion: Luckily,[p/] the effects of that spell were only temporary,[p/] and Alaric came out unharmed.
translation: Tyrion: 幸运的是，[p/]法术效果只是暂时的，[p/]阿拉里克没有受伤。

original: Tyrion: After this,[p/] the patron used Aria to murder Sibyl at 2:15 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 这之后，[p/]下午 2:15，签约人控制阿莉亚杀害希比尔。

original: Tyrion: She brought Sibyl's body to the westward balcony,[p/] where she dumped it into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔的尸体被带到西侧阳台，[p/]阿莉亚在这里将尸体投入迦拉克隆湖中。

original: Tyrion: High Speaker Archeus witnessed this.[p/] But he wasn't aware of what she'd thrown off the balcony until much later.
translation: Tyrion: 大主教阿契厄斯目击了这一行为。[p/]但他后来才意识到被从阳台丢下的是什么。

original: Tyrion: The High Speaker thought this encounter was strange.[p/] But he continued with his business.
translation: Tyrion: 大主教虽然觉得奇怪。[p/]但他还是继续去忙自己的事了。

original: Tyrion: He headed to the Prayer Room.[p/] But was turned away by the knights standing guard there.
translation: Tyrion: 他的目的地是祷告室。[p/]但被那里的守卫拒之门外。

original: Tyrion: Meanwhile,[p/] Celeste and I were...[p/] [i]talking[/i] to Lord Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 与此同时，[p/]塞莱斯特和我……[p/]正与皮尔斯勋爵[i]交谈[/i]。

original: Tyrion: When we showed up for the meeting earlier,[p/] he was clearly expecting someone else to show up.
translation: Tyrion: 我们提早出现在了约定地点，[p/]但当时他等的明显是别人。

original: Tyrion: We tried to get to the bottom of what was happening.[p/] But he refused to answer our questions.
translation: Tyrion: 我们试图探究怎么回事。[p/]但他拒绝回答问题。

original: Tyrion: And at about 2:20 PM we heard a commotion outside.
translation: Tyrion: 下午 2:20 左右，我们听到外面有骚乱。

original: Tyrion: Celeste went to investigate.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特出去调查了。

original: Tyrion: ...And that's when Celeste fought Aria.
translation: Tyrion: ……也就是在这时和阿莉亚博斗起来。

original: Tyrion: The Patron's target was Garrick Pierce,[p/] but Celeste was too powerful to neutralize.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人的目标是加里克·皮尔斯，[p/]但塞莱斯特强得他束手无策。

original: Tyrion: They fought each other for about fifteen minutes before Aria was finally able to push past her.
translation: Tyrion: 双方斗了大约15分钟，阿莉亚才终于成功推开她。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Tyrion: During their fight,[p/] the Empress sent Beatrice into the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 二人搏斗期间，[p/]女皇派比亚特丽丝进入祷告室。

original: Tyrion: She probably made Beatrice invisible to move undetected.
translation: Tyrion: 可能也用了隐形法术避人耳目。

original: Tyrion: She then used her to cast a [b]Sleep[/b] spell on Pierce and me to knock us out.
translation: Tyrion: 之后女皇利用她施展[b]睡眠术[/b]，让我和皮尔斯失去意识。

original: Tyrion: I remember checking the time close to when this happened.
translation: Tyrion: 当时我记得自己特意看了一下时间。

original: Tyrion: This must have happened at 2:30 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 一定是下午 2:30 没错。

original: Lucio: ...If your testimony is correct,[p/] Beatrice Frega was actively used in this plan.
translation: Lucio: ……假设你的证言属实，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加也是计划里的重要一环。

original: Tyrion: Yes...[p/] And considering how quickly the massacre unfolded,[p/] the Empress must have coordinated with the Patron.
translation: Tyrion: 对……[p/]考虑到屠杀的迅速程度，[p/]女皇和签约人一定在合作。

original: Tyrion: They probably planned how they would use Beatrice and Aria to carry out the murders.
translation: Tyrion: 两人应该提前商议好了，怎么利用比亚特丽丝和阿莉亚实施谋杀。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] after Beatrice knocked us out,[p/] Aria finally pushed past Celeste and entered the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 总之[p/]，比亚特丽丝让我们沉睡之后，[p/]阿莉亚才终于推开塞莱斯特进入祷告室。

original: Tyrion: And before Celeste could chase after her,[p/] she had already murdered Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 在塞莱斯特追上她之前，[p/]阿莉亚就已经杀掉皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: Aria and I were already unconscious by the time Celeste entered the room.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特进入房间时，阿莉雅和我已经失去意识。

original: Tyrion: The Patron had already achieved their goal of murdering the three nobles.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人杀害了三名贵族，实现了目标。

original: Tyrion: So she probably fell unconscious after they released their control over her.
translation: Tyrion: 他们也不再需要操控阿莉亚，这可能是她失去意识的原因。

original: Tyrion: Aria and I regained consciousness shortly after.
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚和我很快恢复了意识。

original: Tyrion: That's when the Inquisition arrested her for the murders.
translation: Tyrion: 此时裁判所以谋杀罪名逮捕了她。

original: Lucio: Hm...[p/] Lord Pierce was one of the victims.
translation: Lucio: 唔……[p/]皮尔斯勋爵是受害者之一。

original: Lucio: Your meeting clearly had more significance than I'd realized.
translation: Lucio: 你们的会面比我预想的要重要。

original: Lucio: So tell us, Cuthbert.[p/][s/] What was your discussion about?
translation: Lucio: 所以卡斯伯特，告诉我。[p/][s/]你们谈论的内容是？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Celeste: ...It's fine.[p/] You can tell them.
translation: Celeste: ……没关系。[p/]可以告诉他们。

original: Tyrion: Alright...[p/] as long as it's okay with you.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]只要你不介意。

original: Tyrion: ...For the past few months,[p/] Celeste and I have been investigating who her birth parents are.
translation: Tyrion: ……过去数个月，[p/]塞莱斯特和我都在调查谁是她的亲生父母。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] I recall receiving many complaints about her during the Lords' Ball.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]我记得有不少人抱怨她在勋爵舞会期间的行为。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] Garrick Pierce had the information we were seeking.
translation: Tyrion: 理论上，[p/]加里克·皮尔斯握有我们寻找的答案。

original: Tyrion: That letter he sent us said that he wanted to "trade this information for his freedom".
translation: Tyrion: 寄给我们的信里说，他想“用这一信息交换自己的自由”。

original: Tyrion: I [i]assumed[/i] this meant that he wanted me to be his attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我[i]以为[/i]这是他让我当自己的律师。

original: Lucio: Do you honestly expect us to believe that?!
translation: Lucio: 你觉得我们会信？！

original: Lucio: Why would he ask for help from the attorney who indicted him in the first place?!
translation: Lucio: 为什么他要找给自己定罪的律师辩护？！

original: Tyrion: [i]We[/i] thought the same thing.
translation: Tyrion: [i]我们[/i]也这么想过。

original: Tyrion: And when we arrived for the meeting,[p/] it was clear [i]I[/i] wasn't the intended recipient.
translation: Tyrion: 到达会面地点时，[p/]皮尔斯找的人明显不是[i]我[/i]。

original: Tyrion: This means that Pierce sent that letter to someone else.
translation: Tyrion: 收到这封信的本应另有其人。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Lucio: ...You better not be lying to us, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: ……最好别让我发现你在说谎，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: Frankly,[p/] I don't much care if you believe me.
translation: Tyrion: 不绕弯子，[p/]我不在乎你信不信。

original: Tyrion: Regardless,[p/] if we examine every action Aria took,[p/] we can build a psychological profile of the Patron.
translation: Tyrion: 不提这个，[p/]仔细回顾阿莉亚的行为，[p/]我们可以完善签约人的心理档案。

original: Lucio: ...I [i]will[/i] give you that.
translation: Lucio: ……这一点确实。

original: Tyrion: To begin,[p/] the defense would like to call the Inquisition Commander to the stand.
translation: Tyrion: 首先，[p/]辩方希望传唤裁判所指挥官作证。

original: Tyrion: His testimony might shed some light on how von Sanctus and Sibyl died.
translation: Tyrion: 他的证言或许能解释冯·桑克图斯与希比尔的死亡之谜。

original: Tyrion: Despite all these witness accounts,[p/] we still only know how [i]Pierce[/i] was murdered.
translation: Tyrion: 尽管目击证词众多，[p/]我们明确知道的也只有[i]皮尔斯[/i]的死法。

original: Lucio: Yes...[p/] He was impaled using a blade magically frozen from his own blood.
translation: Lucio: 对……[p/]他被用自己的血冻成的魔法剑刃刺穿心脏。

original: In a grim sort of way,[p/] it's almost poetic that he died the same way Flinhart did.
translation: 这么说有点残酷，[p/]但他和弗林哈特死法一致也是受报应。

original: But you doubt that will give Celeste any kind of closure.
translation: 虽然这么说也不会让塞莱斯特更好受。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we need to find out [i]exactly[/i] how Aria murdered von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: 不管怎样，[p/]我们需要找出杀害这两人的[i]具体[/i]手段。

original: Tyrion: The massacre was swift and efficient.
translation: Tyrion: 屠杀高效迅速。

original: Tyrion: It must've required a lot of forethought and coordination.
translation: Tyrion: 事前规划与临场合作必不可少。

original: Tyrion: If we figured out who might've had this knowledge,[p/] we might be able to find out who did this.
translation: Tyrion: 如果能知道谁可能拥有足够情报，[p/]或许就能揪出幕后黑手。

original: Rath: I see...[p/] That sounds as good a plan as any.
translation: Rath: 我明白了……[p/]听起来是个很好的计划。

original: Lucio: Kingsguard![p/][s/] Escort Commander Orym White to the witness stand!
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队！[p/][s/]护送指挥官奥蒙·怀特上证人席！

original: Lucio: Witness.[p/] Please state your name and occupation.
translation: Lucio: 证人。[p/]请向法庭陈述你的姓名与职业。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Tyrion: Commander?
translation: Tyrion: 指挥官？

original: Orym: I'm sorry![p/][s/] I just can't do this!
translation: Orym: 对不起！[p/][s/]我做不到啊！

original: Orym: How am I supposed to act like this is normal?!
translation: Orym: 我怎么能若无其事？！

original: Orym: A giant lizard is standing [i]right[/i] behind me!
translation: Orym: 我[i]正后方[/i]可站着一只大蜥蜴！

original: Rath: ...Calling me a lizard is [i]highly[/i] offensive, commander.
translation: Rath: ……说我是蜥蜴可[i]非常[/i]粗鲁，指挥官。

original: Orym: S-[p/][s/]Sorry, your scaled lordship...[p/] sir...
translation: Orym: 对、[p/][s/]对不起，鳞甲领主……[p/]殿下……

original: Tyrion: Commander...[p/] Just try your best to testify about what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 指挥官……[p/]努力证言发生了什么就好。

original: Orym: Y-[p/][s/]Yeah...
translation: Orym: 好、[p/][s/]好的……

original: Orym: It all started when we received a report from the Kingsguard.[p/] The prosecutor attacked Prince Alaric and a fire had broken out in the Common Room.
translation: Orym: 一切都要从我们收到国王卫队报告时说起。[p/]检察官攻击了阿拉里克王子，公共休息室还着火了。

original: Orym: We weren't sure what the deal with Steelwind was.[p/] So we went to the Common Room to put out the fire.
translation: Orym: 我们不确定斯蒂尔文德那边怎么回事。[p/]就先去公共休息室帮忙灭火。

original: Orym: But when we got there,[p/] we noticed a bunch of unconscious knights in front of the Prayer Room.
translation: Orym: 但我们抵达时，[p/]发现一群卫兵昏倒在祷告室前。

original: Orym: We went to the Prayer Room.[p/] That's when we found Steelwind and Cuthbert unconscious next to Pierce's dead body.
translation: Orym: 我们就先去了祷告室。[p/]也在那里发现了皮尔斯的尸体，以及旁边失去意识的斯蒂尔文德和卡斯伯特。

original: Orym: We later found the bodies of von Sanctus and Sibyl too.[p/] That's when we realized that she offed all three of them.
translation: Orym: 之后我们也发现了冯·桑克图斯和希比尔的尸体。[p/]这时我们才意识到三个人都是被她杀害的。

original: Tyrion: So you still have no idea how Steelwind was used to murder von Sanctus or Sibyl?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你们还是不知道被操控的斯蒂尔文德怎么杀掉冯·桑克图斯与希比尔的？

original: Orym: Not a clue.
translation: Orym: 毫无头绪。

original: Orym: It's especially worse for von Sanctus.[p/] That fire burned a lot of the physical evidence off of his body.
translation: Orym: 冯·桑克图斯的情况更糟。[p/]火几乎烧掉了所有尸体上的线索。

original: Tyrion: What about Sibyl?[p/] Was there any physical evidence on her body?
translation: Tyrion: 那希比尔呢？[p/]她身上有没有留下线索？

original: Orym: No idea about that either.[p/] She didn't have any wounds either.
translation: Orym: 我也不清楚。[p/]她没有遭受外伤。

original: Orym: All we know is that she died of suffocation.
translation: Orym: 我们只知道她是窒息身亡。

original: Hm...[p/] There's definitely more information you can glean from their investigation.
translation: 嗯……[p/]调查中肯定还有其他信息。

original: Tyrion: And this is mainly based on Prince Alaric's testimony.[p/] Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 报告主要基于阿拉里克王子的证言。[p/]没错吧？

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] We still have no idea which [b]transmutation[/b] spell she hit him with.
translation: Orym: 没错。[p/]我们还是不知道她用的是什么[b]形变[/b]法术。

original: Tyrion: Judging from the time of the report,[p/] this must have been well after all three of the murders occurred.
translation: Tyrion: 根据报告时间来看，[p/]肯定是在三起谋杀过去一段时间以后。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] It was unfortunate how that played out.
translation: Orym: 对。[p/]这样的结果令人遗憾。

original: Orym: If Steelwind really [i]was[/i] controlled,[p/] whoever controlled her knew how to get the job done quickly.
translation: Orym: 如果斯蒂尔文德真的[i]被操控[/i]了，[p/]也是被效率很高的人操控。

original: That leaves the question of how they did this so efficiently.
translation: 问题就是为什么幕后黑手这么高效。

original: Tyrion: Was that wise?
translation: Tyrion: 这么做明智吗？

original: Tyrion: Regardless of who it was,[p/] someone assaulted a Prince of Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 不管犯人是谁，[p/]被攻击的可是维文加德王子。

original: Orym: We were already dealing with the King who was trapped in that [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Orym: 被[b]坚牢术[/b]困住的国王已经够让人忙活了。

original: Orym: Honestly,[p/] a [i]lot[/i] happened in that hour.
translation: Orym: 那一小时里发生了[i]太多[/i]。

original: Orym: And most of our attention was focused on keeping the royal family safe.
translation: Orym: 我们的注意力都放在保护皇室安全上。

original: Lucio: We can already conclude that the attack on the King was a distraction.
translation: Lucio: 现在已经能确定攻击国王是为了转移注意。

original: Lucio: Whoever orchestrated this must have known we'd focus our attention on keeping the royal family safe.
translation: Lucio: 策划这些的人知道，我们会集中力量保证皇室安全。

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] And the casualties still included many knights from the Kingsguard.
translation: 这也有道理。[p/]伤亡人数里也包括不少国王卫队的骑士。

original: They probably had to spread their forces thin to protect everyone else [i]and[/i] handle the fire in the Common Room.
translation: 保护其他人[i]和[/i]公共休息室的火势让兵力更为分散。

original: Lucio: What did you do when you arrived at the Common Room, commander?
translation: Lucio: 你到公共休息室以后都干了什么，平民？

original: Tyrion: Did you see Aria or Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 你有看见阿莉亚或者塞莱斯特吗？

original: Orym: No...[p/] We only saw the aftermath of their fight.
translation: Orym: 没有……[p/]只看见了她们搏斗后的一片狼藉。

original: Orym: There were marks and craters everywhere in that hallway.
translation: Orym: 走廊里到处都是印痕和凹坑。

original: Lucio: Pierce's time of death was 2:45 PM.
translation: Lucio: 皮尔斯的死亡时间是下午2:45。

original: Lucio: And the knights didn't arrive at the Common Room until 3:10 PM.
translation: Lucio: 骑士们直到下午3:10才抵达公共休息室。

original: Lucio: They didn't arrive at the Prayer Room until well after the battle had taken place.
translation: Lucio: 搏斗发生过去一阵后他们才到达祷告室。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Wouldn't that mean you were in that room with Pierce's body for twenty-five minutes?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你和皮尔斯的尸体在一起待了25分钟？

original: Tyrion: Why didn't you look for help?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么不找人帮忙？

original: Celeste: Y-[p/][s/]You weren't waking up for some reason.[p/] So I kept channeling my healing magic into you.
translation: Celeste: 因、[p/][s/]因为你醒不过来。[p/]所以我一直在给你传输治愈魔力。

original: Celeste: Looking back,[p/] I probably should have just looked for help.
translation: Celeste: 现在想想，[p/]我确实应该找人帮忙。

original: Celeste: But even if Aria was unconscious,[p/] I didn't want to leave you alone in that room with her...
translation: Celeste: 但即使阿莉亚失去意识了，[p/]当时我也不敢单独把你留在那里……

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...[p/] Sorry...
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/][s/]是啊……[p/]抱歉……

original: Recalling that moment is clearly taking a toll on her mind.
translation: 回忆当时的事让她很难受。

original: You should be more careful.
translation: 最好小心一点。

original: Tyrion: Judging from the timing,[p/] this would have been several minutes after he'd already died.
translation: Tyrion: 从时间来看，[p/]那时应该是他死后几分钟。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] And we had no idea what was going on.
translation: Orym: 对。[p/]我们当时一头雾水。

original: Orym: Pierce was already dead.[p/] And you and Steelwind were unresponsive.
translation: Orym: 皮尔斯已经死了。[p/]你和斯蒂尔文德也没有意识。

original: Tyrion: I can see why [i]I'd[/i] be unresponsive.[p/] I was hit with a spell specifically designed to make people sleep.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道[i]自己[/i]为什么没有意识。[p/]我当时被用了专门催眠别人的法术。

original: Tyrion: But why would Aria be unresponsive too?
translation: Tyrion: 但阿莉亚怎么也失去了意识？

original: Orym: We have no idea.[p/] We've never even [i]heard[/i] of demonic possession until today.
translation: Orym: 我们也不懂。[p/]恶魔操控的事情我们都是今天才[i]听说[/i]。

original: Orym: For all we know,[p/] it could've all been a side effect of being controlled for over an hour.
translation: Orym: 就我们掌握的情报而言，[p/]那可能是被操控意识一小时以上的后遗症。

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] But could that common thread truly be a mere coincidence?
translation: 这么说有道理。[p/]但这个方向的逻辑真的只是巧合吗？

original: Hm...[p/] That last statement was a little vague.
translation: 嗯……[p/]最后一句证词有点含糊。

original: Perhaps you should ask him to elaborate more on one of the murders.
translation: 也许应该让他针对其中一件谋杀案展开说明。

original: Tyrion: And due to the lack of physical evidence,[p/] you're not sure what she used.
translation: Tyrion: 由于缺少物证，[p/]你并不确定凶器。

original: Lucio: von Sanctus and Sibyl both died via suffocation.
translation: Lucio: 冯·桑克图斯与希比尔都是窒息死亡。

original: Lucio: We can probably assume that the Patron used the same method to murder both of them.
translation: Lucio: 我们可以假定签约人用相同手法杀害二人。

original: Tyrion: ...Well you know what they say about assuming.
translation: Tyrion: ……你也知道假定有什么问题。

original: Lucio: ...Don't be cute, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: ……别装可爱了，卡斯伯特。

original: Celeste: He can't help it.
translation: Celeste: 他就是这么可爱。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……啥？

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……啥？

original: ...[i]Anyways[/i],[p/] Lucio's assumption [i]does[/i] make sense.[p/] But you don't want to jump to conclusions yet.
translation: ……[i]总之[/i]，[p/]卢西奥的假设[i]确实[/i]合理。[p/]但你不想就这样得出结论。

original: Either way,[p/] is [i]von Sanctus[/i] the victim you want to focus on?
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]要详细问[i]冯·桑克图斯[/i]的案子吗？

original: Perhaps you should ask him to elaborate on one of the other murders.
translation: 也许应该让他针对其中一件谋杀案展开说明。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] [b]Fire Bolt[/b] [i]is[/i] in her [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 这样……[p/]她的[b]法术汇编[/b]里[i]的确[/i]包括[b]火焰箭[/b]。

original: Tyrion: And von Sanctus wasn't exactly a fighter, after all.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯也不是以战斗能力出名。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] The poor sap didn't have a chance.
translation: Orym: 是啊……[p/]这个可怜虫毫无胜算。

original: Orym: He must have been in immense pain from that attack.
translation: Orym: 攻击肯定使他痛苦异常。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Tyrion: And since someone cast [b]Mend Wounds[/b] on the body,[p/] we still don't know how.
translation: Tyrion: 因为有人在尸体上用了[b]疗愈术[/b]，[p/]窒息手段不得而知。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] It's going to be a real headache figuring that out.
translation: Orym: 对……[p/]想搞清楚很麻烦。

original: You're compelled to agree with him.[p/] No one saw the murder.
translation: 你也倾向这个观点。[p/]没人目击这起谋杀。

original: The High Speaker only witnessed the moment Aria dumped the body,[p/] and even [i]he[/i] didn't see that much.
translation: 大主教只看到了阿莉亚弃尸，[p/]看到的也不多。

original: Anyways,[p/] is Sibyl the victim you want to focus on?
translation: 总之，[p/]要详细问希比尔的案子吗？

original: Perhaps you should ask him to elaborate on one of the other murders.
translation: 也许应该让他针对其中一件谋杀案展开说明。

original: Tyrion: How did you know her body was there anyways?
translation: Tyrion: 你们怎么知道尸体在那里？

original: Orym: When bodies started dropping,[p/] we noticed that she was nowhere to be found.
translation: Orym: 屠杀开始后，[p/]我们发现哪儿都找不到她。

original: Orym: One of the Kingsguard cast [b]Locate Creature[/b], and realized she was somewhere in the lake.
translation: Orym: 国王卫队成员之一使用了[b]定位生物[/b]，发现她的位置在湖里。

original: Orym: It took us an hour before we finally fished her out.
translation: Orym: 把她捞出来花了我们一个小时。

original: Lucio: Based on the High Speaker's testimony,[p/] she was dead long before that.
translation: Lucio: 根据大主教的证言，[p/]她已经死亡多时了。

original: Tyrion: Out of all the murders,[p/] Pierce's is the one we have the most information about.
translation: Tyrion: 这些谋杀案里，[p/]皮尔斯的案子情报最多。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] From what it sounds like,[p/] this Patron wasn't planning to let McCoy live.
translation: Orym: 对。[p/]目前来看，[p/]签约人也没打算放过麦考伊。

original: Orym: That drawn-out fight must have really thrown a wrench into their plans.
translation: Orym: 那场持久战想必打了他们一个措手不及。

original: Lucio: I find [i]that[/i] a little strange though...
translation: Lucio: 我觉得[i]这[/i]有点奇怪……

original: Tyrion: ...How so?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么？

original: Lucio: My daughter is a worthless soldier.[p/] She has no talent for combat.
translation: Lucio: 我的女儿可当不了士兵。[p/]她一点战斗天赋都没有。

original: Lucio: And [i]I've[/i] experienced McCoy's battle prowess firsthand.
translation: Lucio: 而且我[i]本人[/i]体验过麦考伊的战斗能力。

original: Lucio: As much as I hate to admit it,[p/] McCoy should have easily overcome her in an even fight.
translation: Lucio: 虽然不愿意承认，[p/]但公平战斗的话，麦考伊应该能轻松碾压我的女儿。

original: Celeste: I-[p/]It was her magic that was the problem.
translation: Celeste: 她、[p/]她的魔法很难缠。

original: Celeste: And I had no idea what kind of spells she could throw at me.[p/] So I had to be careful.
translation: Celeste: 我也完全不知道她能用什么法术。[p/]所以必须小心应战。

original: Celeste: ...And despite everything,[p/] I [i]really[/i] didn't want to hurt her.
translation: Celeste: ……虽然发生了这么多，[p/]但我当时[i]真的[/i]不想伤害她。

original: Lucio: Hm...[p/] That kindness could be the death of you, McCoy.
translation: Lucio: 唔……[p/]太过善良会害死你的，麦考伊。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: ...It'd be better to just let that slide.
translation: ……还是别深究刚才的话了。

original: Anyways,[p/] is Pierce the victim you want to focus on?
translation: 总之，[p/]要详细问皮尔斯的案子吗？

original: Perhaps you should ask him to elaborate on one of the other murders.
translation: 也许应该让他针对其中一件谋杀案展开说明。

original: Tyrion: ...Which is strangely similar to how he murdered Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Tyrion: ……和皮尔斯杀害弗林哈特·麦考伊的手法如出一辙。

original: Lucio: Lord Pierce [i]was[/i] one of the targets of the Patron.
translation: Lucio: 皮尔斯勋爵[i]也是[/i]签约人的目标之一。

original: Lucio: It's likely they knew about what happened during McCoy's trials and drew inspiration from that.
translation: Lucio: 签约人可能知道麦考伊庭审的事，从中获得了灵感。

original: Tyrion: Still, though...[p/] It seems awfully creative for something that they came up with at the moment.
translation: Tyrion: 话是这么说……[p/]就算是临机应变，也太异想天开了吧。

original: Lucio: Well...[p/] Don't the legends say that [i]demons[/i] engage in contrapasso?
translation: Lucio: 这个嘛……[p/]应该就是[i]恶魔[/i]喜欢的“Contrapasso”吧？

original: Orym: ...Say what now?
translation: Orym: ……什么玩意儿？

original: Tyrion: Some people believe that when souls are sent to hell,[p/] they're punished in a way that relates to their sins.
translation: Tyrion: 这是《神曲》里的概念，[p/]灵魂被送往地狱后，[p/]会依照生前的罪行遭受惩罚。

original: Tyrion: In Pierce's case,[p/] he committed murder with a frozen blade.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯之前利用了冰冻剑刃杀人。

original: Tyrion: It's possible this Empress wanted the Patron to murder him in the same way.
translation: Tyrion: 女皇可能要求签约人用相同手法杀害他。

original: ...Although,[p/] you still can't say for sure...
translation: ……虽然，[p/]你还是不敢确定……

original: Despite how much you know,[p/] there are a lot of details missing about how von Sanctus and Sibyl died.
translation: 尽管已经知道不少，[p/]但冯·桑克图斯和希比尔的死还是有很多谜团。

original: But the Inquisition might have found some clues that you missed.
translation: 裁判所也许能找到你没发现的线索。

original: You should have the commander elaborate on what they know about each of the murders.
translation: 应该让指挥官针对每起谋杀案详细说明。

original: Tyrion: Your Grace![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下！[p/][s/]很明显证人的证言有矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Rath: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Rath: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: But whose murder should he elaborate on?
translation: 但选哪一起谋杀案呢？

original: Lloyd von Sanctus
translation: 洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯

original: Tyrion: Could you elaborate more on von Sanctus's murder?
translation: Tyrion: 能不能展开讲讲冯·桑克图斯谋杀案？

original: Tyrion: Was there any evidence that implied how he died?
translation: Tyrion: 有没有其他能解释他怎样身亡的证据？

original: Orym: Like I said,[p/] it's trickier with von Sanctus because the fire partially burned his body.
translation: Orym: 我刚才也说了，[p/]火几乎烧掉了所有尸体上的线索。

original: Orym: And our [b]divination[/b] magic could only tell that he died of suffocation.
translation: Orym: [b]占卜术[/b]只能分析出他死于窒息。

original: Tyrion: I see.[p/] So there's no other physical evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 明白了。[p/]也就是说没有物证。

original: Orym: Well, there [i]is[/i] one thing.
translation: Orym: 哎，倒是[i]有[/i]一件。

original: Orym: From his burn marks,[p/] we [i]do[/i] know that he was hit with a [b]Fire Bolt[/b] before he died.
translation: Orym: 烧伤痕迹可以判断，[p/]他死前曾被[b]火焰箭[/b]击中。

original: Orym: We're guessing she wanted to weaken him before she dealt the final blow.
translation: Orym: 我们猜她想在致命一击前削弱对手。

original: Tyrion: So he took a direct attack from her before he died.
translation: Tyrion: 所以他死前曾被直接攻击。

original: Coraline Sibyl
translation: 卡洛琳·希比尔

original: Tyrion: Could you elaborate more on Sibyl's murder?
translation: Tyrion: 能不能展开讲讲希比尔谋杀案？

original: Tyrion: Was there any evidence that implied how she died?
translation: Tyrion: 有没有其他能解释她怎样身亡的证据？

original: Orym: Using our [b]divination[/b] magic,[p/] we know she died of suffocation.
translation: Orym: [b]占卜术[/b]能分析出她死于窒息。

original: Orym: But we're not exactly sure how.
translation: Orym: 但我们不知道具体怎么做到的。

original: Tyrion: But unlike von Sanctus,[p/] Sibyl's body wasn't burned.
translation: Tyrion: 但和冯·桑克图斯不同，[p/]希比尔的尸体没有被烧过。

original: Tyrion: Shouldn't there have been wounds around her neck if she was suffocated?
translation: Tyrion: 如果是窒息而死，颈部周围不该有痕迹吗？

original: Orym: Well, we found traces of [b]necromancy[/b] on Sibyl.
translation: Orym: 哎，我们在希比尔身上发现了[b]死灵术[/b]的痕迹。

original: Orym: We think Steelwind cast [b]Mend Wounds[/b] on her body after she offed her.
translation: Orym: 我们认为杀掉希比尔后，斯蒂尔文德对尸体使用了[b]疗愈术[/b]。

original: Orym: This would've removed any wounds on the body.
translation: Orym: 去除了尸体上的所有外伤。

original: Tyrion: ...It's exactly like what happened with Catherine Bellwether.
translation: Tyrion: ……和凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟一模一样。

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] The only wounds she has are from the impact of falling into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Orym: 对……[p/]她身上唯一的伤势也是因落入迦拉克隆湖造成。

original: Garrick Pierce
translation: 加里克·皮尔斯

original: Tyrion: Could you elaborate more on Pierce's murder?
translation: Tyrion: 能不能展开讲讲皮尔斯谋杀案？

original: Tyrion: Was there any evidence that implied how he died?
translation: Tyrion: 有没有其他能解释他怎样身亡的证据？

original: Orym: Well, [i]that[/i] one is simple.
translation: Orym: 喔，[i]这个[/i]简单。

original: Orym: McCoy chased Steelwind into the Prayer Room but didn't arrive fast enough.
translation: Orym: 麦考伊追着斯蒂尔文德进了祷告室，但还是不够快。

original: Orym: When she got there,[p/] Pierce was already dead.
translation: Orym: 她抵达时，[p/]皮尔斯已经死了。

original: Orym: He was killed using a blade magically formed from his own blood.
translation: Orym: 他被用自己的血冻成的魔法剑刃杀死。

original: Tyrion: ...But why would she do something like that?
translation: Tyrion: ……可她为什么这么做？

original: Tyrion: When he murdered Flinhart McCoy,[p/] he only used [b]Shape Liquid[/b] to avoid leaving behind any evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 杀害弗林哈特·麦考伊时，[p/]皮尔斯用[b]形变液体[/b]是为了防止留下证据。

original: Tyrion: I doubt the Patron would make Steelwind do the same thing.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得签约人会让斯蒂尔文德做一样的事。

original: Tyrion: Their intent was to pin the crime on her.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人想把罪名栽赃给她。

original: Orym: We think she knew McCoy was on her tail.
translation: Orym: 我们认为她知道麦考伊在追自己。

original: Orym: She didn't have enough time to suffocate him as she did with von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Orym: 她没有足够时间令皮尔斯窒息。

original: Orym: And she didn't have any weapons on her.[p/] She must have had to improvise.
translation: Orym: 身上也没有携带武器。[p/]只能临机应变。

original: Tyrion: But she [i]has[/i] other spells that could've done the job.
translation: Tyrion: 但她确实还[i]有[/i]其他合适的法术。

original: Tyrion: She could have hit him with a [b]Steelwind Strike[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 她完全可以利用[b]斯蒂尔文德轰炸[/b]。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] I know from experience that she is [i]terrible[/i] at controlling that spell.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]前车之鉴告诉我她[i]不擅长[/i]这个法术。

original: Lucio: It's possible she didn't want to unleash such a powerful spell in a closed room.
translation: Lucio: 可能是她不想在狭小空间内用这么强力的法术。

original: That [i]sort[/i] of tracks.[p/] But it still doesn't feel right...
translation: [i]有点[/i]道理，[p/]但还是很怪……

original: But you can't really refute it now.[p/] It'd be best to move on.
translation: 现在没什么办法反驳。[p/]先继续吧。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] the other two murders were really well planned.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]另外两起谋杀都经过深思熟虑。

original: Tyrion: Pierce's murder was the only one that required improvisation.
translation: Tyrion: 只有杀害皮尔斯需要临场发挥。

original: Lucio: It's possible the Patron severely underestimated McCoy's combat capabilities.
translation: Lucio: 签约人可能严重低估了麦考伊的战斗能力。

original: Lucio: She fought my daughter for almost half an hour.
translation: Lucio: 她和我女儿打了快半小时。

original: Lucio: Meanwhile,[p/] the other two murders occurred within quick succession of one another.
translation: Lucio: 与此同时，[p/]另外两起谋杀快速连续发生。

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] I see what you mean.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯，[p/]我懂你的意思。

original: No One's
translation: 都不问

original: You decide to keep the testimony as is for now.
translation: 你决定先从现有证言入手。

original: Perhaps there's something there you can still use.
translation: 或许还有用得上的东西。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] please add this to your testimony, Commander White.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]请把这加入证言里，怀特指挥官。

original: Orym: Sure.[p/] Whatever you say, kid.
translation: Orym: 当然。[p/]都听你的，小子。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] That's strange.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]很奇怪。

original: Lucio: ...What is it now?
translation: Lucio: ……又怎么了？

original: Tyrion: Commander White.[p/] You said that Steelwind attacked von Sanctus with a [b]Fire Bolt[/b] [i]before[/i] she suffocated him.
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官。[p/]你说使其窒息[i]之前[/i]，斯蒂尔文德用[b]火焰箭[/b]攻击了冯·桑克图斯。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] She probably wanted to injure him so he'd be easier to subdue.
translation: Orym: 对。[p/]可能是要弱化他，方便杀害。

original: Tyrion: But [i]that's[/i] what I find strange.
translation: Tyrion: 就是[i]这一点[/i]奇怪。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus knew he was under attack.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯知道自己在被攻击。

original: Tyrion: So wouldn't he cast [b]Force Cage[/b] to repel her?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么不用[b]坚牢术[/b]反抗呢？

original: Orym: ...Hm.[p/] I guess that's true.
translation: Orym: ……嗯。[p/]是这么回事。

original: Lucio: Von Sanctus was hardly a warrior, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 冯·桑克图斯并不算强悍，卡斯伯特。

original: Lucio: Force Cage is an extremely useful spell.[p/] But it [i]has[/i] to be aimed.
translation: Lucio: 坚牢术确实很有用。[p/]但使用时[i]必须[/i]瞄准。

original: Lucio: He was hit with a [b]Fire Bolt[/b],[p/] and he must have been in immense pain.
translation: Lucio: 他先被[b]火焰箭[/b]击中，[p/]一定剧痛无比。

original: Lucio: I doubt he'd be able to think clearly under those circumstances.
translation: Lucio: 我不觉得那时他还有余力思考。

original: Tyrion: I'd normally agree with you.[p/] But the crime scene tells another story.
translation: Tyrion: 一般而言我也同意。[p/]但犯罪现场不是这么回事。

original: Rath: What do you mean, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Rath: 这是何意，卡斯伯特先生？

original: No...[p/] Steelwind's is somewhat believable.
translation: 不对……[p/]斯蒂尔文德说的也有可信度。

original: But you remember there's something you found at the crime scene.
translation: 但你记得自己在犯罪现场发现了什么东西。

original: And it tells you whether von Sanctus cast [b]Force Cage[/b] or not.
translation: 可以揭示冯·桑克图斯是否使用了[b]坚牢术[/b]的东西。

original: Tyrion: When we investigated the crime scene,[p/] we found traces of [b]abjuration[/b] magic that formed a perfect square around the body.
translation: Tyrion: 我们调查现场时，[p/]发现了[b]防护[/b]法术的痕迹，在尸体周围形成一个正方形。

original: Tyrion: I'm sure if we measured the dimensions of that square,[p/] it would be 10ft by 10ft.
translation: Tyrion: 如果量一下尺寸，[p/]边长肯定是10英尺。

original: Lucio: ...Which is the same length and width as the cube created by [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Lucio: ……与[b]坚牢术[/b]会形成的正方体长宽一致。

original: Tyrion: Like you said,[p/] he was in no shape to aim it.
translation: Tyrion: 你说得对，[p/]他没有余力瞄准。

original: Tyrion: So he cast [b]Force Cage[/b] on [i]himself[/i] to create a makeshift barrier.
translation: Tyrion: 所以他对[i]自己[/i]用了[b]坚牢术[/b]，做出临时屏障。

original: Lucio: Nonsense![p/][s/] If von Sanctus [i]had[/i] cast [b]Force Cage[/b] on himself,[p/] he should have been protected from further harm.
translation: Lucio: 荒唐！[p/][s/]如果冯·桑克图斯对自己用了[b]坚牢术[/b]，[p/]那应该不会再受伤了。

original: Lucio: The defendant wouldn't have been able to suffocate him after that.
translation: Lucio: 被告这之后也没办法让他窒息。

original: Tyrion: ...Perhaps there's some way to [i]bypass[/i] [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Tyrion: ……或许有[i]绕过[/i][b]坚牢术[/b]的方法。

original: Lucio: And [i]once[/i] again,[p/] your ignorance of the Arcane Arts is made apparent.
translation: Lucio: 我[i]重申[/i]一遍，[p/]你对奥术实在是无知。

original: Lucio: [b]Force Cage[/b] is one of the most powerful [b]abjuration[b/] spells in existence.
translation: Lucio: [b]坚牢术[/b]是现有最强的[b]防护[b/]法术之一。

original: Lucio: It can't be dispelled,[p/] and [i]no one[/i] could teleport into or out of it.
translation: Lucio: 无法被驱散，[p/]也[i]没人[/i]能通过传送出入。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] Aster was also trapped in a [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 没错……[p/]阿斯特也被[b]坚牢术[/b]所困。

original: Tyrion: And [i]he[/i] had to wait for the hour duration to elapse.
translation: Tyrion: [i]他[/i]也必须等待一小时结束。

original: Tyrion: So how [i]did[/i] Steelwind suffocate him?
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德怎么让他窒息而死的？

original: Tyrion: ...Wait.
translation: Tyrion: ……等等

original: Tyrion: If [b]Force Cage[/b] is a perfectly closed space,[p/] is it possible that he ran out of air?
translation: Tyrion: 如果[b]坚牢术[/b]是完全封闭的空间，[p/]他会不会是缺氧而死？

original: Lucio: That would be a [i]glaring[/i] weakness.
translation: Lucio: 那这弱点也太[i]抢眼[/i]了。

original: Lucio: House von Sanctus obviously designed that spell to allow oxygen through the barrier.
translation: Lucio: 冯·桑克图斯家专门设计让氧气可以进出正方体。

original: Lucio: ...And before you ask,[p/] poisonous gases can't be pushed through the barrier either.
translation: Lucio: ……在你发问之前，[p/]有毒气体是进不到里面的。

original: Lucio: Only oxygen can travel through it.
translation: Lucio: 只有氧气可以。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] And even if they [i]had[/i] used poisonous gas,[p/] the autopsy report wouldn't have said he was suffocated.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]如果用了有毒气体，[p/]尸检报告上也应该提到。

original: Only oxygen can travel through the bounds of a [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: 只有氧气能穿越[b]坚牢术[/b]的屏障。

original: So how did Aria suffocate von Sanctus despite that?
translation: 阿莉亚怎么让冯·桑克图斯窒息的？

original: No...[p/] Aria had no way to physically harm von Sanctus [i]or[/i] prevent him from breathing.
translation: 不对……[p/]阿莉亚没法通过物理手段阻止冯·桑克图斯呼吸。

original: If she was outside the [b]Force Cage[/b],[p/] how could she have suffocated him?
translation: 如果她在[b]坚牢术[/b]之外，[p/]怎么才能让他窒息呢？

original: Tyrion: [b]Force Cage[/b] is specifically designed to allow oxygen through its barrier.
translation: Tyrion: [b]坚牢术[/b]是允许氧气通过屏障的。

original: Tyrion: But what if there was no oxygen [i]left[/i] in the room?
translation: Tyrion: 那如果房间里一点氧气都[i]不剩了[/i]呢？

original: Lucio: No oxygen...?
translation: Lucio: 氧气没有了……？

original: Lucio: ...Ah,[p/] I see.
translation: Lucio: ……哦，[p/]是这样啊。

original: Rath: It was the fire in the Common Room.
translation: Rath: 是公共休息室里的火。

original: Rath: The Patron knew Aria couldn't harm von Sanctus once he was in that [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Rath: 签约人知道阿莉亚无法伤害[b]坚牢术[/b]内的冯·桑克图斯。

original: Rath: So she started a fire to eat all of the oxygen within the room.
translation: Rath: 所以她引起火势，耗尽室内氧气。

original: Tyrion: What [i]should[/i] have protected him ended up trapping him.
translation: Tyrion: [i]理应[/i]保护他的坚牢变成了真正的牢笼。

original: Tyrion: And the inability to dispel it ended up sealing his fate.
translation: Tyrion: 无法驱散的特性让他无从反抗。

original: Rath: Well, I suppose that explains how the defendant murdered von Sanctus.
translation: Rath: 好吧，看来这就是被告杀害冯·桑克图斯的方法。

original: Rath: But with that in mind...[p/] a [i]lot[/i] of this plan sounds like it was improvised at the moment.
translation: Rath: 不过既然如此……[p/]这计划的[i]很多[/i]部分听起来都是即兴而为。

original: Tyrion: Just like the murder of Pierce...
translation: Tyrion: 就和杀害皮尔斯一样……

original: Tyrion: And not only that.[p/] We assumed that the Patron used the same method to kill both Lord von Sanctus and Lady Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: 这还不算完。[p/]我们假定签约人用相同手段杀害了冯·桑克图斯和希比尔。

original: Tyrion: But I doubt Lady Sibyl died under the same circumstances.
translation: Tyrion: 但我不觉得希比尔小姐也是这么死的。

original: Lucio: Correct...[p/] There was only [i]one[/i] fire.
translation: Lucio: 没错……[p/]火灾只有[i]一场[/i]。

original: Lucio: And if Sibyl was in that [b]Force Cage[/b],[p/] the defendant wouldn't have been able to throw her body into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Lucio: 如果希比尔也对自己用了[b]坚牢术[/b]，[p/]被告也没法把她扔进迦拉克隆湖里。

original: Lucio: Which means Sibyl must have died by asphyxiation elsewhere.
translation: Lucio: 也就意味着希比尔是因其他原因缺氧死亡的。

original: Rath: Then it's clear our next course of action is to determine how [i]Lady Sibyl[/i] was murdered.
translation: Rath: 那之后就是要弄清[i]希比尔小姐[/i]怎么死亡了。

original: Tyrion: *sigh*[p/] But we still don't know [i]where[/i] she was murdered.
translation: Tyrion: *叹气*[p/]但我们还是不知道她的死亡[i]地点[/i]。

original: Rath: And the only witness who saw her around this time was the High Speaker.
translation: Rath: 当时唯一看到她的人就是大主教。

original: Lucio: ...Which was [i]after[/i] the defendant disposed of Sibyl's body.
translation: Lucio: ……而且是在被告丢弃尸体[i]之后[/i]。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] the High Speaker's testimony is as good a start as any.
translation: Tyrion: 哎，[p/]有大主教的证言也足够了。

original: Tyrion: For our next witness,[p/] the defence would like to call High Speaker Theon Archeus to the stand.
translation: Tyrion: 说到下一个目击证人，[p/]辩方希望传唤大主教希恩·阿契厄斯作证。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Tyrion: What's wrong?
translation: Tyrion: 怎么了？

original: Rath: ...It's nothing.[p/] Please carry on.
translation: Rath: ……没事。[p/]请继续。

original: Lucio: Kingsguard![p/][s/] Escort High Speaker Archeus to the witness stand!
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队！[p/][s/]护送大主教阿契厄斯上证人席！

original: Lucio: Witness.[p/] You will testify about-.
translation: Lucio: 证人。[p/]你将——

original: Theon: Oh, great and [i]blessed[/i] Scaled Lord!
translation: Theon: 哦！伟大的鳞甲领主[i]保佑[/i]！

original: Theon: To think you would grace us with your presence!
translation: Theon: 您的到来让我们倍感荣幸！

original: Rath: ...Oh my god.
translation: Rath: ……老天爷啊。

original: Theon: A-[p/][s/]Ah...!
translation: Theon: 啊、[p/][s/]啊……！

original: Theon: Forgive me, Lord Rathallion![p/][s/] I spoke out of turn! [mind="He must think I'm an arrogant fool!"/]
translation: Theon: 请原谅我，拉萨利昂大人！[p/][s/]是我逾越了！[mind="他肯定觉得我是个傲慢的蠢货！"/]

original: Wow...[p/] It looks like the [i]witness[/i] is schmoozing the judge for once.
translation: 哇塞……[p/]头一次见到证人想和法官贴贴的。

original: Rath: How many times do I have to tell you people that I'm [i]not[/i] a god!
translation: Rath: 还要我说多少次，我[i]不是[/i]神！

original: Rath: [i]Yes[/i]...[p/] I revere and serve the God of Dragons.[p/] But I'm [i]not[/i] Bahamut's avatar!
translation: Rath: [i]对[/i]……[p/]我敬奉龙族之神。[p/]但我不是巨龙之神巴哈姆特！

original: Theon: B-[p/][s/]But...[p/][s/] You're the [i]Scaled Lord[/i]!
translation: Theon: 但、[p/][s/]但是……[p/][s/]你是[i]鳞甲领主[/i]！

original: Rath: I'm just a [i]dragon[/i].[p/][s/] I'm not even a [i]powerful[/i] one!
translation: Rath: 我只是一条[i]龙[/i]。[p/][s/]甚至不是[i]强力[i]的那种！

original: Rath: I'm [i]not[/i] a deity!
translation: Rath: [i]不要[/i]神化我！

original: Theon: ...This humility.
translation: Theon: ……太谦虚了。

original: Theon: That's [i]exactly[/i] what Bahamut's avatar would say.
translation: Theon: [i]正是[/i]巨龙之神巴哈姆特会有的态度。

original: Rath: I swear to god...
translation: Rath:  我对天发誓……

original: Theon: He even swears by the god's name.
translation: Theon: 他甚至愿意对天起誓。

original: Rath: ...Lucio,[p/] please handle this.
translation: Rath: ……卢西奥，[p/]你来处理。

original: Lucio: Perhaps [i]another[/i] approach is warranted.
translation: Lucio: 看来得采取[i]其他[/i]方法了。

original: Lucio: High Speaker Archeus![p/][s/] The Great and [i]Powerful[/i] Rathallion calls upon you today!
translation: Lucio: 阿契厄斯大主教！[p/][s/]伟大而[i]强力[/i]的拉萨利昂今天召你来此！

original: Lucio: We require your-!
translation: Lucio: 我们需要你的——！

original: Theon: You require my blood?!
translation: Theon: 需要我的血吗？！

original: Theon: Of course![p/][s/] I will gladly give my [i]life[/i] for the Scaled Lord!
translation: Theon: 没问题！[p/][s/]鳞甲领主要我的[i]命[/i]都可以！

original: Lucio: ...What?![p/][s/] No!
translation: Lucio: ……啊？！[p/][s/]不对！

original: Theon: Of course![p/][s/] My blood could [i]never[/i] be enough!
translation: Theon: 当然不对！[p/][s/]我的血怎么够呢！

original: Lucio: Would you just let me-?!
translation: Lucio: 你让我说完——？！

original: Theon: I will do as you wish, my Lord!
translation: Theon: 主啊，我任您处置！

original: Theon: It might take some time, though.
translation: Theon: 要花点时间就是了。

original: Theon: I'll need some time to gather some followers and-.
translation: Theon: 召集追求者也需要时间——

original: Rath: Oh my god![p/][s/] We [i]just[/i] want your testimony!
translation: Rath: 老天爷啊！[p/][s/]我们只想要你的证言！

original: Rath: ...Just tell us what you saw when Ms. Steelwind was at the west-ward balcony yesterday.
translation: Rath: ……只需要你告诉我们，昨天在西侧阳台看见斯蒂尔文德女士干了什么。

original: Theon: ...O-[p/][s/]Oh, I see.
translation: Theon: ……噢、[p/][s/]噢，我明白了。

original: Theon: If [i]that's[/i] what you truly wish, my Lord.
translation: Theon: 主啊，如果这真的是您的愿望。

original: Tyrion: ...Are we just going to [i]ignore[/i] how ready he was to commit mass murder?
translation: Tyrion: ……我们就[i]不管[/i]他刚才的大屠杀宣言了？

original: Lucio: Be quiet![p/][s/] We [i]just[/i] got him to calm down!
translation: Lucio: 住嘴！[p/][s/]不要再挑动他了！

original: Theon: I was doing some paperwork in my quarters and I suppose I lost track of the time.[p/] My alarm went off and I realized that it was time for my afternoon prayers.
translation: Theon: 我在住所进行文书工作，忙到忘了时间。[p/]听到闹钟才想起来，该进行下午的祷告了。

original: Theon: I began heading to the Prayer Room when I spotted Lady Steelwind looking over the west-ward balcony.
translation: Theon: 我向着祷告室出发，发现斯蒂尔文德女士正在西侧阳台往下看。

original: Theon: I tried to greet her but she didn't respond to me.[p/] That's when I noticed she was pushing something large over the balcony and into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Theon: 我向她打招呼，但被无视了。[p/]这时我发现，她正从阳台把什么大东西推入迦拉克隆湖。

original: Theon: I asked her what she was doing.[p/] But again,[p/] she ignored me and went towards the Prayer Room.
translation: Theon: 我问她在干什么。[p/]但她还是无视了我，[p/]转身向祷告室走去。

original: Theon: I thought nothing of it and made my way there as well.[p/] That's when the guards there turned me away.
translation: Theon: 我没多想，也向祷告室走过去。[p/]看守的卫兵把我拦下了。

original: Theon: I went back to my quarters to do my Prayers there.
translation: Theon: 我就折返回自己的房间祈祷。

original: Tyrion: Considering the timing of it all,[p/] this must have all happened minutes before she began attacking the Prayer Room.
translation: Tyrion: 从时间上看，[p/]这些事就发生在她开始攻击祷告室几分钟前。

original: Theon: Yes...[p/] I consider myself lucky.[p/] The Scaled Lord must have graced me with divine luck.
translation: Theon: 是的……[p/]我很幸运。[p/]仁慈的鳞甲领主保佑了我。

original: Rath: Please.[p/] Just...[p/] stop.
translation: Rath: 拜托。[p/] 不要……[p/] 说了。

original: Considering how quickly she was moving,[p/] there [i]has[/i] to be a reason why she waited there.
translation: 考虑到她的移动迅速程度，[p/]等这几分钟一定有其理由。

original: Was she waiting for the High Speaker to leave?
translation: 她在等大主教离开吗？

original: Perhaps you should closely examine the timing of these events.
translation: 也许应该更仔细检查一下每件事发生的时间点。

original: Tyrion: An alarm?
translation: Tyrion: 闹钟？

original: Theon: It's a rudimentary artificery device.[p/] I use it to remind me to conduct daily prayers.
translation: Theon: 是一个很简单的奥术能源装置。[p/]我借此提醒自己每日祷告。

original: Tyrion: ...I see.[p/] And do you have it set to go off at a specific time?
translation: Tyrion: ……明白了。[p/]需要你本人设置闹钟时间吗？

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] It's set to go off at 2:10 PM: five minutes before my afternoon prayers.
translation: Theon: 需要。[p/]我设定的时间是下午 2:10：祷告五分钟前。

original: Tyrion: So you usually say your afternoon prayers at 2:15 PM?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你下午一般在 2:15 祷告？

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] It is said that time is the holiest hour of the God of Dragons: Bahamut.
translation: Theon: 是的。[p/]这也是巨龙之神巴哈姆特的神圣时刻。

original: Rath: ...This is the first [i]I've[/i] heard of this.
translation: Rath: ……[i]我[/i]倒是头一次听说。

original: Theon: Was I mistaken?!
translation: Theon: 我犯错了？！

original: Theon: Forgive me, my lord![p/] I can't believe I've dishonored your deity!
translation: Theon: 主啊，请原谅我！[p/]我竟然亵渎了神灵！

original: Rath: Ugh...[p/] You know what?
translation: Rath: 呜呃……[p/]算了算了。

original: Rath: Just forget I said anything...
translation: Rath: 忘掉刚才的话吧……

original: Tyrion: What was her expression like?
translation: Tyrion: 她是什么表情？

original: Theon: It was very cold and emotionless.
translation: Theon: 冰冷且没有感情。

original: Lucio: ...The Patron must have had control of her when this happened.
translation: Lucio: ……当时她肯定还在被签约人操控。

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] That certainly makes the most sense.
translation: Theon: 确实。[p/]这样解释最合理。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/]
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]

original: Tyrion: What time did this happen?
translation: Tyrion: 具体时间是？

original: Theon: It was shortly after my alarm went off.[p/] It would definitely be before 2:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我的闹钟响完不久。[p/]肯定是在下午 2:15 之前。

original: Tyrion: So she was looking over Lake Galakrond?
translation: Tyrion: 所以她在看迦拉克隆湖？

original: Theon: Knowing what I know now,[p/] it's possible that she was making sure she could throw Lady Sibyl's body [i]into[/i] the lake from there.
translation: Theon: 现在想来，[p/]她可能在检查能不能从这里把希比尔小姐的尸体丢[i]入[/i]湖里。

original: Tyrion: But she was clearly fine with [i]you[/i] witnessing her act suspiciously.
translation: Tyrion: 但她好像不介意[i]你[/i]在旁边看着啊。

original: Tyrion: Why would she even go to the trouble of hiding Sibyl's body in the first place?
translation: Tyrion: 说到底，为什么她要大费周章藏尸呢？

original: Lucio: The patron clearly needed to delay when the murders were discovered.
translation: Lucio: 签约人明显是为了推迟谋杀案被发现的时间。

original: Lucio: The defendant wasn't able to murder Pierce until much later, after all.
translation: Lucio: 毕竟被告很晚才成功杀害了皮尔斯。

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] But they probably didn't [i]plan[/i] to fight Celeste for that long.
translation: 的确说得通。[p/]但他们应该没有[i]预料[/i]到要和塞莱斯特打那么久。

original: There [i]has[/i] to be a reason why she threw Sibyl's body into the lake.
translation: 她把希比尔的尸体丢入湖里[i]一定[/i]是有理由的。

original: Tyrion: So she ignored you?[p/] What was her expression like?
translation: Tyrion: 你被无视了？她是什么表情？

original: Theon: It was very cold and emotionless.
translation: Theon: 冰冷且没有感情。

original: Lucio: ...The Patron must have had control of her when this happened.
translation: Lucio: ……当时她肯定还在被签约人操控。

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] That certainly makes the most sense.
translation: Theon: 确实。[p/]这样解释最合理。

original: Tyrion: What time did this encounter happen?
translation: Tyrion: 你什么时间遇见她的？

original: Theon: It was shortly after my alarm went off.[p/] It was definitely before 2:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我的闹钟响完不久。[p/]肯定是在下午 2:15 之前。

original: Tyrion: ...And that must have been Sibyl's body.
translation: Tyrion: ……一定是希比尔的尸体。

original: Theon: ...I suppose so.
translation: Theon: ……应该是的。

original: Tyrion: ...You don't sound so sure of it yourself.
translation: Tyrion: ……听起来没什么自信啊。

original: Theon: It's just that I recall Lady Sibyl's garb to be much brighter.
translation: Theon: 我印象里希比尔小姐的衣袍颜色更为鲜艳。

original: Theon: Meanwhile,[p/] the thing I saw Lady Steelwind throw over the balcony was much darker.
translation: Theon: 可是，[p/]斯蒂尔文德女士扔进湖里的东西颜色暗沉。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] You mentioned that before.
translation: Tyrion: 对了……[p/]你之前也提到过。

original: Lucio: It's clear it was just a trick of the sunlight.
translation: Lucio: 肯定只是阳光的影响。

original: Lucio: That balcony is directly above where we found Lady Sibyl's body in Lake Galakrond.
translation: Lucio: 阳台就在希比尔小姐尸体的发现位置正上方。

original: Lucio: You [i]obviously[/i] saw the defendant dumping the body.
translation: Lucio: [i]很明显[/i]，你看到的是被告在丢弃尸体。

original: Lucio: What [i]else[/i] could it have been?
translation: Lucio: 不然还能是什么？

original: Theon: Yes...[p/] I suppose you're right.
translation: Theon: 嗯……[p/]你说的大概没错。

original: Tyrion: The Patron was probably trying to keep her on track.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人可能在操控她赶时间。

original: Tyrion: But I'm surprised she didn't attack you.
translation: Tyrion: 但您没被攻击还是让我很惊讶。

original: Tyrion: Even if the Patron was trying to frame her,[p/] she hadn't killed Pierce yet.
translation: Tyrion: 就算假设签约人要栽赃，[p/]当时她也还没杀掉皮尔斯。

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] I'm a little confused about that myself.
translation: Theon: 是的。[p/]这一点我也不明白。

original: Theon: But perhaps I should just be happy I came out of that encounter unharmed.
translation: Theon: 可能我该庆幸自己毫发无损。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] how long did you talk to her?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]你们相遇多久？

original: Theon: Our encounter was very brief since she was ignoring me.
translation: Theon: 因为她根本没理我，所以时间不长。

original: Theon: It couldn't have lasted for more than two minutes.
translation: Theon: 感觉不超过两分钟。

original: Tyrion: It must have been a short exchange then.
translation: Tyrion: 看来你们只是擦肩而过啊。

original: Lucio: The Patron was controlling her at the time.
translation: Lucio: 签约人当时正在控制她。

original: Lucio: They must have been hoping that he would leave if she ignored him.
translation: Lucio: 肯定是觉得无视的话大主教就会更快离开。

original: But wouldn't it have been easier to just murder him then and there?
translation: 但是就地把他杀了不也很容易？

original: She could have easily done it quickly and thrown his body into the lake.[p/] Just like she did with Sibyl.
translation: 杀了大主教然后把他也扔进湖里应该不难。[p/]就像对希比尔做的那样。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] And these guards are still comatose.
translation: Tyrion: 是说……[p/]这些看守还在昏迷中。

original: It makes you uneasy that you [i]still[/i] don't have an explanation for that.
translation: [i]依然[/i]找不到合理解释让你很不自在。

original: Did the Empress of Discord use some kind of demonic magic to do that?
translation: 无序女皇用了什么恶魔才会的魔法吗？

original: The Eye of Horus doesn't leave magical traces.[p/] So it's possible that demonic magic is the same.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼并不会留下魔法痕迹。[p/]恶魔可能也有类似能力。

original: Either way,[p/] it's awfully convenient he left right [i]before[/i] the attack on the Prayer Room happened.
translation: 总之，[p/]他刚好在攻击开始[i]前[/i]离开祷告室有点太碰巧了。

original: But you suppose you'll have to put a pin in that for now.
translation: 但现在也只能暂时记在心里。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] what time did this happen?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]这是什么时候发生的？

original: Theon: I believe it was 2:15 PM.[p/] That's when I usually arrive at the Prayer Room.
translation: Theon: 应该是下午 2:15。[p/]我通常也是这个时间抵达祷告室。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] And these guards are still comatose.
translation: Tyrion: 是说……[p/]这些看守还在昏迷中。

original: It makes you uneasy that you [i]still[/i] don't have an explanation for that.
translation: [i]依然[/i]找不到合理解释让你很不自在。

original: Did the Empress of Discord use some kind of demonic magic to do that?
translation: 无序女皇用了什么恶魔才会的魔法吗？

original: The Eye of Horus doesn't leave magical traces.[p/] So it's possible that demonic magic is the same.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼并不会留下魔法痕迹。[p/]恶魔可能也有类似能力。

original: Either way,[p/] it's awfully convenient he left right [i]before[/i] the attack on the Prayer Room happened.
translation: 总之，[p/]他刚好在攻击开始[i]前[/i]离开祷告室有点太碰巧了。

original: But you suppose you'll have to put a pin in that for now.
translation: 但现在也只能暂时记在心里。

original: Tyrion: You were in your quarters during the massacre?
translation: Tyrion: 屠杀期间你一直呆在房间里？

original: Theon: Yes.[p/] As I've mentioned before,[p/] my room is magically soundproof.
translation: Theon: 是的。[p/]之前也提到过，[p/]我的房间利用魔法做了隔音。

original: Theon: My guards and I were woefully unaware of what was happening.
translation: Theon: 房间看守和我都完全没意识到在发生什么。

original: Theon: We didn't know what was happening until some members of the Kingsguard came to inform me of what had happened to the King.
translation: Theon: 直到国王卫队成员来通知我，我们才知道国王身上发生了什么。

original: So members of the Kingsguard were there with him. And he mentioned that his "guards" were there too.
translation: 国王卫队的成员和他自己的“看守”当时都在场。

original: They can all probably verify this.[p/] But it's still a little hard to believe how close he came to harm that day.
translation: 那些人应该也能证实大主教没有撒谎。[p/]虽然他这逃过一劫还是太巧合了。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] how long were you in your quarters for?
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]你在房间里待了多久。

original: Theon: I waited there until the Kingsguard notified me that it was safe.
translation: Theon: 一直待到国王卫队说已经安全了。

original: Theon: I think I waited there until 3:15 PM.
translation: Theon: 我想应该是直到下午 3:15。

original: Which was around the time that Aria was arrested.
translation: 就是阿莉亚被捕的时间。

original: Tyrion: Which means you were in your quarters until the massacre ended.
translation: Tyrion: 所以屠杀结束前你都在自己的房间里。

original: Tyrion: Did your guards see Steelwind during that time?
translation: Tyrion: 这期间你的看守有看到斯蒂尔文德吗？

original: Theon: No.[p/] They didn't.
translation: Theon: 他们没有。

original: Theon: And all we knew was that His Majesty had been trapped.
translation: Theon: 我们只知道国王陛下被困住了。

original: Theon: We had no idea Lady Steelwind had been attacking people at that point.
translation: Theon: 我们并不知道斯蒂尔文德女士当时在攻击别人。

original: Lucio: It's clear that the High Speaker wasn't one of the Patron's targets.
translation: Lucio: 大主教明显不是签约人的目标之一。

original: Lucio: They made no attempt to direct my daughter there.
translation: Lucio: 签约人完全没想过让我的女儿和大主教对上。

original: There's a very small time frame between Sibyl's death and Aria's attack on the Prayer Room.
translation: 希比尔死亡和阿莉亚攻击祷告室之间的时间很短。

original: The details of his testimony could make a huge difference depending on when each event happened.
translation: 他证言中的细节可能会让已知时间线产生重大变动。

original: You should see if he remembers the exact time each part of his testimony occurred.
translation: 应该问问看他是否记得不同事件发生的时间点。

original: Tyrion: Your Grace![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下！[p/][s/]很明显证人的证言有矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Rath: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Rath: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] What?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]什么？

original: Theon: ...Is something wrong?
translation: Theon: ……有什么事吗？

original: Tyrion: There [i]is[/i],[p/] but...
translation: Tyrion: 确实[i]有[/i]，但是……

original: Tyrion: I'm not really sure what it means.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不太明白这意味着什么。

original: Lucio: Stop stammering and [i]say what you want to say[/i]!
translation: Lucio: 别含糊了，[i]好好解释你的意思[/i]！

original: Tyrion: High Speaker.[p/] You said that you saw Aria dumping [i]something[/i] over the ledge of the balcony.
translation: Tyrion: 大主教。[p/]您说看到阿莉亚把[i]什么东西[/i]从阳台扔下去。

original: Lucio: There's no need to be vague, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 不要打马虎眼，卡斯伯特。

original: Lucio: It's clear from the evidence that he saw my daughter dumping Lady Sibyl's body.
translation: Lucio: 证据表明他看到的是希比尔小姐的尸体。

original: Tyrion: That's the thing, Lord Steelwind.[p/] It [i]couldn't[/i] have been Sibyl's [i]body[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 就是这个问题，斯蒂尔文德勋爵。[p/]那[i]不可能[/i]是希比尔小姐的[i]尸体[/i]

original: Lucio: ...What are you talking about?
translation: Lucio: ……你在说什么？

original: Lucio: The location from that balcony to where we found Lady Sibyl's body lines up perfectly!
translation: Lucio: 阳台正好就在希比尔小姐尸体的发现位置正上方！

original: Tyrion: That may be.[p/] But the witness just said he saw Aria dumping the body [i]before[/i] 2:15 PM.
translation: Tyrion: 这点没错。[p/]但证人看见阿莉亚弃尸是在下午 2:15 [i]之前[/i]。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: ...Wait.
translation: Lucio: ……等等

original: Tyrion: You see it too, don't you Lucio?
translation: Tyrion: 你也懂了吧，卢西奥？

original: Tyrion: How did Aria dump Coraline Sibyl's body into Lake Galakrond [i]before[/i] 2:15 PM...
translation: Tyrion: 如果希比尔小姐的死于下午 2:18……

original: Tyrion: ...if her time of death was 2:[i]18[/i] PM?!
translation: Tyrion: ……阿莉亚怎么可能在下午 2:15 之前弃尸湖中？！

original: Rath: I see...[p/] That [i]does[/i] seem peculiar.
translation: Rath: 我明白了……[p/]的确很奇怪。

original: Lucio: But we [i]know[/i] the defendant threw Sibyl's body from that balcony.
translation: Lucio: 但被告从阳台弃尸是[i]已知[/i]事实。

original: Lucio: There would be no other explanation for how it ended up there.
translation: Lucio: 不然没法解释尸体怎么去了湖里。

original: Tyrion: Yes...[p/] That's also true.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]你说得也对。

original: Rath: Perhaps she was still alive when Aria threw her off of that balcony.
translation: Rath: 也许阿莉亚把她从阳台扔下去的时候，希比尔还活着。

original: Rath: She could have been knocked unconscious with a [b]Sleep[/b] spell.
translation: Rath: 她可能被[b]睡眠术[/b]影响而失去了意识。

original: Lucio: Your Grace.[p/] There were no traces of [b]conjuration[/b] magic on her body.
translation: Lucio: 巨龙殿下。[p/]她的尸体上没有[b]召唤[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Lucio: And even if she [i]was[/i] asleep,[p/] she wouldn't have survived a fall from that height.
translation: Lucio: 即使她[i]确实[/i]睡着了，[p/]从那么高的地方摔下来也不可能生还。

original: Lucio: The distance from that balcony to the lake is more than thirty stories.
translation: Lucio: 阳台离湖面差着 30 层楼的高度。

original: Lucio: And the autopsy report says that the cause of death was suffocation,[p/] not blunt force.
translation: Lucio: 尸检报告也说了死因是窒息，[p/]不是从高处坠落。

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 没错……

original: So when [i]did[/i] she die?
translation: 那她什么时候死的？

original: :The High Speaker testified that he saw Aria dumping the body before 2:15 PM.
translation: 大主教说他看见阿莉亚弃尸是在下午 2:15 [i]之前[/i]。

original: Was he mistaken?[p/] Perhaps the time was later than he'd thought.
translation: 他记错了吗？[p/]也许时间其实更晚。

original: :No...[p/] Celeste began fighting Aria at 2:20 PM.
translation: 不对……[p/]塞莱斯特和阿莉亚开始对战是在下午 2:20。

original: :If the High Speaker saw her dumping Sibyl at 2:18 PM,[p/] he would have been close enough to hear the fight break out.
translation: 如果大主教目击弃尸是在下午 2:18，[p/]肯定也能听到争斗的声音。

original: She could have only died after Aria dumped her off the ledge.
translation: 希比尔一定是在被从阳台丢下后死亡。

original: Did she die [i]while[/i] she was falling?
translation: 那她是在坠落[i]途中[/i]死亡的吗？

original: No...[p/] The cause of death was suffocation.
translation: 不对……[p/]死因是窒息。

original: Aria couldn't have possibly suffocated her while she was falling toward Lake Galakrond.
translation: 阿莉亚不可能在她落入迦拉克隆湖途中使其窒息。

original: There were no wounds on the body.[p/] This means Aria couldn't have obstructed her airway [i]after[/i] she was thrown off of the balcony.
translation: 尸体上也没有伤口。[p/]希比尔被扔下阳台[i]以后[/i]，阿莉亚就没法影响她了。

original: Tyrion: She must have died [i]after[/i] she hit the water.
translation: Tyrion: 她只能是落入水中[i]之后[/i]才死亡。

original: Rath: But Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] Lucio just said that she would have died upon impact.
translation: Rath: 但是卡斯伯特先生，[p/]卢西奥已经说了她不是因坠落冲击而死。

original: Tyrion: But that's [i]assuming[/i] she didn't do anything to lessen the blow.
translation: Tyrion: 这是以她没有尝试减缓冲击为[i]前提[/i]的结论。

original: Tyrion: She might have had the opportunity to cast a spell to protect herself.
translation: Tyrion: 可能她当时有机会施法保护自己。

original: Tyrion: That [i]might[/i] explain why her body isn't as damaged despite falling from such a great height.
translation: Tyrion: [i]也许[/i]这就是她从高处坠落身体上却没有受伤的原因。

original: Lucio: Again.[p/] [i]That[/i] doesn't match with the evidence.
translation: Lucio: 重复一遍。[p/][i]这么[/i]解释和证据相悖。

original: Lucio: Lady Sibyl's [b]Spell Compendium[/b] contains the spell: [b]Slow Fall[/b].
translation: Lucio: 希比尔小姐的[b]法术汇编[/b]里包含[b]缓降术[/b]

original: Lucio: If she had the opportunity to cast a spell,[p/] she would have used [i]that[/i] spell to slow her descent.
translation: Lucio: 如果她有施法机会，[p/]肯定要优先用[i]这个[/i]法术来降低坠落速度。

original: Lucio: And she wouldn't have taken [i]any[/i] damage from hitting the lake if she'd done that.
translation: Lucio: 如果这么做了，坠落湖面时也不会受到[i]任何[/i]伤害。

original: Tyrion: That's...[p/] a really good point.
translation: Tyrion: 这是个……[p/]很好的问题。

original: Tyrion: But just indulge me for a second.
translation: Tyrion: 不过就忍我一下。

original: No...[p/] Sibyl [i]could[/i] have used [b]Slow Fall[/b].
translation: 不对……[p/]希比尔虽然[i]能够[/i]使用[b]缓降术[/b]。

original: But if she did,[p/] she wouldn't have taken [i]any[/i] injuries from hitting Lake Galakrond.
translation: 但如果确实如此，[p/]她在坠落迦拉克隆湖时就不会受到[i]任何[/i]伤害。

original: For whatever reason,[p/] she must have been protected by another spell.
translation: 虽然理由不明，[p/]但她用的肯定是另一种法术。

original: One that lessened the impact, but didn't completely negate it.
translation: 一种能减缓冲击，但不会完全消除的法术。

original: No...[p/] Sibyl must have used a spell that would've lessened the impact of hitting Lake Galakrond.
translation: 不……[p/]希比尔一定是用了能减缓坠湖冲击的法术。

original: Which spell in her [b]Compendium[/b] would do that?
translation: 她的[b]法术汇编[/b]里有什么法术能做到这点吗？

original: Tyrion: She must have cast [b]Stone Skin[/b] on herself.
translation: Tyrion: 她一定是对自己用了[b]岩石护甲[/b]。

original: Lucio: [b]Stone Skin[/b]...?
translation: Lucio: [b]岩石护甲[/b]……？

original: Tyrion: If you recall,[p/] the High Speaker mentioned that something was strange about the object Aria threw over the balcony.
translation: Tyrion: 请回忆一下，[p/]大主教提到过阿莉亚扔下阳台的东西有个奇怪之处。

original: Tyrion: It was much darker,[p/] and didn't match with Sibyl's usual garb.
translation: Tyrion: 颜色看起来很暗，[p/]和希比尔日常的衣着不符。

original: Tyrion: Almost as if there was something else Sibyl was "wearing".
translation: Tyrion: 就仿佛她“穿着”其他东西。

original: Rath: That "object" was actually Lady Sibyl protected by a layer of stone.
translation: Rath: 这个“物体”其实是被岩石层包裹的希比尔小姐。

original: Lucio: But that [i]still[/i] doesn't explain why she would cast [i]that[/i] instead of [b]Slow Fall[/b].
translation: Lucio: 但这[i]还是[/i]解释不了她为什么不用[b]缓降术[/b]。
