original: He's right...
translation: 他说得对……

original: No...[p/] From the evidence you have,[p/] Sibyl [i]must[/i] have cast [b]Stone Skin[/b] on herself for some reason.
translation: 等等……[p/]根据你手里的证据，[p/]希比尔[i]肯定[/i]因为某种理由用了[b]岩石护甲[/b]。

original: There has to be an explanation for why she did that.
translation: 一定有合理的解释。

original: Tyrion: She cast [b]Stone Skin[/b] on herself [i]before[/i] she was thrown into the lake.
translation: Tyrion: 她在被扔进湖里[i]之前[/i]对自己使用了[b]岩石护甲[/b]。

original: Tyrion: Aria must have attacked her.[p/] And she cast that spell in response.
translation: Tyrion: 一定是阿莉亚攻击了她。[p/]希比尔小姐这才使用法术保护自己。

original: Lucio: Hm...[p/] That [i]would[/i] protect her from the [b]Steelwind Strike[/b].
translation: Lucio: 唔……[p/]确实这能保护她不受[b]斯蒂尔文德轰炸[/b]伤害。

original: Theon: But that doesn't seem quite right.
translation: Theon: 但是不太对啊。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 您的意思是？

original: Theon: I may not have seen much.[p/] But I saw that the object Aria dumped was stiff and motionless.
translation: Theon: 可能我看见的不多。[p/]但阿莉亚扔的东西僵直不动。

original: Theon: If it [i]had[/i] been Lady Sibyl,[p/] she would have been struggling against her. Wouldn't she?
translation: Theon: 如果是希比尔小姐，[p/]她不该挣扎反抗吗？

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] a good point too...
translation: Tyrion: 这也是个……[p/]很好的问题。

original: Tyrion: The High Speaker saw Aria dumping a motionless Sibyl.
translation: Tyrion: 大主教看见阿莉亚扔下了不会动的希比尔。

original: Tyrion: But if we assume my logic is correct,[p/] she would've [i]also[/i] still been alive.
translation: Tyrion: 假设我的思路没错，[p/]她当时应该还活着。

original: Tyrion: So why wasn't she struggling against Aria?
translation: Tyrion: 那她为什么没有挣扎反抗？

original: No...[p/] Following your logic thus far,[p/] Sibyl was affected by [b]Stone Skin[/b] [i]and[/i] she was still conscious.
translation: 等等……[p/]根据你目前的思路，[p/]希比尔对自己用了[b]岩石护甲[/b]，而且还有意识。

original: She would be immune to most blunt force impacts.
translation: 那她应该能免疫大部分攻击。

original: She must have been affected by a spell.
translation: 肯定还有别的法术影响了她。

original: And considering it kept her from resisting Aria,[p/] the Patron must have made [i]Aria[/i] cast that spell on her.
translation: 既然这个法术让她无法反抗阿莉亚，[p/]肯定是签约人控制阿莉亚对她施法。

original: No...[p/] Aria must've cast a spell on Sibyl.
translation: 不……[p/]阿莉亚肯定对希比尔施法了。

original: And that spell would have prevented her from resisting Aria while she threw her off of the balcony.
translation: 而且是能让希比尔被从阳台扔下去也无法反抗的法术。

original: Tyrion: It was [b]Hold Creature[/b]!
translation: Tyrion: 是[b]定身术[/b]！

original: Tyrion: Sibyl must have cast [b]Stone Skin[/b] on herself when Aria attacked her.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔在被阿莉亚攻击时对自己用了[b]岩石护甲[/b]。

original: Tyrion: The Patron must have known that Aria couldn't physically damage her like that.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人知道这种情况下，阿莉亚不能用物理手段伤害她。

original: Tyrion: So they ordered her to restrain Sibyl with that spell!
translation: Tyrion: 所以签约人就让阿莉亚以此拘束希比尔！

original: Lucio: ...!
translation: Lucio: ……！

original: Lucio: And Sibyl died by suffocation...
translation: Lucio: 希比尔是窒息而死……

original: Tyrion: That's right, Lucio.
translation: Tyrion: 没错，卢西奥。

original: Tyrion: Even if she was restrained,[p/] Sibyl was still protected by [b]Stone Skin[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 即使被拘束后，[p/][b]岩石护甲[/b]仍在保护希比尔。

original: Tyrion: That would've left only [i]one[/i] option for the Patron.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人只有[i]一个[/i]办法。

original: No...[p/] The Patron must have known that they couldn't physically harm Sibyl.
translation: 不对……[p/]签约人肯定知道当时不能用物理手段伤害希比尔。

original: But they needed to murder her quickly before the Kingsguard realized what was going on.
translation: 但又必须在国王卫队赶到前杀害她。

original: Tyrion: Sibyl suffocated when Aria threw her into Lake Galakrond.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔在被阿莉亚扔进迦拉克隆湖中后窒息。

original: Tyrion: Her [b]Stone Skin[b/] lessened the impact of the fall.[p/] But it also made her drop like a literal rock.
translation: Tyrion: 她的[b]岩石护甲[b/]减缓了坠落冲击。[p/]但这也让她像岩石那样在湖中下沉。

original: Tyrion: Aria's [b]Hold Creature[/b] spell prevented her from moving or releasing her spell.
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚的[b]定身术[/b]让她无法移动或施法。

original: Tyrion: She was helpless as she sank to the bottom of the lake!
translation: Tyrion: 她只能无助的沉下湖底！

original: Rath: I believe that covers all three of the murders then.
translation: Rath: 三起谋杀案都水落石出了。

original: Lucio: Yes...
translation: Lucio: 对……

original: Lucio: Lord von Sanctus suffocated to death in his own [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Lucio: 冯·桑克图斯勋爵在自己的[b]坚牢术[/b]中窒息。

original: Lucio: Lady Sibyl drowned after Aria cast [b]Hold Creature[/b] on her.
translation: Lucio: 希比尔小姐在被阿莉亚使用[b]定身术[/b]后淹死。

original: Lucio: And Lord Pierce died after being wounded by a blade created with [b]Shape Liquid[/b].
translation: Lucio: 皮尔斯勋爵则因[b]形变液体[/b]创造的剑刃死亡。

original: Rath: Hm...
translation: Rath: 唔……

original: Rath: The only common thread I see is that the Patron used some of the victims' magics against them.
translation: Rath: 在我看来唯一的共同点，就是签约人都用了受害者也会的法术进行攻击。

original: ...But how does that connect to Pierce?
translation: ……但这在皮尔斯案里有什么意义？

original: Did he cast [b]Shape Liquid[/b] to make a blade to defend himself?
translation: 难道他为了自保用[b]形变液体[/b]创造了剑刃？

original: Maybe the murderer took it from him and used it against him.
translation: 凶手可能利用这点，用皮尔斯创造的剑杀害了他。

original: ...No.[p/] But he was knocked unconscious alongside you.
translation: ……不对。[p/]他和你一起失去了意识。

original: He [i]couldn't[/i] have been the one to create that blade.
translation: 创造剑刃的人[i]不可能[/i]是皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] whoever did this had an in-depth knowledge of each of the spells they used to defend themselves.
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/]凶手肯定非常了解受害者用来自卫的法术。

original: Tyrion: They knew that Von Sanctus couldn't dispel his own [b]Force Cage[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 凶手知道冯·桑克图斯无法驱散自己的[b]坚牢术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: And they also knew that he still needed oxygen from within it.
translation: Tyrion: 也知道他仍然需要氧气。

original: Tyrion: And in Sibyl's case,[p/] they knew Aria couldn't physically harm her once she had [b]Stone Skin[/b] active.
translation: Tyrion: 希比尔这边，[p/]凶手清楚阿莉亚无法伤害[b]岩石护甲[/b]加身的她。

original: Lucio: They also knew that [b]Hold Creature[/b] would prevent Sibyl from [i]dispelling[/i] her own [b]Stone Skin[/b].
translation: Lucio: 同时也知道[b]定身术[/b]能让希比尔无法[i]解除[/i]自己的[b]岩石护甲[/b]。

original: Tyrion: Not only that.[p/] They did all of this in a quick time frame.
translation: Tyrion: 不仅如此。[p/]这一系列行动都在短时间内完成。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus and Sibyl died within thirteen minutes of each other.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯与希比尔十三分钟内先后死亡。

original: Tyrion: And if Aria hadn't encountered Celeste,[p/] Pierce might've died [i]just[/i] as quickly.
translation: Tyrion: 要不是阿莉亚撞见了塞莱斯特，[p/]皮尔斯也会很快被杀。

original: Rath: So whoever did this had an in-depth knowledge of high-level magic.
translation: Rath: 所以犯人很了解高阶法术。

original: Lucio: Not only that...[p/] They came up with creative ways to bypass the defenses put up by von Sanctus and Sibyl.
translation: Lucio: 不只这样……[p/]犯人还清楚怎么反过来利用冯·桑克图斯和希比尔的防御手段。

original: Rath: Yes...[p/] They had the ability to react quickly and decisively.
translation: Rath: 没错……[p/]犯人的应对手段精准迅速。

original: Lucio: *sigh*[p/] But considering the circumstances...[p/] that [i]hardly[/i] narrows it down.
translation: Lucio: *叹气*[p/]但现在的情况看来……[p/]知道这些也不足以缩小嫌疑人范围。

original: Lucio: Several members of the Four Pillar Families were present that day.
translation: Lucio: 当天有多名四大支柱家族成员在场。

original: Lucio: Each and every one of them studied at the Imperial Academy.
translation: Lucio: 每个人都从帝国学院毕业。

original: Lucio: They would all be knowledgeable in magic and its applications.
translation: Lucio: 因此都很了解各种法术及其应用。

original: Something they're saying isn't sitting right by you for some reason.
translation: 他们说的话里有哪点不对劲。

original: There's [i]something[/i] there.[p/] So why can't you see it?
translation: 为什么你看不出是[i]哪一点[/i]？

original: Ugh...[p/] It's no use.[p/] You just can't piece it together yet.
translation: 呃……[p/]这样没用。[p/]现在还找不到答案。

original: ...But you're not finished yet.
translation: ……你的话也还没说完。

original: Tyrion: There's another angle to this.
translation: Tyrion: 还有另一个角度。

original: Tyrion: Consider [i]who[/i] the Patron did and [i]didn't[/i] target.
translation: Tyrion: 考虑一下签约人是怎么选择目标的。

original: Tyrion: The victims were Lloyd von Sanctus,[p/] Coraline Sibyl,[p/] and Garrick Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 受害者包括洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯，[p/]卡洛琳·希比尔，[p/]加里克·皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: What's a similarity that we can draw between at least two of them?
translation: Tyrion: 这三人中至少两人都有的共同点是？

original: No...[p/] The victims were von Sanctus,[p/] Sibyl,[p/] and Pierce.
translation: 不对……[p/]受害者是冯·桑克图斯，[p/]希比尔，[p/]皮尔斯。

original: It doesn't quite work for all three of them.
translation: 三人都有的共同点很难说。

original: But there is a common thread between at least two of them.
translation: 但至少两人的共同点还是有的。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus and Sibyl were the heads of their respective noble houses.
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯与希比尔都是声名显赫的贵族领主。

original: Rath: Are you saying the Patron's goal was to assassinate leaders of the Four Pillars?
translation: Rath: 你想说签约人的目标是刺杀四大支柱家族领主？

original: Tyrion: That's the motive that makes the most sense.
translation: Tyrion: 这是最合理的动机。

original: Tyrion: ...But that [i]does[/i] leave one question.
translation: Tyrion: 但也留下了一个问题……

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Lucio: Don't be coy.[p/] I'm not [i]daft[/i], Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: ……不要欲言又止了。[p/]我不[i]蠢[/i]，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: Actually,[p/] I [i]highly[/i] doubt it was you.
translation: Tyrion: 其实，[p/]我并不觉得是你。

original: Lucio: ...Really, now?
translation: Lucio: ……来这套？

original: Tyrion: Out of most of the people there,[p/] you could have easily tricked your daughter into signing a Blood Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 在场所有人里，[p/]你确实能轻易骗自己的女儿签约血契。

original: Tyrion: But [i]why[/i] would you need to do that?
translation: Tyrion: 但你[i]有什么[/i]必要这么做？

original: Tyrion: You're the Grand General of Wyverngarde's military,[p/] and the Cathedral was [i]filled[/i] with your men.
translation: Tyrion: 你是维文加德的大将军，[p/]教堂里[i]遍布[/i]你的手下。

original: Tyrion: You could have easily equipped one of your best mages to carry out this massacre.
translation: Tyrion: 你完全可以用下属法师来杀人。

original: Tyrion: And you wouldn't even [i]need[/i] to make a deal with a demon to do so.
translation: Tyrion: 也不[i]需要[/i]和恶魔签什么契约。

original: Rath: So why [i]wasn't[/i] Lucio targeted then?
translation: Rath: 那卢西奥为什么[i]没有[/i]被刺杀？

original: Tyrion: From her encounter with Celeste,[p/] it's clear there's a limit to Aria's combat capabilities.
translation: Tyrion: 根据与塞莱斯特的搏斗来看，[p/]阿莉亚的战斗能力有限。

original: Tyrion: The Patron might've simply doubted Aria's ability to defeat the Grand General.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人可能只是觉得阿莉亚打不过大将军。

original: Tyrion: But there's also another explanation.
translation: Tyrion: 但还有另一种解释。

original: No...[p/] The Patron made no attempt to kill Lucio Steelwind.
translation: 不对……[p/]签约人没有攻击过卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德。

original: And when they were controlling Aria,[p/] they didn't make any attempt to hide her actions.
translation: 控制阿莉亚的时候，[p/]签约人也没有想着隐藏她的行踪。

original: They [i]wanted[/i] people to see her.
translation: 他们[i]想让[/i]别人看见她。

original: Tyrion: The Patron [i]wanted[/i] people to suspect House Steelwind for the murders.
translation: Tyrion:签约人[i]想让[/i]别人怀疑斯蒂尔文德家犯案。

original: Tyrion: They used Lucio Steelwind's daughter to commit the crime.
translation: Tyrion: 因此利用卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德的女儿杀人。

original: Tyrion: Then they intentionally left him alive to cast suspicion on him.
translation: Tyrion: 所以他们刻意留了活口，让人们怀疑斯蒂尔文德勋爵。

original: Lucio: ...[i]That's[/i] why they used my daughter?
translation: Lucio: 他们利用我女儿就是[i]这个[/i]原因？

original: ...Is that a tinge of anger you feel from him?
translation: ……你感到的是一丝愤怒吗？

original: Tyrion: ...Anyways,[p/] [i]that[/i] leads me to my next point.
translation: Tyrion: ……总之，[p/][i]这个[/i]原因和我之后要说的有关。

original: Tyrion: Imagine if we never discovered Aria's Blood Contract with the Empress of Discord.
translation: Tyrion: 假设我们从未发现阿莉亚与无序女皇签订的血契。

original: Tyrion: What would have happened?
translation: Tyrion: 会发生什么？

original: Rath: ...We'd still think that Ms. Steelwind succumbed to Mageblight.
translation: Rath: ……我们会认为斯蒂尔文德女士感染了法师之疫。

original: Rath: She would have been convicted for the murders,[p/] and trust in House Steelwind would be forever diminished.
translation: Rath: 她会被判谋杀罪成立，[p/]斯蒂尔文德家也会立刻失势。

original: Tyrion: About a month ago,[p/] House Frega lost its head.
translation: Tyrion: 一个月前左右，[p/]弗雷加一族的首领去世。

original: Tyrion: And his successor:[p/] Laefe Frega,[p/] was woefully unprepared to take his place.
translation: Tyrion: 继任者：[p/]拉菲·弗雷加[p/]仓促上阵，毫无准备。

original: Tyrion: [i]Now[/i], the heads of House von Sanctus and House Sibyl are dead.
translation: Tyrion: [i]现在[/i]，冯·桑克图斯和希比尔家的领主也都死了。

original: Tyrion: ...With House Steelwind being held responsible for it all.
translation: Tyrion: ……而斯蒂尔文德家的人要承担这一切罪名。

original: Rath: All Four of the Pillar families would have been weakened as a result of the massacre...
translation: Rath: 四大支柱家族都会因屠杀被削弱……

original: Tyrion: But I think there's another layer to this.
translation: Tyrion: 我认为还有一层意义。

original: Tyrion: Everything fits together if we assume that the Patron's goal was to weaken the Pillar Families.
translation: Tyrion: 假设签约人的目的是削弱四大支柱家族，一切都说得通了。

original: Tyrion: ...[i]Except[/i] for the murder of Garrick Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: ……加里克·皮尔斯谋杀案[i]除外[/i]。

original: Lucio: Yes...[p/] In contrast to Sibyl and von Sanctus,[p/] Pierce's political power pales in comparison.
translation: Lucio: 是的……[p/]与希比尔和冯·桑克图斯不同，[p/]皮尔斯没什么政治影响力。

original: Tyrion: Furthermore,[p/] Pierce was already scheduled to be executed next month for the murder of Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Tyrion: 更重要的是，[p/]皮尔斯下个月就要因谋杀弗林哈特·麦考伊被执行死刑。

original: Tyrion: Why would the Patron go to the trouble of murdering a condemned man?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么签约人要杀一个将死之人？

original: No...[p/] Pierce was [i]going[/i] to die regardless of what the Patron did.
translation: 不对……[p/]不管签约人做什么，皮尔斯都[i]会[/i]死。

original: But there [i]has[/i] to be something Pierce did recently.
translation: 皮尔斯最近肯定做过什么事。

original: Something that made the Patron decide to murder him as soon as possible.
translation: 直接导致签约人必须尽快杀害他。

original: Tyrion: The Patron murdered Pierce because they [i]needed[/i] him to die as quickly as possible.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人需要皮尔斯尽快死亡，所以才杀害了他。

original: Tyrion: Pierce [i]knew[/i] the identity of Celeste's biological parents.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯[i]知道[/i]塞莱斯特亲生父母的身份。

original: Celeste: ...My parents?
translation: Celeste: ……我的父母？

original: Tyrion: Do you remember what Pierce said when we showed up for the meeting?
translation: Tyrion: 你记得皮尔斯会面当天说了什么吧？

original: Garrick: Ah...[p/] You've finally arrived...
translation: Garrick: 啊……[p/]你终于到了……

original: Garrick: I suppose this means you've finally decided-
translation: Garrick: 看来你已经下了决心——

original: Garrick: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]You[/i] two?
translation: Garrick: 等等……[p/][s/]你们两个？

original: Celeste: We got your letter.
translation: Celeste: 我们收到了你的信。

original: Garrick: Letter?[p/][s/] What letter?!
translation: Garrick: 信？[p/][s/]什么信？！

original: Tyrion: You...[p/] sent us a letter, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]寄的信。皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: It said that you knew who Celeste's parents were.
translation: Tyrion: 信里说你知道塞莱斯特的父母是谁。

original: Garrick: I [i]did[/i] send that letter,[p/] but not to [i]you[/i] two.
translation: Garrick: 我[i]确实[/i]寄了信，[p/]但不是给[i]你们[/i]。

original: Tyrion: We weren't the intended recipients of that letter.
translation: Tyrion: 信该寄给的人不是我们。

original: Celeste: ...That's right!
translation: Celeste: ……对了！

original: Tyrion: So [i]that[/i] leaves one last question.
translation: Tyrion: 也就有一个问题。

original: No...[p/] You have a feeling that Pierce sent that letter to someone closely tied to this case.
translation: 不对……[p/]皮尔斯应该是把信寄给了和案件密切相关的人。

original: There's only one person he could have sent it to.
translation: 只有一个可能性。

original: Tyrion: There's only one person Pierce could have sent that letter to.
translation: Tyrion: 只有一个可能收到信的人。

original: Tyrion: The person who orchestrated the massacre in the first place![p/][s/] The Patron!
translation: Tyrion: 就是策划屠杀的签约人！

original: Lucio: But that means-!
translation: Lucio: 你是说——！

original: Tyrion: The Patron is someone who would be threatened by Celeste's parentage!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特父母的身份会对签约人不利！

original: Rath: Order![p/][s/] Order in the court!
translation: Rath: 肃静！[p/][s/]注意法庭秩序！

original: Celeste: But...[p/] I don't understand.
translation: Celeste: 但是……[p/]我不懂。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry.[p/] I know this is a lot to take in.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉。[p/]我知道这很难接受。

original: Tyrion: But I think they were targeting you for some reason.
translation: Tyrion: 但签约人肯定是在针对你。

original: Tyrion: Pierce knew the identity of Celeste's parents and attempted to blackmail the Patron with this.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯知道塞莱斯特亲生父母的身份，尝试借此威胁签约人。

original: Tyrion: Instead of complying with Pierce's demands,[p/] the Patron instead sent the letter to me.
translation: Tyrion: 但签约人没有遵从皮尔斯的要求，[p/]转手把信寄给了我。

original: Lucio: But why go to the trouble of luring [i]you[/i] there?!
translation: Lucio: 为什么要费力气诱使[i]你[/i]过去？！

original: Lucio: They could have just allowed Pierce to wait in the Prayer room while the defendant made her way to murder him.
translation: Lucio: 签约人大可以让皮尔斯在祷告室内等候，同时控制被告实施杀人。

original: Tyrion: Looking back on it,[p/] it's possible they wanted to kill Celeste too.
translation: Tyrion: 回想一下，[p/]签约人很可能也想杀掉塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: They knew I wouldn't meet with Pierce alone.[p/] And the information he had was about [i]her[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 签约人知道我不会单独和皮尔斯见面。[p/]也知道关于[i]塞莱斯特[/i]的信息。

original: Tyrion: The Patron correctly guessed that I'd bring her with me.
translation: Tyrion: 签约人应该猜到我会和她一同前往。

original: Tyrion: By killing both Pierce and Celeste,[p/] they'd eliminate any threat Celeste would pose to them.
translation: Tyrion: 同时杀掉皮尔斯和塞莱斯特能清除任何后者可能带来的风险，[p/]一举两得。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Rath: ...But who would be threatened by such information?
translation: Rath: ……谁会被这种事情威胁到？

original: Lucio: The mere [i]existence[/i] of McCoy posed a threat to them...
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊的[i]存在[/i]就会威胁到他们……

original: Lucio: It must have [i]something[/i] to do with her birthright.
translation: Lucio: 肯定和她的[i]继承权[/i]有关系。

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 没错……

original: Tyrion: So who would that leave?
translation: Tyrion: 也就意味着是？

original: The Royal Family
translation: 皇室

original: Tyrion: ...King de Wyverngarde just recently died.
translation: Tyrion: ……维文加德国王最近去世了。

original: Tyrion: What if Celeste was a member of the royal family?
translation: Tyrion: 如果塞莱斯特是皇室成员呢？

original: Celeste: ...You think I'm a princess?!
translation: Celeste: ……你觉得我是公主？！

original: Tyrion: I don't want to suspect Aster.[p/] But we [i]need[/i] to consider every possibility.
translation: Tyrion: 我不想怀疑阿斯特。[p/]但我们[i]必须[/i]考虑所有可能性。

original: Tyrion: And when it comes to conflicts of inheritance,[p/] a royal line of succession is the first thing that comes to mind.
translation: Tyrion: 如果涉及到继承权，[p/]最有可能的就是皇权。

original: Tyrion: Not only that,[p/] the King would have the authority to pardon Pierce for his crimes.
translation: Tyrion: 不仅如此，[p/]国王也有权赦免皮尔斯的罪。

original: Lucio: But that wouldn't entirely make sense.
translation: Lucio: 但这不完全说得通。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 什么意思？

original: Lucio: If McCoy was abandoned at a tavern in Kornhaven,[p/] we must assume she's a bastard child.
translation: Lucio: 如果麦考伊被丢弃在科尔哈文的小酒馆里，[p/]会被视为私生子。

original: Celeste: Okay...[p/] I don't know why you have to bring [i]that[/i] up.
translation: Celeste: 好吧……[p/]嘴上不饶人。

original: Lucio: ...My [i]point[/i] is that King Olivier wouldn't abandon a child of pure royal blood.
translation: Lucio: ……[i]重点[/i]是奥利维尔王不会为了皇权丢弃婴儿。

original: Lucio: The kingdom requires heirs to continue the royal bloodline.
translation: Lucio: 王国需要皇权继承人来延续血脉。

original: Lucio: He would've leveraged her in a diplomatic marriage.
translation: Lucio: 他会利用这个女儿进行政治联姻。

original: Tyrion: ...That's disgusting.
translation: Tyrion: ……令人作呕。

original: Lucio: That's diplomacy, Cuthbert.
translation: Lucio: 外交手段，卡斯伯特。

original: Lucio: Anyways,[p/] even if McCoy was of royal blood,[p/] Aster is the King's eldest child.
translation: Lucio: 总之，[p/]即使麦考伊确实有皇家血统，[p/]阿斯特也是长子。

original: Lucio: And he's of [i]pure[/i] royal blood.
translation: Lucio: 而且还是纯血长子。

original: Lucio: McCoy would have no claim to the throne under these circumstances.
translation: Lucio: 麦考伊甚至都摸不着王座的边。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] I see what you mean.
translation: Tyrion: 这样……[p/]我懂你的意思。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that eliminates Aster for now.
translation: Tyrion: 看来要先排除阿斯特了。

original: House Frega
translation: 弗雷加一族

original: Tyrion: I recall during Beatrice Frega's trial,[p/] we heard William Frega's last will and testament.
translation: Tyrion: 我记得比亚特丽丝·弗雷加受审时，[p/]威廉的遗嘱也被公布了。

original: Tyrion: It mentioned that House Frega's assets would be divided evenly between [i]all[/i] of his children.
translation: Tyrion: 其中提到弗雷加一族的家产会平均分给他的[i]所有[/i]孩子。

original: Lucio: Ah...[p/] If McCoy were to be revealed as a Frega,[p/] his daughters would be legally obligated to share the estate with her.
translation: Lucio: 喔……[p/]如果麦考伊其实是弗雷加的人，[p/]他的女儿们就必须和她平分财产。

original: Celeste: ...Could I seriously be a Frega?
translation: Celeste: ……我真是弗雷加的人？

original: Tyrion: I don't want to suspect Laefe or Miriam.[p/] But we [i]need[/i] to consider every possibility.
translation: Tyrion: 我不想怀疑拉菲或者米莉亚姆。[p/]但我们[i]必须[/i]考虑所有可能性。

original: Tyrion: And as we've seen,[p/] the Fregas are no strangers to making deals with demons.
translation: Tyrion: 我们也知道，[p/]弗雷加一族有和恶魔签约的前科。

original: Tyrion: But,[p/] it still doesn't quite fit.[p/] I doubt Laefe or Miriam would do something like this.
translation: Tyrion: 但是，[p/]还是说不通。[p/]我不觉得拉菲或者米莉亚姆能做出这种事。

original: Rath: ...What are you basing that on?
translation: Rath: ……你的论据是？

original: Tyrion: I tend to be a good judge of character.[p/] And they just don't seem like the type to do something like this.
translation: Tyrion: 我很擅长判断人品。[p/]她们俩做不出这种事。

original: Lucio: Bah![p/] You're far too trusting.
translation: Lucio: 呸！[p/]你真让人失望。

original: Lucio: I hold no doubt that [i]any[/i] of William's children would be capable of something like this.
translation: Lucio: 威廉的[i]每个[/i]孩子都干得出这种事。

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose we'll have to see.
translation: Tyrion: ……那我们等着看吧。

original: House Steelwind
translation: 斯蒂尔文德一家

original: Tyrion: ...As much as I have my doubts,[p/] House Steelwind [i]is[/i] the only Pillar Family whose House leader survived the past month.
translation: Tyrion: ……虽然难以置信，[p/]但斯蒂尔文德是支柱家族里唯一没有失去领主的。

original: Lucio: ...You think [i]I'm[/i] McCoy's biological father?
translation: Lucio: ……你觉得[i]我[/i]是麦考伊的生父？

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] You're barely a father to your [i]actual[/i] daughter.
translation: Celeste: 呜哇……[p/]你对自己[i]已知[/i]的亲生女儿都不怎么样。

original: Tyrion: I'm only stating that possibility for the sake of argument.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是在陈述一种可能性。

original: Tyrion: As I've said,[p/] it wouldn't make sense for you to frame your own daughter when [i]House Steelwind[/i] would be blamed.
translation: Tyrion: 之前也说过，[p/]明知[i]斯蒂尔文德家[/i]会被怀疑的你不可能去陷害自己的女儿。

original: Tyrion: But we need to consider every possibility.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们要考虑所有可能性。

original: The Eyetaker
translation: 夺眼者

original: Tyrion: ...What if the Eyetaker orchestrated this whole thing?
translation: Tyrion: ……如果是夺眼者策划了这些呢？

original: Lucio: The Eyetaker?[p/] That common criminal?
translation: Lucio: 夺眼者？[p/]那个黑道？

original: Lucio: What reason would [i]he[/i] have to do this?
translation: Lucio: [i]他[/i]策划这些干什么？

original: Tyrion: I've heard firsthand that he was planning to expand his influence throughout Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 我亲耳听他说计划扩大自己在维文加德的影响力。

original: Tyrion: He was actually plotting with Beatrice to use House Frega to do so.
translation: Tyrion: 他也和比亚特丽丝同谋试图利用弗雷加一族。

original: Tyrion: Since I ruined his original plans,[p/] setting up that massacre might've been his backup plan.
translation: Tyrion: 由于我破坏了他的计划，[p/]他只能采用屠杀这个替补。

original: Tyrion: Perhaps we're looking at this all wrong.
translation: Tyrion: 也许我们的看法都是错的。

original: Tyrion: What if Celeste was a part of the royal family and they were planning to use her to take the throne?
translation: Tyrion: 或许塞莱斯特其实是皇室成员，他们计划利用她夺取王座？

original: Lucio: But if he wanted to do so,[p/] why would he put McCoy in danger by having my daughter attack her?
translation: Lucio: 如果他想这么做，[p/]为什么还要让我的女儿攻击麦考伊？

original: Lucio: Not only that.[p/] He also had the perfect opportunity to murder His Majesty.
translation: Lucio: 不仅如此。[p/]他还有机会谋杀国王。

original: Lucio: Imagine if he had placed a more lethal contingent spell in that [b]Glyph of Contingency[/b].
translation: Lucio: 只需要在[b]有备无患[/b]里设下更为致命的法术。

original: Lucio: His Majesty might have very well died alongside von Sanctus, Sibyl, and Pierce.
translation: Lucio: 国王陛下可能就和冯·桑克图斯，希比尔，皮尔斯一起归西了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I suppose you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 确实……[p/]你说得没错。

original: Tyrion: But we need to consider every possibility.
translation: Tyrion: 但我们要考虑所有可能性。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we should consider the other suspects first.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]先考虑一下其他选项吧。

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] But I can't think of anyone else.
translation: Tyrion: 唔……[p/]我想不出别人了。

original: Lucio: Yes.[p/] There's a flaw with each suspect.
translation: Lucio: 对。[p/]每个可能项都有漏洞。

original: Lucio: Your logic is clearly flawed.
translation: Lucio: 你的逻辑就有问题。

original: Well, you don't see [i]him[/i] coming up with any ideas...
translation: 那[i]你[/i]倒是说个没有问题的……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...There's [i]something[/i] here I'm not seeing.
translation: Tyrion: ……有什么我没发现的事。

original: Tyrion: But I [i]know[/i] I'm close.
translation: Tyrion: 但我已经很接近了。

original: Tyrion: There's a missing piece that ties this all together.
translation: Tyrion: 还缺少一块把所有事情联系起来的拼图。

original: Lucio: ...Regardless,[p/] we still have no idea who this "Empress of Discord" is.
translation: Lucio: ……不管怎样。[p/]我们还是不知道“无序女皇”是谁。

original: Lucio: I am loathe to allow such an individual to walk freely through Wyverngarde.
translation: Lucio: 我坚决不会让这种人在维文加德逍遥。

original: Tyrion: Your Grace.[p/] You've been alive since the creation of Wyverngarde and magic.
translation: Tyrion: 巨龙殿下。[p/]您在维文加德和魔力出现伊始就已在世。

original: Tyrion: Do you know who this demon is?
translation: Tyrion: 您知道这个恶魔是谁吗？

original: Rath: I can't say I do...
translation: Rath: 并不知道……

original: Rath: Demons tend to take on many titles over their lifetimes.
translation: Rath: 恶魔一生会多次改变头衔。

original: Rath: ...But whoever this Empress is,[p/] they are brave to so blatantly encroach on my domain like this.
translation: Rath: ……不管这个女皇是谁，[p/]敢这样侵犯我的领域也是好胆量。

original: Tyrion: ...Well,[p/] I suppose we'll just have to cross that bridge when we get there.
translation: Tyrion: ……哎，[p/]看来我们只能顺其自然了。

original: Rath: We've obtained a lot of information today.[p/] But we clearly have many questions that need to be answered.
translation: Rath: 我们今天已经获取了很多信息。[p/]但从中也衍生出更多问题。

original: Rath: How should we proceed?
translation: Rath: 应该怎么继续呢？

original: Tyrion: ...Ugh.
translation: Tyrion: ……唔呃。

original: Rath: ...What is it, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Rath: ……怎么了，卡斯伯特先生？

original: Tyrion: I can't help but feel that there's something here I'm not seeing.
translation: Tyrion: 我总觉得有什么错过的事。

original: Tyrion: I just can't put my finger on it.
translation: Tyrion: 但我不知道是什么。

original: Rath: We [i]have[/i] been working at this for quite a while.
translation: Rath: 我们也纠结这件事好一阵子了。

original: Rath: Perhaps we should suspend proceedings so that we can look into these new leads.
translation: Rath: 也许应该暂时休庭，整理线索。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] I have no objections.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]检方没有意见。

original: Lucio: It would give [i]my[/i] men some time to look into what we've discovered today.
translation: Lucio: 这也能让[i]我的[/i]人检查今天的新发现。

original: Rath: Then it's settled.
translation: Rath: 就这么定了。

original: Rath: We'll be postponing proceedings for now.
translation: Rath: 审理暂时推迟。

original: Rath: But you'll all be expected to return here by tomorrow morning.
translation: Rath: 但明天早上大家要返回这里继续。

original: Lucio: You are all free to return to your homes for the time being.
translation: Lucio: 你们现在都可以回家了。

original: Lucio: But make no mistake!
translation: Lucio: 但别误会！

original: Lucio: The Kingsguard [i]will[/i] be keeping careful watch over [i]all[/i] of you.
translation: Lucio: 国王卫队[i]会[/i]仔细关注你们[i]所有人[/i]。

original: There's still this constant nagging sensation in the back of your mind.
translation: 你还是感觉如芒在背。

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 喂……[p/]提利昂？

original: It's as if you've forgotten something extremely important.
translation: 感觉自己忘记了重要的事情。

original: Celeste: ...Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: ……提利昂？

original: What [i]is[/i] it?![p/][s/] What could be so important yet [i]so[/i] difficult to remember?!
translation: 是什么？什么这么重要却难以回想？！

original: Celeste: Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！

original: Tyrion: A-[p/][s/]Ah![p/][s/] S-[p/][s/]Sorry...
translation: Tyrion: 哦、[p/][s/]哦！[p/][s/]不、[p/][s/]不好意思……

original: Tyrion: I was just thinking about everything.
translation: Tyrion: 我在思考发生的事。

original: Celeste: You're looking really stressed out.[p/] Do you want to head back to your house to rest?
translation: Celeste: 你看起来累坏了。[p/]要不要回家休息？

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] We only have a day until the trial resumes.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]离下次庭审只有一天时间。

original: Tyrion: If we can't figure out what happened after tomorrow,[p/] the magical traces will dissipate.
translation: Tyrion: 如果不能在明天之前弄明白发生了什么，[p/]魔法痕迹就会消失。

original: Celeste: But you already [i]know[/i] what happened,[p/] you just don't know who did it.
translation: Celeste: 但你已经[i]知道[/i]发生了什么，只是不知道犯人。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] But we should speak with the suspects again.
translation: Tyrion: 可能吧……[p/]我们应该再和嫌疑人谈一谈。

original: Tyrion: Maybe if I get lucky,[p/] I'll see something through the Eye of Horus.
translation: Tyrion: 运气好的话，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼能告诉我什么事。

original: Celeste: But one of the suspects is the Eyetaker...
translation: Celeste: 可嫌疑人之一是夺眼者……

original: Celeste: What are you going to do about him?
translation: Celeste: 他的话怎么办？

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose I'll have to speak with him too.
translation: Tyrion: ……只能也和他谈谈了。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] No!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]不行！

original: Celeste: What if he tries to kill you again?!
translation: Celeste: 他再想杀你怎么办？！

original: Tyrion: Aria's life is on the line.
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚命悬一线。

original: Tyrion: That's just a risk I'll have to take.
translation: Tyrion: 我只能冒这个险。

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion...[p/] Do you even understand what you've been pulled into?
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……[p/]你知道自己什么处境吗？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: Someone just murdered a bunch of nobles,[p/] and they even attacked members of the royal family.
translation: Celeste: 有人杀害了几个贵族，[p/]还攻击了皇室成员。

original: Celeste: Now there are Ancient Dragons and Demon Lords involved too.
translation: Celeste: 古龙和恶魔领主也被卷进来了。

original: Celeste: Isn't this above your pay grade?
translation: Celeste: 这超出你的能力范围了吧？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Ouch.
translation: Tyrion: 痛欸。

original: Celeste: You [i]know[/i] that's not what I meant.
translation: Celeste: 你[i]知道[/i]我不是那个意思。

original: Celeste: It's just this whole thing is [i]crazy[/i], isn't it?!
translation: Celeste: 我只是说这事儿太[i]邪门[/i]了！

original: Tyrion: It's fine.[p/] It's just like any other of our investigations.
translation: Tyrion: 没关系的。[p/]和其他我们调查过的事一样。

original: Celeste: It's not, though!
translation: Celeste: 不一样！

original: Celeste: What if the Empress of Discord attacks you?!
translation: Celeste: 无序女皇攻击你怎么办？

original: Celeste: What if the Patron decides that you're getting too close to the truth?!
translation: Celeste: 签约人觉得你太接近真相的话怎么办？！

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]What if I can't...?
translation: Celeste: 万……[p/][s/]万一我保护不了……？

original: Her voice begins to break.
translation: 她的声音开始颤抖。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Are you [i]still[/i] worried about what happened during the massacre?
translation: Tyrion: 你[i]还在[i]担心之前的事？

original: Tyrion: I'm fine.[p/] I already told you that you didn't do anything wrong.
translation: Tyrion: 没事的。[p/]我也说了你没有做错。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: You almost died, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，你差点死了。

original: Tyrion: ...I know.
translation: Tyrion: ……我知道。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Celeste: You.[p/][s/] Almost.[p/][s/] [i]Died[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 你。[p/][s/]差点。[p/][s/]死了！

original: Tyrion: I [i]know[/i], Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: [i]我明白[/i]。塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: No, Tyrion![p/][s/] I don't think you do!
translation: Celeste: 不对！[p/][s/]你不明白！

original: Celeste: Do you have any idea how worried I was when she broke past me?!
translation: Celeste: 你知道她越过我离开时我有多担心？！

original: Celeste: When I saw you all lying on the floor... I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Celeste: 看到你躺在地上……我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Celeste: So many things were going through my mind...
translation: Celeste: 我想了好多好多事……

original: Celeste: I don't know what I would've done if you were...
translation: Celeste: 如果你真的……我不知道自己会……

original: She can't even complete that sentence.
translation: 她甚至说不完那句话。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] I...
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]我……

original: You were so focused on everything else that you've been ignoring her.
translation: 你太专注于其他事，忽视了她的感受。

original: She was attacked by Aria and almost died.
translation: 她被阿莉亚攻击，也差点死了。

original: You never even thought about how traumatic that must have been for her.
translation: 你甚至没想过这会给她造成多严重的创伤。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry.[p/] I didn't think-...
translation: Tyrion: ……对不起。[p/]我没有……

original: Celeste: Don't apologize.[p/] Just [i]please[/i]...
translation: Celeste: 别道歉。[p/]但[i]求你了[/i]……

original: Celeste: Please just leave this to Lucio and the Scaled Lord.
translation: Celeste: 让卢西奥和鳞甲领主来处理吧。

original: Celeste: You've done enough already.[p/] They can figure the rest of it out.
translation: Celeste: 你做得够多了。[p/]他们可以解决之后的事。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...And what if it's not enough?
translation: Tyrion: ……如果他们解决不了呢？

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Tyrion: I'm not so arrogant that I think they can't do it without me.
translation: Tyrion: 我也不会目中无人到觉得没了我就不行。

original: Tyrion: But what if they [i]can't[/i] figure out who the Patron is?
translation: Tyrion: 可他们要是[i]找不出[/i]签约人呢？

original: Tyrion: Aria will spend the rest of her life in prison.
translation: Tyrion: 阿莉亚余生都要承受牢狱之灾。

original: Tyrion: What if I could have done something to prevent that?
translation: Tyrion: 如果我能帮她避免这个命运呢？

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Celeste: I don't care if that happens...
translation: Celeste: 我不在乎……

original: Tyrion: Celeste!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特！

original: Celeste: I don't care, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 我不在乎，提利昂！

original: Celeste: I'll apologize to her all you want after this!
translation: Celeste: 之后我怎么对她道歉都可以！

original: Celeste: But all I want is to keep you safe!
translation: Celeste: 但我只想要你平安！

original: Celeste: ...And I don't know if I'm able to do that anymore.
translation: Celeste: ……我不知道自己还会不会坚持下去。

original: Even [i]she[/i] seems surprised by what she said...
translation: 此话一出，[i]她自己[/i]也被吓到了……

original: Celeste: ...I-[p/][s/]I'm sorry.[p/] I didn't mean to-
translation: Celeste: ……我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉。[p/]我不是要——

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I'm really happy you're a part of my life.
translation: Tyrion: 我生命中有你真的很开心。

original: Celeste: ...W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Celeste: ……什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: I know what you're saying is coming from a place of care.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道你是关心我才这么说。

original: Tyrion: And I'm really sorry about how much I've been worrying you lately, but...
translation: Tyrion: 最近对你关心不够我也很抱歉。但是……

original: Celeste: ...You're not going to stop, are you?
translation: Celeste: ……你不会停下来的，对吧。

original: Tyrion: It's like I've always said...
translation: Tyrion: 我一直这么说……

original: Celeste: *sigh*[p/] Man,[p/] king,[p/] or god.[p/] Nothing will stop you from getting justice for your clients.
translation: Celeste: *叹气*[p/]人、[p/]王、[p/]亦或是神。谁都不能阻止你为了委托人追求正义。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: I'm going to talk to Lucio.
translation: Celeste: 我去和卢西奥谈谈。

original: Tyrion: What?
translation: Tyrion: 什么？

original: Celeste: If we're going to meet the Eyetaker again,[p/] we're bringing some knights with us.
translation: Celeste: 如果要和夺眼者再会，[p/]就要带上骑士以防万一。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] That's hardly-
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]不是这么——

original: Celeste: Nope![p/][s/] You don't get a say in this!
translation: Celeste: 不行！[p/][s/]你没有决定权！

original: Celeste: And if you're not here when I get back,[p/] I [i]will[/i] find you.
translation: Celeste: 如果你趁我不在偷偷跑掉，[p/]我也[i]一定会[/i]找到你。

original: Judging from her expression,[p/] it's not an empty threat.
translation: 从表情来看，[p/]她是认真的。

original: Tyrion: F-[p/][s/]Fine.[p/] Just go.
translation: Tyrion: 好、[p/][s/]好吧。[p/]你快去。

original: She might have a point though...
translation: 不过她也有道理……

original: Before everything happened,[p/] you weren't even sure if you [i]wanted[/i] to continue being an attorney.
translation: 这些事情发生前，[p/]你也不确定自己想不想继续当律师。

original: Maybe you should consider a safer, quieter life after this is all done.
translation: 一切结束后也许应该换种更安全，更宁静的生活。

original: ...Perhaps a life with her.
translation: ……和她一起生活。

original: Wait...[p/][s/] What?!
translation: 等等……[p/][s/]想什么呢？！

original: Celeste: Alright.[p/] Lucio's cleared it.
translation: Celeste: 好了。[p/]卢西奥同意了。

original: Celeste: It was surprisingly easy to convince him.
translation: Celeste: 没想到说服他这么容易。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...[p/] U-[p/][s/]Um...
translation: Tyrion: 喔、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]呃、[p/][s/]唔嗯……

original: Celeste: ...Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: ……你没事吧？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I'm fine...[p/] Let's not waste any more time.
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没事……[p/]我们快走吧。

original: Before she has a chance to respond,[p/] you hastily walk past her.
translation: 在她回答之前，[p/]你就快步走开了。

original: Celeste: Hey![p/][s/] Don't walk so far ahead!
translation: Celeste: 等！[p/][s/]别走这么远！

original: You need to stay focused on the trial for Aria's sake.
translation: 为了救出阿莉亚，得专心于准备庭审。

original: But when this is all over, you'll...
translation: 但一切结束之后，也许可以……

original: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/] You suppose you don't have to think about that until then.
translation: 嗯、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]现在先不想这些。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Eris: Hello, your lordship.[p/] I think this is the first time we've met.
translation: Eris: 你好呀，巨龙大人。[p/]我们应该是初次见面。

original: Eris: ...You're a lot smaller than I expected.
translation: Eris: ……你比我想的小只喔。

original: Rath: ...
translation: Rath: ……

original: Gallery: Who is this woman?!
translation: Gallery：这个女的是谁？！

original: Gallery: Why have they brought a [i]civilian[/i] before the Scaled Lord?
translation: Gallery: 怎么能带[i]普通人[/i]见鳞甲领主？

original: Tyrion: People of the court.[p/] Thank you for your patience.
translation: Tyrion: 旁听的人们。[p/]感谢你们耐心等待。

original: Tyrion: Until now,[p/] we've known this woman as Eris Illmater.
translation: Tyrion: 至今，[p/]我们都以为这位女性叫厄莉斯·伊尔马特。

original: Tyrion: And ever since the massacre,[p/] we've been trying to determine [i]who[/i] orchestrated this.
translation: Tyrion: 屠杀发生后，[p/]我们一直在寻找真正的幕后黑手。

original: Tyrion: We only knew that Aria Steelwind signed a Blood Contract with a demon called "the Empress of Discord".
translation: Tyrion: 我们只知道阿莉亚与叫做“无序女皇”的恶魔签订了血契。

original: Tyrion: We still knew very little about this demon.
translation: Tyrion: 但对这个恶魔知之甚少。

original: Tyrion: We had no idea who they were or what they even looked like.
translation: Tyrion: 我们不知道这个恶魔是谁，长什么样。

original: Tyrion: But we know the truth now.
translation: Tyrion: 但现在我们知道真相了。

original: Tyrion: People of the Wyverngarde nobility.[p/] The woman on the witness stand [i]isn't[/i] a civilian.
translation: Tyrion: 维文加德的贵族们。[p/]证人席上的女性[i]不是[/i]普通人。

original: Tyrion: She is the demon known as the Empress of Discord!
translation: Tyrion: 她就是无序女皇！

original: Tyrion: I have no idea [i]how[/i].[p/] But her form is that of a human.
translation: Tyrion: 我不明白[i]原理[/i]。但她利用了人类的形态。

original: Tyrion: Using this disguise,[p/] she entered the Grand Cathedral posing as Beatrice Frega's guide.
translation: Tyrion: 借此伪装，[p/]她以比亚特丽丝·弗雷加向导的身份进入大教堂。

original: Tyrion: She then aided the Patron by using Beatrice Frega to help Aria Steelwind massacre members of the nobility.
translation: Tyrion: 之后她利用比亚特丽丝·弗雷加，协助操控阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的签约人杀害贵族。

original: Lucio: Why are we continuing with this?
translation: Lucio: 还需要继续吗？

original: Lucio: She's already admitted to taking part in the massacre!
translation: Lucio: 她已经承认自己参加了屠杀！

original: Lucio: Let's force her to tell us who the Patron is and be done with this!
translation: Lucio: 只要逼问出签约人是谁就结束了！

original: Eris: Ah,[p/] how typical.
translation: Eris: 哎呦，[p/]太典了。

original: Eris: The Grand General thinks he can solve [i]all[/i] of his problems with violence.
translation: Eris: 以为暴力能解决[i]一切[/i]问题的大将军。

original: Eris: But let me ask you this.[p/] Why are you assuming that the Patron is a human?
translation: Eris: 那我问问你。[p/]你怎么就觉得签约人是人类？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: In Aria's Contract,[p/] it says that "the Patron" is the individual who [i]gives[/i] the Contract to her.
translation: Eris: 在阿莉亚的契约里，[p/]“签约人”是[i]给予[/i]她合同的个体。

original: Eris: How do you know that [i]I'm[/i] not that individual?
translation: Eris: 你怎么知道[i]我[/i]不是这个“个体”？

original: Eris: I go by many names.[p/] The "Empress of Discord" is only one of them.
translation: Eris: 我有很多名字。[p/]“无序女皇”只是其中之一。

original: Lucio: Hmph...[p/] If what you're saying is true,[p/] that makes this a simpler matter.
translation: Lucio: 哼……[p/]即使你没撒谎，[p/]也只是让事情更简单。

original: Lucio: We simply need to execute [i]you[/i] for your crimes against the kingdom.
translation: Lucio: 我们只要因对王国的罪而执行[i]你的[/i]死刑即可。

original: Eris: Haven't you forgotten what my underling said during Frega's trial?
translation: Eris: 你这脑袋已经忘了弗雷加案里我的属下说过什么？

original: Eris: As a demon,[p/] I can never truly die.
translation: Eris: 作为恶魔，[p/]我不能撒谎。

original: Eris: If you destroy my body,[p/] I'll simply reform in the Abyssal Hells.
translation: Eris: 就算你毁掉我的身体，[p/]我也能在深渊地狱里重组。

original: Eris: I wonder...[p/] What might happen to your daughter if you were to draw my ire?
translation: Eris: 我在想啊……[p/]要是你这么对我，那我不得回报一下你的女儿？

original: Lucio: ...!
translation: Lucio: ……！

original: Eris: You're prosecuting her and playing the villain.
translation: Eris: 虽然你在扮黑脸起诉她。

original: Eris: But I know the truth.[p/] You secretly care about her, don't you?
translation: Eris: 但我知道真相。[p/]你心里很关心她，对吧？

original: Lucio: ...W-[p/][s/]What nonsense are you spouting?
translation: Lucio: ……说、[p/][s/]说什么胡话！

original: Eris: When you thought she had Mageblight,[p/] you [i]had[/i] to prosecute her.
translation: Eris: 如果她得了法师之疫，[p/]你觉得自己[i]必须[/i]起诉她。

original: Eris: You held onto the little hope that you could convict her and convince her to take a plea deal.
translation: Eris: 你抓住一线希望，试图说服女儿，让她认罪换取减刑。

original: Eris: As the king's wife,[p/] her position [i]might[/i] have been salvageable.
translation: Eris: 作为国王的妻子，[p/]她的地位可能还有救。

original: Eris: ...And you did this all so she could be with her [i]beloved[/i] Aster.
translation: Eris: ……你这么做都是为了让她和[i]她深爱的[/i]阿斯特在一起。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Lucio: I-[p/][s/]I...
translation: Lucio: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Eris: But then it was revealed she signed a Blood Contract with me.
translation: Eris: 但你得知她其实是和我签约血契后。

original: Eris: [i]That[/i] changed everything.
translation: Eris: 一切都变了。

original: Eris: Mageblight is one thing.[p/] But a demon owning her soul?
translation: Eris: 法师之疫是一回事。[p/]灵魂为恶魔所有是另一回事。

original: Eris: She can't very well be a queen like this,[p/] now can she?
translation: Eris: 这样可当不了皇后呀，[p/]你说呢？

original: Eris: You [i]had[/i] to find out who the "Patron" was before her trial ended.[p/] Didn't you, Lucio?
translation: Eris: 你[i]必须[/i]在庭审结束前找出“签约人”。对吗，卢西奥？

original: Eris: Otherwise,[p/] your beloved daughter would [i]never[/i] be free.
translation: Eris: [p/]不然的话，你可爱的女儿就[i]永远[/i]不能自由。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Eris: And you did [i]all[/i] of this because you feel [i]bad[/i] for what you did to her.
translation: Eris: 你做这些[i]全都[p/]是出于因以前对她做过的事产生的罪恶感。

original: Lucio: ...[i]Everything[/i] I've done is for the good of House Steelwind.
translation: Lucio: ……我做的[i]一切[/i]都是为了斯蒂尔文德家。

original: Eris: Ah,[p/] is [i]that[/i] what you were doing?
translation: Eris: 哦哟，[p/]你确定是为了这个？

original: Eris: Because the way I see it,[p/] you abandoned her for her entire childhood.
translation: Eris: 照我看呀，[p/]她整个童年你都没管过她。

original: Eris: You felt so guilty about killing her mother,[p/] that you couldn't [i]bear[/i] to face her.
translation: Eris: 害死她母亲让你被倍感罪恶，[p/]甚至到了无法面对她的地步。

original: Lucio: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/][s/] I-
translation: Lucio: 不、[p/][s/]不对……[p/][s/]我——

original: Tyrion: ...Eris.[p/] Stop this.
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯。[p/]住手。

original: Eris: And you [i]know[/i] what that did to her.
translation: Eris: 你[i]知道[/i]这对她有什么影响。

original: Eris: You didn't [i]just[/i] take away her mother.[p/] You took away her father too.
translation: Eris: 你[i]不只是[/i]夺走了她的母亲，[p/]还要夺走她的父亲。

original: Eris: You starved her of any affection.
translation: Eris: 你让她与亲情绝缘。

original: Eris: She couldn't help but latch onto the [i]first[/i] person to show her any kind of superficial kindness.
translation: Eris: 她不知所措，只能抓紧[i]第一个[/i]给予她任何浅薄善意的人。

original: Tyrion: Eris!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯！

original: Eris: She didn't fall in love with Aster.[p/] She became [i]obsessed[/i] with him.
translation: Eris: 她不是爱上了阿斯特。[p/]她[i]着魔[/i]了。

original: Eris: She stopped being her own person.[p/] And she clings to him like a parasite.
translation: Eris: 她不再是她自己。[p/]反而像寄生虫一样依附阿斯特。

original: Eris: She changed [i]everything[/i] about herself to suit his likes and desires.
translation: Eris: 她根据阿斯特的喜好改变了自己的[i]一切[/i]。

original: Eris: And you know deep down in your heart...[p/] You know that if he is [i]ever[/i] taken away from her,[p/] she [i]will[/i] fall apart.
translation: Eris: 你心里也清楚……[p/]你清楚如果没了阿斯特，[p/]她就会崩溃。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Eris: Since I pity you so much,[p/] I'll let you in on a little secret.
translation: Eris: 因为我太可怜你了，[p/]给你分享个小秘密吧。

original: Eris: Killing me won't save your daughter.[p/] And you [i]don't[/i] have the means to confine me.
translation: Eris: 杀了我也救不了你的女儿。[p/]你也[i]没有[/i]制约我的手段。

original: Eris: And even if you know who I am,[p/] your daughter will [i]never[/i] be safe from my influence.
translation: Eris: 即使知道我是谁，[p/]你的女儿也[i]永远[/i]逃不出我的掌心。

original: Lucio: ...What?
translation: Lucio: ……什么？

original: Eris: But I suppose there's [i]one[/i] possible way to break my Contract.
translation: Eris: 但我想还是有[i]一个[/i]解除契约的方法。

original: Lucio: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/][s/] What is it?!
translation: Lucio: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/][s/]是什么？！

original: Eris: My Contract "will bind Aria Steelwind to the Patron so long as they [i]both[/i] live.”
translation: Eris: 我的合约在“双方皆生存期间”，会“一直让阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德与签约人绑定”。

original: Eris: If you truly want to free your daughter from my control,[p/] all you have to do is [i]kill[/i] her.
translation: Eris: 如果你真想让女儿摆脱我的控制，[p/][i]杀掉她[/i]就可以啦。

original: Eris: Do the poor thing a favor and put her out of her misery.
translation: Eris: 让这个小可怜蛋从悲剧中解脱吧。

original: Lucio: You [i]little[/i] wretch![p/][s/] I will hunt you until the end of-!
translation: Lucio: 你个混蛋！[p/][s/]我绝对不放过——！

original: Rath: Enough!
translation: Rath: 够了！

original: Rath: Lucio...[p/] We cannot antagonize her if we want to find out [i]how[/i] this happened...
translation: Rath: 卢西奥……[p/]想找出事情的来龙去脉的话，就不能让她产生敌意……

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Is she right...?[p/] Is Aria's fate truly doomed?
translation: 她没说谎……？[p/]阿莉亚注定死亡吗？

original: There has to be [i]something[/i] you can do.
translation: 一定有[i]什么[/i]你能做的。

original: Tyrion: ...I just don't understand, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯，我不太明白。

original: Tyrion: Why are you doing this?
translation: Tyrion: 你为什么这么做？

original: Tyrion: You're not a noble...[p/] You're probably not even a citizen of Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 你不是贵族……[p/]大概也不是维文加德的公民。

original: Tyrion: Why would you go through the trouble of doing [i]any[/i] of this?!
translation: Tyrion: 为什么你要费工夫做这些？！

original: Eris: ...Tyrion.[p/] Why are [i]you[/i] here?
translation: Eris: ……提利昂。[p/][i]你[/i]为什么在这里？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: Why do you constantly risk your life for the sake of others?
translation: Eris: 你为什么一直为了别人冒生命危险？

original: Eris: Why do you try to seek justice in a [i]clearly[/i] unjust world?
translation: Eris: 为什么要在不公的世界里追求正义？

original: Tyrion: ...I don't know, honestly.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也不知道，真的。

original: Eris: I think you [i]do[/i] know.
translation: Eris: 我觉得你[i]知道[/i]。

original: Eris: The answer is simple.[p/] You do it because it satisfies you.
translation: Eris: 答案很简单。[p/]因为这样能满足自己。

original: Eris: You save people.[p/] You "fight" the system.
translation: Eris: 你挽救别人。[p/]与体系“斗争”。

original: Eris: You just love indulging in your own heroics, don't you?
translation: Eris: 你可太爱自己的英雄事迹了，对吧？

original: Celeste: That's not-!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂不是——！

original: Eris: It feels good, doesn't it Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 感觉很好，对不对提利昂？

original: Eris: You know that you're the only righteous person in an unjust society.
translation: Eris: 你知道自己是不公社会里唯一的正义。

original: Eris: When you succeed,[p/] you're hailed as a hero.
translation: Eris: 成功的话，[p/]你就会被视为英雄。

original: Eris: And if you fail,[p/] it's society's fault,[p/] not yours.
translation: Eris: 失败的话，[p/]也是社会的责任，[p/]你可没错。

original: Eris: No matter what happens,[p/] you can take solace in the knowledge that you're so much [i]better[/i] than everyone else.
translation: Eris: 不管发生什么，[p/]你都能确信自己比任何人都好。

original: Eris: That superiority you feel over them must be intoxicating.
translation: Eris: 这种优越感肯定令人欲罢不能。

original: Eris: Your divine blood makes it so.[p/] You just can't resist giving in to it.
translation: Eris: 你的神圣血统就是如此。[p/]你无法反抗。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: But just as your divine blood compels you to do good,[p/] [i]my[/i] hellish blood compels me to do the opposite.
translation: Eris: 你的神圣血统迫使你做好事，[p/][i]我的[/i]恶魔血统恰恰相反。

original: Eris: I just can't [i]help[/i] but take every opportunity to make you all suffer.
translation: Eris: 我[i]忍不住[/i]要抓住每个机会让你们受难。

original: Eris: My entire [i]purpose[/i] is to see each and every one of their faces contorted in agony and despair.
translation: Eris: 我的[i]目的[/i]就是看你们所有人脸上写满痛苦和绝望。

original: Eris: ...Humanity is a stain on the world.
translation: Eris: ……人类真是世界的污点。

original: Eris: They're worthless parasites who steal,[p/] maim,[p/] and kill to get what they want.
translation: Eris: 一群为了获得所想而烧杀抢掠无恶不作的臭虫。

original: Eris: That's all they are.[p/] And I [i]despise[/i] those who try to pretend that they're [i]anything[/i] different.
translation: Eris: 这就是人类。[p/]而我[i]唾弃[/i]那些假装自己不一样的人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: You're wrong, Eris.[p/] Humanity is so much more than you realize.
translation: Tyrion: 你错了，厄莉斯。[p/]人类远比你想的复杂。

original: Tyrion: ...And I truly pity you if that's all you see in us.
translation: Tyrion: ……我也很同情只能从我们身上看到这些的你。

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] so now it's "us".
translation: Eris: 哇哦，[p/]现在知道说“我们”了。

original: Eris: That actually just reminded me,[p/] there's something I hate even more than humanity...
translation: Eris: 倒是提醒我了，[p/]比人类更让我[i]唾弃[/i]的……

original: Eris: I [i]despise[/i] the celestials of the Upper Planes who go against the natural order.
translation: Eris: 就是上层位面那些违背自然秩序的天人。

original: Eris: They condemn and admonish beings like me,[p/] all while watching humanity suffer from their secluded little heaven.
translation: Eris: 他们痛斥声讨我这种存在，[p/]同时又在与世隔绝的小小天堂里看着人类遭难。

original: Eris: They realized that humanity would never [i]willingly[/i] choose good over evil.
translation: Eris: 他们意识到人类永远不会[i]自愿[/i]在好与坏之间选择前者。

original: Eris: So they created the heavensborn to tip the balance in their favor.
translation: Eris: 就创造了天诞之物来增加他们的砝码。

original: Eris: It's so self-indulgent that it makes me want to puke.
translation: Eris: 天人这么放纵让我想吐。

original: Tyrion: ...[i]That's[/i] what the heavensborn are?
translation: Tyrion: ……天诞之物是这么回事？

original: Eris: It is.[p/] And I've made quite a hobby out of breaking them and sending them back to their creators.
translation: Eris: 没错。[p/]我的爱好就是破坏天诞之物再物归原主。

original: Eris: I throw them into the deepest pit of despair before extinguishing their lives.
translation: Eris: 我会先让他们陷入无尽的绝望，再灭掉他们的生命之火。

original: Eris: There's been no greater joy in my eternal life.
translation: Eris: 我这永恒的一生里没有更快乐的事了

original: Eris: ...And it took a lot of work to get [i]you[/i] right where I need you, Tyrion.
translation: Eris: ……让[i]你[/i]就位可费了我不少力气，提利昂。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Are you saying-?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你是说——？

original: Eris: You asked me why I did this, didn't you?
translation: Eris: 不是问我为什么这么做吗？

original: Eris: My actions that day were all for you, my dearest Tyrion.
translation: Eris: 我那天的行动都是为了你呀，我亲爱的提利昂。

original: Eris: All so I could see the despair on your face when you realized the [i]truth[/i].
translation: Eris: 都是为了能看到你理解[i]真相[/i]时脸上的痛苦。

original: Celeste: Tyrion...
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不……

original: Lucio: That's enough out of you, you witch.
translation: Lucio: 住口，你这个恶魔。

original: Tyrion: L-[p/][s/]Lucio...?
translation: Tyrion: 卢、[p/]卢西奥……？

original: Lucio: Cuthbert![p/][s/] You [i]promised[/i] me that we would save my daughter together!
translation: Lucio: 卡斯伯特！[p/][s/]你[i]保证过[/i]我们会一起救出我的女儿！

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I'm sorry...[p/] I-
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]我——

original: Lucio: You said those words to me with such conviction.
translation: Lucio: 你对我说的时候可是信誓旦旦。

original: Lucio: Yet here you stand...[p/] quivering like a grunt in his first battle.
translation: Lucio: 但你现在站在这儿……[p/]抖得像个第一次上战场的新兵。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Lucio: Are a few meager doubts enough to force a retreat from you?
translation: Lucio: 几个小小的质疑就能让你打退堂鼓？

original: Lucio: Is [i]that[/i] all it takes to defeat the infamous Tyrion Cuthbert?
translation: Lucio: 恶名昭彰的提利昂·卡斯伯特这么轻易就能打败？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: ...He's probably desperate at this point.
translation: ……此刻他大概也很急迫。

original: If Eris is the Patron,[p/] there's very little hope for Aria.
translation: 如果厄莉斯就是签约人，[p/]阿莉亚希望渺茫。

original: Unlike Beatrice's,[p/] her Blood Contract was short and concise.
translation: 和比亚特丽丝不同，[p/]她的血契简洁明了。

original: There was very little room for interpretation.[p/] So you probably can't dispute it either.
translation: 没有什么解读空间。[p/]你也没办法提出异议。

original: But what kind of attorney would you be-...
translation: 但这算什么律师……

original: No...[p/][s/] What kind of [i]friend[/i] would you be if you didn't see this through?
translation: 不……[p/][s/]坚持不下去的话算什么[i]朋友[/i]？

original: Tyrion: ...Eris.[p/] We didn't call you here today to wax poetic with you.
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯。[p/]让你来这里不是为了哲学辩论。

original: Tyrion: The people you've harmed have a right to know what you did that day.
translation: Tyrion: 你伤害的人有权知道那天发生的事。

original: Tyrion: So either give us your testimony or [i]get out[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 要么作证，要么[i]离开[/i]。

original: Eris: Even now,[p/] you're still undeterred.[p/] I really [i]do[/i] love that about you.
translation: Eris: 事到如今，[p/]你还没有气馁。[p/]我真的很中意这点。

original: Eris: ...But I do wonder how long that will last.
translation: Eris: ……也很好奇你还能坚持多久。

original: Eris: It's true.[p/] I was the one who masterminded this.
translation: Eris: 没错。[p/]我就是幕后主使。

original: Eris: I knew about the King's funeral at the Grand Cathedral.[p/] So I forced Beatrice Frega to allow me to accompany her.
translation: Eris: 我知道国王的葬礼在大教堂举办。[p/]就强迫比亚特丽丝·弗雷加让我和她同行。

original: Eris: When I was there,[p/] I used my Contracts with Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind to compel them to act against their will.
translation: Eris: 到达之后，[p/]我利用自己与比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的契约，操控她们行动。

original: Eris: And through the actions of Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind,[p/] I facilitated the deaths of Lloyd von Sanctus,[p/] Coraline Sibyl,[p/] and Garrick Pierce.
translation: Eris: 通过比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德的行动，[p/]我协助杀害了洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯，[p/]卡洛琳·希比尔，[p/]加里克·皮尔斯。

original: Eris: The only motivation for my actions that day was to harm Tyrion Cuthbert's friends and make him suffer.
translation: Eris: 我唯一的动机就是要伤害提利昂·卡斯伯特的朋友，使他受尽痛苦。

original: Eris: And before you ask...[p/] Aside from my thralls,[p/] I was acting alone that day.[p/] I didn't follow direct [i]or[/i] indirect orders from anyone.
translation: Eris: 在你问这个之前……[p/]我那天都是独自一人行动。[p/]没有遵从任何直接[i]或[/i]间接指令。

original: Tyrion: Your testimony is pretty...[p/] thorough.
translation: Tyrion: 你的证言还挺……[p/]彻底。

original: Eris: Of course.[p/] I [i]am[/i] a demon after all.
translation: Eris: 当然啦。[p/]我可是个恶魔。

original: Eris: Since I'm unable to lie,[p/] I thought it would be best to be as detailed as possible.
translation: Eris: 既然撒不了谎，[p/]那我觉得还是尽量详细好一点。

original: Eris: That way,[p/] there's no room for doubt.
translation: Eris: 这样的话也不会有质疑空间。

original: Eris: Isn't that wonderful, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 是不是妙极了，提利昂？

original: Ugh...[p/] She's definitely playing with you.
translation: 唔呃……[p/]她肯定在耍你。

original: She may not have [i]technically[/i] lied.[p/] But she's definitely not acting in good faith.
translation: 她也许不能说谎。[p/]但这么做也绝不是出于好心。

original: You should look at her testimony more closely.
translation: 应该更仔细检查她的证言。

original: Tyrion: So you completely carried out this plan yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你独立执行了这个计划？

original: Eris: Well,[p/] I clearly had the help of Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind.
translation: Eris: 哎呀，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德帮了不少忙。

original: Eris: So I wasn't [i]truly[/i] acting alone.
translation: Eris: 所以不能算独立。

original: Tyrion: You know what I meant.
translation: Tyrion: 你知道我什么意思。

original: Eris: Yes, yes.[p/] I just can't help myself sometimes.
translation: Eris: 我懂，我懂。[p/]这不是忍不住吗。

original: Eris: To state things plainly,[p/] no human [i]willingly[/i] helped me with my plan that day.
translation: Eris: 简单来说，[p/]那天没有人类[i]自愿[/i]协助我执行计划。

original: You know that she [i]can't[/i] lie.
translation: 你知道她[i]不能[/i]说谎。

original: But she's probably had a lot of practice deceiving people.
translation: 但她还是有很多欺骗别人的经验。

original: You should keep your wits about you.
translation: 应该时刻保持警惕。

original: Tyrion: ...How [i]did[/i] you find out about it?[p/] It was supposed to be a closely guarded secret.
translation: Tyrion: ……你是怎么知道的？[p/]这理应是个被严格保守的秘密。

original: Eris: Oh, Tyrion.[p/] I can't tell you [i]all[/i] of my secrets.[p/] Now can I?
translation: Eris: 噢，提利昂。[p/]我不可能对你和盘托出的呀，对不对？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You can't exactly threaten to charge her with perjury...
translation: 你倒也不能指控她伪证罪……

original: It's a surprise that she's even testifying in the first place.
translation: 她愿意作证就很出乎意料了。

original: Until you can extract all of the information she has,[p/] you'll just have to play along with her games.
translation: 挖掘出她掌握的所有信息前，[p/]只能顺着她来。

original: Tyrion: What a terrifying ability...
translation: Tyrion: 真是可怕的能力……

original: Eris: Thank you for noticing.
translation: Eris: 谢谢夸奖。

original: Tyrion: That...[p/] wasn't a compliment.
translation: Tyrion: ……我没夸你。

original: Tyrion: ...I find it all quite sickening how you demons prey on people.
translation: Tyrion: ……你们恶魔剥削人类的样子令我恶心。

original: Eris: "Prey"?
translation: Eris: “剥削”？

original: Eris: People know what they're signing up for when they sign a Contract with a demon.
translation: Eris: 人们知道和恶魔签约意味着什么。

original: Eris: You can hardly blame [i]me[/i] for collecting what was freely offered.
translation: Eris: 怎么能怪[i]我[/i]接受主动送上门的奴役呢。

original: Tyrion: Please.[p/] We [i]both[/i] know that Aria didn't knowingly or willingly sign that Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 省省吧。[p/]我们[i]都[/i]知道阿莉亚不是在自愿知情前提下签约的。

original: Eris: ...Aren't you just assuming that?
translation: Eris: ……这不是你的一厢情愿？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: How do you know that she [i]didn't[/i] knowingly sign a Contract with me?
translation: Eris: 你怎么就知道她签约时不知情？

original: Tyrion: My client would never [i]willingly[/i] sign a Contract with you, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 我的委托人绝对不会[i]自愿[/i]和你签约的，厄莉斯。

original: Eris: Really?[p/] What if I were to threaten her dearest fiancé?
translation: Eris: 真的？[p/]那要是我拿她未婚夫要挟呢？

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Eris: You may see Aria as a paragon of justice.
translation: Eris: 你可能觉得阿莉亚是什么正义使者。

original: Eris: But everyone has their breaking point.
translation: Eris: 但每个人都有自己的临界点。

original: Tyrion: If that's true,[p/] tell us under what circumstances Aria signed the Contract.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你所言非虚，[p/]就告诉我们阿莉亚签约的详情吧。

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: You knew it.[p/] She's just trying to get inside your head.
translation: 如你所料。[p/]她只是试图让你慌乱。

original: Aria would've never signed a Contract like that,[p/] even if it were to protect Aster.
translation: 即使是为了保护阿斯特，[p/]阿莉亚也绝对不会签这种契约。

original: Tyrion: Why are you using their full names?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么要用全名？

original: Eris: You know I can't lie.[p/] So I thought I'd give you [i]something[/i].
translation: Eris: 因为我不能说谎呀。[p/]那不如就说详细点。

original: Eris: For example,[p/] I could have easily referred to [i]another[/i] Steelwind or another Frega that I enthralled.
translation: Eris: 因为嘛，[p/]和我签约的[p/]斯蒂尔文德一族与弗雷加一组成员[p/]多的是[p/]。

original: Eris: That list is [i]very[/i] long, you know.
translation: Eris: 多到数不清喔。

original: Lucio: ...
translation: Lucio: ……

original: Tyrion: Ignore her, Lucio.[p/] She's trying to get under your skin.
translation: Tyrion: 卢西奥，别理她。[p/]她故意要激怒你。

original: Tyrion: Anyways...[p/] Aside from Pierce,[p/] von Sanctus and Sibyl were key members of the Wyverngarde nobility.
translation: Tyrion: 总之……[p/]除开皮尔斯，冯·桑克图斯和希比尔都是维文加德贵族圈的重要人物。

original: Tyrion: What reason could you possibly have to kill the three of them?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么要把他们三人一起杀了？

original: Eris: Hm...[p/] I didn't.
translation: Eris: 嗯……[p/]我没有理由。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: I didn't have a reason to kill them.[p/] I just [i]happened[/i] to facilitate their deaths.
translation: Eris: 我没有杀他们的理由。[p/]只是[i]恰好[/i]帮他们去死了。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] But...
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但是……

original: Tyrion: You [i]specifically[/i] went after them.
translation: Tyrion: 你[i]针对[/i]的是他们几个。

original: Eris: I [i]did[/i].[p/] But I didn't have any particular reason to do so.
translation: Eris: 确实。[p/]但我没有特别的理由。

original: Tyrion: But that doesn't make any sense!
translation: Tyrion: 但这没道理啊！

original: Eris: I suppose it doesn't.
translation: Eris: 是没有。

original: Eris: Anyways,[p/] would you like for me to add that to my testimony?
translation: Eris: 总之，[p/]需要我加进证言吗？

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？！

original: Eris: It would help you, wouldn't it?
translation: Eris: 有帮助吧？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] Yeah...[p/] I suppose so.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]好吧……[p/]可能吧。

original: She has [i]got[/i] to be the most unpredictable witness you've cross-examined.
translation: 她一定是你询问过最难以预测的证人。

original: Tyrion: We already established that Pierce was killed due to his knowledge of Celeste's parentage.
translation: Tyrion: 我们已经知道皮尔斯是因知道塞莱斯特亲生父母的身份被杀。

original: Tyrion: How could you possibly have no motivation to see them dead?!
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么可能没有杀人动机？！

original: Eris: ...Aren't you just assuming that?
translation: Eris: ……这不是你的一厢情愿？

original: Tyrion: I'm [i]not[/i]![p/][s/] That's the only logical conclusion!
translation: Tyrion: 不是的！[p/][s/]这是唯一合理的结论！

original: Eris: And that's where you made your mistake.
translation: Eris: 这就是你的错了。

original: Eris: You're assuming that I act logically.
translation: Eris: 怎么能假定我的行为出于逻辑思考呢。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You're a bit out of your element right now...
translation: 你有点黔驴技穷了……

original: Every murder you've investigated has always followed [i]some[/i] kind of logic that you could use to make deductions.
translation: 之前调查过的谋杀案都有逻辑可循，你可以在此基础上推理。

original: But Eris is a different beast, entirely.
translation: 但厄莉斯完全不受此限制。

original: For all you know,[p/] she could be completely insane.
translation: 目前来看，[p/]她狂得毫无逻辑。

original: You might very well be seeing connections that aren't there.
translation: 你以为能看到的联系可能也只是错觉。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Eris: Is something wrong, Tyrion?
translation: Eris: 怎么了，提利昂？

original: Eris: I went to all this trouble to get your attention.[p/] The least you could do is appreciate it.
translation: Eris: 我费这么大力气引起你的注意。[p/]你可别抱怨呀。

original: Lucio: Enough![p/] Stay on subject, witness.
translation: Lucio: 够了！[p/]证人，不要离题。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm not complaining about this.[p/]
translation: Tyrion: ……我没有抱怨。[p/]

original: Tyrion: But if you really wanted to make me suffer,[p/] why wouldn't you just go after the people close to me?
translation: Tyrion: 但如果你的目的是让我受尽痛苦，[p/]为什么不针对和我关系更近的人？

original: Eris: Oh...[p/] But what would be the fun in that?
translation: Eris: 噢……[p/]这不就没意思了？

original: Eris: Killing people is such an [i]easy[/i] task to accomplish.[p/] Even a [i]child[/i] can do it.
translation: Eris: 杀人实在是太[i]容易[/i]了。[p/]小孩子都能做到。

original: Eris: There are much more [i]effective[/i] ways to make someone suffer.
translation: Eris: 让人痛苦的话还有更[i]效率[/i]的方法。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Why do you find the need to specify that?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么强调这一点？

original: Eris: To leave less room for doubt.
translation: Eris: 为了不留质疑空间。

original: Eris: Beatrice used an indirect order to feign innocence in your previous trial, didn't she?
translation: Eris: 比亚特丽丝之前不是用间接命令企图脱罪吗？

original: Tyrion: But [i]did[/i] you work together with anyone to facilitate the massacre?
translation: Tyrion: 可你不是和他人协同犯罪吗？

original: Eris: Of course, I did.
translation: Eris: 确实。

original: Eris: I worked together with Beatrice Frega and Aria Steelwind.
translation: Eris: 我与比亚特丽丝·弗雷加和阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德一起犯罪。

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] You [i]know[/i] what I meant, Eris.
translation: Tyrion: 呃啊……[p/]你[i]知道[/i]我什么意思，厄莉斯。

original: Eris: My apologies.[p/] I just can't help myself sometimes.
translation: Eris: 真对不起。[p/]我就是忍不住。

original: Eris: I'll say it clearly so you can be certain.
translation: Eris: 我会详细说明的。

original: Eris: I did not have a Contract with anyone that wanted to facilitate any of those murders.
translation: Eris: 我没有和任何想要协同犯罪的人契约。

original: Eris: I was acting of my own free will.
translation: Eris: 我是因自己的意志行动。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Even when she says it directly,[p/] you can't help but doubt everything she says.
translation: 即使是这样直言不讳，[p/]你也不禁要怀疑她的每一句话。

original: You'll just need to examine her testimony carefully.
translation: 必须更仔细检查她的证言。

original: She technically can't lie.[p/] But she's clearly hidden something in her testimony.
translation: 虽然不能说谎。[p/]但她显然还隐藏了什么。

original: Instead of examining the wording of her statements,[p/] focus on what she's clearly trying to imply with each statement.
translation: 对她的证词不能抠字眼，[p/]要专注于她的潜台词。

original: You might be able to find a contradiction there.
translation: 也许能从这里找到矛盾。

original: Tyrion: Eris![p/][s/] It's clear that your testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯！[p/][s/]你的证言明显有矛盾！

original: Eris: Sorry,[p/] but that wasn't the correct answer.
translation: Eris: 不好意思，[p/]这不是正确答案。

original: Eris: Did you notice how the music didn't stop?
translation: Eris: 没发现背景音乐都没停？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] What?
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]啥？

original: You're a little lost about what she's saying.[p/] But she [i]is[/i] right.
translation: 你不太懂她在说什么。[p/]但她是对的。

original: That wasn't the contradiction you were looking for.
translation: 这不是你想找的矛盾。

original: Tyrion: Eris...[p/] You said that you "needed Aria to kill them as quickly and efficiently as possible".
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯……[p/]你说你“需要阿莉亚尽可能高效快速地杀掉”这些人。

original: Tyrion: But that's not exactly what happened, did it?
translation: Tyrion: 但这和事实好像不一样啊？

original: Eris: Yes...[p/] It appears I underestimated your little bodyguard.
translation: Eris: 没错……[p/]是我低估了你的小护卫。

original: Eris: Things lasted a [i]lot[/i] longer than I anticipated.
translation: Eris: 缠斗时间比我想得长[i]太多[/i]了。

original: Tyrion: That's [i]not[/i] what I was referring to.
translation: Tyrion: 我指的[i]不是[/i]这件事。

original: Eris: Oh?
translation: Eris: 哦？

original: Tyrion: You said that you needed Aria to kill "them" as efficiently as possible.
translation: Tyrion: 你说自己需要阿莉雅尽可能高效快速地杀掉“要杀的人”。

original: Tyrion: But that doesn't really match with what happened to Garrick Pierce, does it?
translation: Tyrion: 但这和皮尔斯的死法不一致，是不是？

original: Eris: ...Is that so?
translation: Eris: ……是吗？

original: That look on her face...[p/] Why does she look so happy?
translation: 她的表情……[p/]为什么这么开心？

original: Tyrion: ...Eris,[p/] unlike the murders of von Sanctus and Sibyl,[p/] Pierce was murdered with a blade frozen with magic.
translation: Tyrion: ……厄莉斯，[p/]与杀害冯·桑克图斯和希比尔不同，[p/]皮尔斯死于魔法创造的冰冻剑刃。

original: Tyrion: It's such an extremely convoluted way to kill someone.[p/] It would only make sense if you were [i]trying[/i] to hide the evidence.
translation: Tyrion: 这么杀人太大费周章了。[p/]只可能是你[i]试着[/i]隐藏证据。

original: Tyrion: But that clearly wasn't your intent.
translation: Tyrion: 但你表现得又不是这么回事。

original: Eris: I agree.[p/] So why would I do that?
translation: Eris: 同意。[p/]所以我为什么这么做？

original: Lucio: For the love of god, woman![p/][s/] Can you [i]stop[/i] speaking in riddles?!
translation: Lucio: 看在神的份上，你这女人！[p/][s/]能不能不要满嘴谜语了？！

original: Eris: I have no love for [i]any[/i] god aside from myself.
translation: Eris: 我做事只会看在[i]自己[/i]这个神的份上，其他什么神都不管用。

original: She's behaving differently than she was during her testimony.[p/] She's being vague.
translation: 她与自己作证时不一样。[p/]说的话很含糊。

original: Is she still hiding something?
translation: 她还藏着什么吗？

original: Okay...[p/] Stop getting baited by her words and take a moment to think about this logically.
translation: 好了……[p/]不要被她的言辞影响，好好用逻辑思考一下。

original: She's very good at misdirecting you and playing with everyone's emotions.
translation: 她很擅长调动别人的情绪，也会误导你。

original: So stick to the facts that you know for certain.
translation: 先只考虑你确定无误的事实。

original: In her testimony,[p/] she said the following.
translation: 证言里她这么说过。

original: Eris: I didn't really have a reason to kill [i]them[/i] specifically.[p/] I just needed Aria to kill my victims as quickly and efficiently as possible.
translation: Eris: 我要杀[i]他们[/i]没有特定的理由。[p/]我只需要阿莉亚尽可能高效快速地杀掉我要杀的人。

original: She could have been trying to mislead you.
translation: 她可能在尝试误导你。

original: No...[p/] Considering who she is,[p/] she was [i]definitely[/i] trying to mislead you.
translation: 不对……[p/]考虑到她的身份，[p/]她[i]肯定[/i]在尝试误导你。

original: Hm...[p/] For all you know,[p/] she could have had a [i]very[/i] specific reason to kill them.
translation: 唔……[p/]根据已知事实，[p/]她可能出于非常[i]特定[/i]的理由杀人。

original: ...But she's said multiple times she [i]didn't[/i] have a reason.
translation: ……但她多次说过她[i]没有[/i]理由。

original: Out of all the parts of that statement,[p/] [i]that[/i] seems the most direct.
translation: 所有证言里，[p/][i]这部分[/i]看起来最直接。

original: Perhaps one of her other phrases has something you can use.
translation: 也许有什么你用得上的词语。

original: She used the word "specifically".[p/] Could that change the meaning of the entire phrase?
translation: 她提到了“特定”。[p/]这会改变整句话的含义吗？

original: She didn't have a reason to kill the three specific victims.
translation: 她没有特定理由杀害这三个人。

original: But she might have had a reason to kill in general...
translation: 可能一般而言有杀人理由……

original: Hm...[p/] That seems like a stretch, though.
translation: 嗯……[p/]感觉还是有点牵强。

original: She [i]did[/i] say that she did all of this for you.
translation: 她说了自己做这些都是为了你。

original: Did she set all of this up so you would have a mystery to solve...?
translation: 她这么忙活就是为了让你能解谜……？

original: Ugh...[p/] It's too difficult to read her demented mindset.
translation: 呃……[p/]要读取她这么癫狂的人太难了。

original: Perhaps one of her other phrases has something you can use.
translation: 也许有什么你用得上的词语。

original: She said that she "needed Aria to kill the victims".
translation: 她说自己“需要阿莉亚杀掉要杀的人”。

original: But that phrasing doesn't necessarily mean she required Aria to do this.
translation: 但这不代表是她要求阿莉亚这么做。

original: Although,[p/] you still don't know the circumstances that she signed the Contract under.
translation: 虽然你还是不知道，[p/]她签约血契时是什么情况。

original: So perhaps Aria was the only powerful mage she could trick or coerce into giving up control.
translation: 但阿莉亚也许是她能力范围内唯一能骗过或操控意识的强力法师。

original: But either way,[p/] that doesn't really mislead you.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]这都算不上误导。

original: Perhaps one of her other phrases has something you can use.
translation: 也许有什么你用得上的词语。

original: She needed Aria to do the murders quickly and efficiently.
translation: 她需要阿莉亚高效快速地杀人。

original: But because of Celeste's ability to fight Aria,[p/] that didn't end up happening.
translation: 但由于塞莱斯特和阿莉亚的缠斗，[p/]这一点没能实现。

original: But that hardly seems like something intentional on her end.
translation: 但这好像不能算她有意为之。

original: She admitted multiple times that she "underestimated" Celeste.[p/] This means that she was truly caught off guard by her.
translation: 她已经多次承认自己“低估”了塞莱斯特。[p/]也许真的没料到这一点。

original: Perhaps one of her other phrases has something you can use.
translation: 也许有什么你用得上的词语。

original: The phrase "as possible" changes how that sentence reads.
translation: “尽可能”这个说法也值得注意。

original: Because she fought Celeste,[p/] Aria couldn't kill Pierce quickly and efficiently.
translation: 因为塞莱斯特的影响，[p/]阿莉亚没法高效快速杀掉皮尔斯。

original: Actually...[p/] The previous contradiction you pointed out implies that Aria [i]didn't[/i] kill Pierce quickly and efficiently at all...
translation: 这么一说……[p/]之前你也指出了暗示阿莉亚[i]没有[/i]高效快速杀害皮尔斯的矛盾……

original: Hm...[p/] Maybe one of the other phrases elaborates on this.
translation: 嗯……[p/]也许是另一个词。

original: She said "[i]her[/i] victims" instead of "[i]the[/i] victims"...
translation: 她说的是“[i]我[/i]要杀的人”而不是“要杀的人”……

original: It's a small distinction.[p/] But a distinction nonetheless.
translation: 再小的不同也是不同。

original: And you recall Marrunath using a similar trick during Beatrice's trial.
translation: 马鲁纳斯在比亚特丽丝的案子里也用了类似手段。

original: Which can only mean...[p/] [i]the[/i] victims of this case aren't the same as [i]her[/i] victims.
translation: 也就意味着……[p/]本案被杀的人和[i]她[/i]要杀的人不同。

original: Tyrion: Eris...[p/] Which of the people in this case were [i]your[/i] victims?
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯……[p/]本案[i]你[/i]要杀的人是谁？

original: Eris: Well...[p/] Considering what happened,[p/] you could say that [i]everyone[/i] at the Cathedral that day was my victim.
translation: Eris: 这个嘛……[p/]考虑到发生的事，[p/]那天大教堂里的[i]所有人[/i]都是我要杀的人。

original: Tyrion: Yes.[p/] But who was killed directly by Beatrice Frega or Aria Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 没错。[p/]但谁是直接被比亚特丽丝·弗雷加或阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德所杀？

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: I knew it.
translation: Tyrion: 我就知道。

original: Tyrion: You're hiding something, aren't you?
translation: Tyrion: 你在隐瞒什么事。

original: Eris: If that's what you think,[p/] it's definitely possible.
translation: Eris: 你想的事情确实有可能。

original: Ugh...[p/] Again with the vague answers.
translation: 唉……[p/]又是这种含糊不清的回答。

original: Why would she even agree to testify in the first place?
translation: 她干嘛一开始答应作证？

original: There's nothing any of you can threaten her with...[p/] And nothing you do can permanently harm her.
translation: 你既没有要挟她的把柄……[p/]也没有能永久伤害她的手段。

original: She could have easily gone into hiding.
translation: 她完全可以藏起来。

original: She never [i]had[/i] to come here.
translation: 根本就不需要来这里。

original: Which means...[p/] she [i]wanted[/i] to come here...[p/][s/] But why?!
translation: 反过来说……[p/]是她自己[p/]想[/i]来……[p/][s/]但为什么？！

original: Tyrion: Just tell me, Eris.[p/] Who killed Lloyd von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 告诉我一件事，厄莉斯。[p/]谁杀了洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯？

original: Eris: Aria Steelwind.
translation: Eris: 阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion: And who killed Coraline Sibyl?
translation: Tyrion: 那谁杀了卡洛琳·希比尔？

original: Eris: Aria Steelwind.
translation: Eris: 阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion: ...And who killed Garrick Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: ……谁杀了加里克·皮尔斯？

original: Eris: ...
translation: Eris: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Why are you staying silent?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么不吭声了？

original: Lucio: Out with it, demon![p/][s/] Who killed Garrick Pierce?!
translation: Lucio: 快说，恶魔！[p/][s/]谁杀了加里克·皮尔斯？！

original: Eris: I refuse to answer.
translation: Eris: 拒绝回答。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: She's doing this on purpose.
translation: 她是故意的。

original: In her own obnoxious way,[p/] she's trying to guide you to the truth...
translation: 她在用自己令人痛恨的方式，[p/]引导你发现真相……

original: But for what purpose?
translation: 究竟是什么目的？

original: If she's refusing to answer the question,[p/] that must mean the answer is different from her previous answers.
translation: 如果她拒绝回答问题，[p/]就说明答案和她之前说的不同。

original: No...[p/] She had no problem admitting to the murders she used Aria and Beatrice for.
translation: 不过……[p/]她爽快承认了自己利用阿莉亚和比亚特丽丝杀人。

original: If she's refusing to answer,[p/] it can't be either of them.
translation: 既然她拒绝回答，[p/]就代表凶手不是这两人之一。

original: An unknown person killed Garrick Pierce...[p/] That must mean...
translation: 一个身份不明的人杀了加里克·皮尔斯……[p/]也就是说……

original: Tyrion: Eris.[p/] You're [i]not[/i] "the Patron" described in Aria's Contract, are you?
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯。[p/]你[i]不是[/i]阿莉亚契约里的“签约人”，没错吧？

original: Eris: Who knows?[p/] I never confirmed [i]or[/i] denied that.
translation: Eris: 谁知道呢？[p/]我既没肯定也没否认过。

original: Lucio: Are you serious?!
translation: Lucio: 你还敢说？！

original: Rath: I grow sick of your games, demon!
translation: Rath: 你的把戏快让我厌烦了，恶魔！

original: You knew it...[p/] The murders were too politically motivated to have been completely random.
translation: 你就知道……[p/]谋杀的政治因素太强了，不可能是完全随机。

original: You [i]can[/i] unequivocally prove the Patron's identity by issuing a Divine Edict.
translation: 你[i]可以[/i]利用神谕明确揭示签约人的身份。

original: But because of the risk of getting it wrong,[p/] that just leaves you right where you started.
translation: 但一旦弄错后果严重，[p/]事情也毫无进展。

original: Tyrion: Who is the Patron, Eris?!
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，签约人是谁？！

original: Tyrion: Who is responsible for all of this?!
